1144  7A30                  ;;DEFUNCTinclude "./ModelRender/CopyXX15ToXX12.asm"
1145  7A30                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7A30              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7A30                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7A30 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7A30 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7A30 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7A30 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7A30 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7A30 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7A30 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7A30 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7A30 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7A30 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7A30 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7A30 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7A30 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7A30 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7A30 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7A30 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7A30 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7A30 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7A30 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7A30 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7A30 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7A30 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7A30 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7A30 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7A30 ~                                    ret
  28+ 7A30                      ELSE
  29+ 7A30 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7A32 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7A34 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7A37 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7A38 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7A39 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7A3A 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7A3B 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7A3C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7A3E DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7A40                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7A40 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7A42 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7A44 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7A45 C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7A46 E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7A47 CD C6 94                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7A4A E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7A4B 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7A4C 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7A4D 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7A4E                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7A4E                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7A4E DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7A50 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7A51 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7A52 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7A53 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7A55 C9                                   ret
  56+ 7A56                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
1146  7A56
1147  7A56                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7A56              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7A56              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7A56              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7A56              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7A56
   6+ 7A56              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7A56              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7A56
   9+ 7A56 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7A57 CD 31 84                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7A5A EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7A5B F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7A5D 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7A5E E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7A60 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7A61 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7A62 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7A63 CD 31 84                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7A66 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7A67 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7A68 E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7A6A B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7A6B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7A6C 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7A6D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7A6E CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  27+ 7A71 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7A72 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7A74 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7A75 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7A76 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7A78 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7A79 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7A7A CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  35+ 7A7D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7A7E 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7A7F E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7A81 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7A82 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7A83 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7A84 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7A85 CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  43+ 7A88 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7A89 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7A8B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 7A8C 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 7A8D F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 7A8F E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 7A91 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7A92 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 7A93 C9                                   ret
  52+ 7A94
  53+ 7A94 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 7A95 CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  55+ 7A98 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 7A9A CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 7A9C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 7A9D E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 7A9F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 7AA0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 7AA2 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 7AA3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 7AA4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 7AA5 CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  65+ 7AA8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 7AA9 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 7AAA E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 7AAC B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 7AAD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 7AAE 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 7AAF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 7AB0 CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  73+ 7AB3 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 7AB5 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 7AB7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 7AB8 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 7ABA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 7ABB 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 7ABC E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 7ABE 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 7ABF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 7AC0 CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  83+ 7AC3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 7AC4 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 7AC5 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 7AC7 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 7AC8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 7AC9 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 7ACA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 7ACB CD 31 84                             call    doRND
  91+ 7ACE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 7ACF F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 7AD1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 7AD2 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 7AD3 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 7AD5 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 7AD7 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 7AD8 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 7AD9 C9                                   ret
 100+ 7ADA
 101+ 7ADA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 102+ 7ADA 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 103+ 7ADC 21 BC 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 104+ 7ADF CD 56 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 105+ 7AE2 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 106+ 7AE4 C9                                   ret
 107+ 7AE5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 108+ 7AE5 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 109+ 7AE7 21 BC 7F                             ld      hl,varDust
 110+ 7AEA CD 94 7A     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 111+ 7AED 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 112+ 7AEF C9                                   ret
 113+ 7AF0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 114+ 7AF0 FD 21 BC 7F  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7AF4 DD 21 A6 7F                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7AF8 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7AFA FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7AFD 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7AFE E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7B00                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7B00 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7B02 C2 0B 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7B05 C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7B07 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7B08 C3 10 7B                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7B0B 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7B0C 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7B0E 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7B0F 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7B10 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7B13 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7B14 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7B16                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7B16 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7B18 C2 21 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7B1B C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7B1D 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7B1E C3 26 7B                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7B21 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7B22 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7B24 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7B25 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7B26 DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7B29 DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7B2C DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7B2E DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7B30 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7B33 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7B35 ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7B37 E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7B3A 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7B3C C9                                   ret
 149+ 7B3D
 150+ 7B3D              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7B3D 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7B3F FD 21 BC 7F                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7B43 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7B44 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7B47 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7B48 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7B4A 3A 90 7E                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7B4D                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7B4D A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7B4E C2 52 7B    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7B51 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7B52 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7B53 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7B55 CD 52 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7B58                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7B58 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7B5A CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7B5C                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7B5C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7B5E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7B60 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7B61 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7B63 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7B65 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7B69 66 05
 169+ 7B6B ED 5B 91 7E                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7B6F CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7B72                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7B72 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7B74 C2 C9 7C    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7B77 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7B7B 74 05
 173+ 7B7D FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7B81 66 01
 174+ 7B83 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7B84 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7B86 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7B87 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7B89 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7B8B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7B8C E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7B8E B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7B8F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7B90 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7B93 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7B94 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7B96                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7B96 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7B98 D2 C9 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7B9B FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7B9F 74 01
 188+ 7BA1 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7BA5 66 03
 189+ 7BA7 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7BA8 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7BAA 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7BAB DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7BAD ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7BAF 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7BB0 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7BB2 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7BB3 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7BB4 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7BB7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7BB8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7BBA                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7BBA FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7BBC D2 C9 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7BBF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7BC0 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7BC2 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7BC4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7BC5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7BC5 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7BC7 D2 C9 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7BCA FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7BCE 74 03
 208+ 7BD0              ; Now roll
 209+ 7BD0              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7BD0 3A B0 7D     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7BD3 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7BD5 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7BD7                                   ;   break
 214+ 7BD7 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7BD8 3A B2 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7BDB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7BDD 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7BDE E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7BDF 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7BE0 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7BE1 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7BE4 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7BE5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7BE7 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7BE8 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7BE9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7BEB 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7BEC ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7BEE 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7BEF A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7BF0 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7BF1 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7BF2 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7BF6 66 01
 234+ 7BF8 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7BFB FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7BFF 74 01
 236+ 7C01              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7C01              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7C01 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7C02 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7C03 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7C04 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7C07 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7C08 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7C0A 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7C0B 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7C0C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7C0E 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7C0F ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7C11 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7C12 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7C13 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7C14 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7C15 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7C19 66 03
 254+ 7C1B CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7C1E FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7C22 74 03
 256+ 7C24 3A A4 7D     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7C27 FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7C29 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7C2B              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7C2B 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7C2C FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7C2F 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7C30 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7C32 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7C33 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7C35                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7C35 CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7C37 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7C39 3A A5 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7C3C B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7C3D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7C3E FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7C42 66 03
 271+ 7C44 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7C47 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7C4B 74 03
 273+ 7C4D              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7C4D              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7C4D              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7C4D              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7C4D               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7C4D                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7C4D              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7C4D FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7C50 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7C51 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7C53                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7C53 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7C55 C2 5E 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7C58 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7C5A 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7C5B C3 63 7C                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7C5E 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7C5F 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7C61 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7C62 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7C63 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7C66 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7C67 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7C69                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7C69 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7C6B C2 74 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7C6E C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7C70 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7C71 C3 79 7C                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7C74 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7C75 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7C77 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7C78 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7C79 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7C7B C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7C7C              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7C7C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7C80 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7C83 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7C86 C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7C87                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7C87 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7C89 D2 B9 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7C8C 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7C8E 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7C8F C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7C90                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7C90 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7C94 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7C97 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7C9A C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7C9B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7C9B FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7C9D D2 B9 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7CA0 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7CA2 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7CA3 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7CA4                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7CA4 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7CA8 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7CAB FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7CAE C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7CAF 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7CB1 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7CB2                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7CB2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7CB6 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7CB9 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7CBA FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7CBC E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7CBD ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7CC1 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7CC2 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7CC4 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7CC5 C2 43 7B                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7CC8 C9                                   ret
 337+ 7CC9 C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7CCA FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7CCC E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7CCD CD 56 7A                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7CD0 C3 BA 7C                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7CD3              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7CD3 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7CD6 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7CD9 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7CDA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7CDC 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7CDD CD DD 94                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7CE0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7CE1                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7CE1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7CE3 C2 EE 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7CE6              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7CE6 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7CE8 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7CEA 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7CEB C3 F5 7C                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7CEE              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7CEE 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7CF0 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7CF2                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7CF2 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7CF3 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7CF5              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7CF5 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7CF6 32 14 80                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7CF9 C9                                   ret
 365+ 7CFA
 366+ 7CFA FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7CFD FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7D00 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7D01 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7D03 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7D04 CD DD 94                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7D07 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7D08                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7D08 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7D0A C2 15 7D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7D0D                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7D0D 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7D0F                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7D0F B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7D10 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7D12 C3 1A 7D                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7D15              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7D15 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7D17 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7D19 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7D1A              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7D1A 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7D1B 32 15 80                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7D1E C9                                   ret
 387+ 7D1F
 388+ 7D1F
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm

1154  7D1F                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7D1F
   2+ 7D1F 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7D20 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7D24 7D
   4+ 7D25 1F 7D        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7D27 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7D29 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7D2C 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7D2E 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7D32              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7D32
  11+ 7D32              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7D32              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7D32              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7D32 32 1F 7D     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7D35              .set_target:
  16+ 7D35 22 2C 7D     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7D38              .set_length:
  18+ 7D38 ED 53 27 7D  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7D3C              .write_dma:
  20+ 7D3C 21 20 7D     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7D3F 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7D41 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7D43 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7D45 C9           	ret
  25+ 7D46
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
1155  7D46                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7D46
   2+ 7D46 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7D4A 7D
   3+ 7D4B 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7D4D 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7D4F 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7D52 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7D54 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7D58              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7D58
  10+ 7D58              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7D58              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7D58              .set_target:
  13+ 7D58 22 52 7D     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7D5B              .set_source:
  15+ 7D5B ED 53 4B 7D  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7D5F              .set_length:
  17+ 7D5F ED 43 4D 7D  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7D63              .write_dma:
  19+ 7D63 21 46 7D     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7D66 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7D68 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7D6A ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7D6C C9           	ret
  24+ 7D6D
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 202+ 7D7C              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 203+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 204+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 205+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
 206+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
 207+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
 208+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
 209+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
 210+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
 211+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
 212+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 213+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
 214+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
 215+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
 216+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
 217+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
 218+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
 219+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
 220+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
 221+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
 222+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder

 224+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
 225+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
 226+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
 227+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II

 229+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is

 232+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
 233+ 7D7C              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
 234+ 7D7C              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
 235+ 7D7C              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
 236+ 7D7C              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
 237+ 7D7C              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
 238+ 7D7C              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
 239+ 7D7C              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
 240+ 7D7C              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.

 363+ 8091              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2

 366+ 8091              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 367+ 8091              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 368+ 8091              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 369+ 8091              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8
 370+ 8091              ; $0A4D =	EQUW page9+37* 9
 371+ 8091              ; $0A72 =	EQUW page9+37*10
 372+ 8091              ; $0A97 =	EQUW page9+37*11
 373+ 8091              ; $0ABC =	EQUW page9+37*12 \ allwk up to &0ABC while heap for edges working down from &CFF.

  89+ 82A4 2A 48 7F     SetPlayerRank:          ld      hl,(KillTally)
  90+ 82A7 DD 21 C7 86                          ld      ix,RankingTableLow
  91+ 82AB 06 00                                ld      b,0
  92+ 82AD DD 56 01     .CompareLoop:           ld      d,(ix+1)
  93+ 82B0 DD 5E 00                             ld      e,(ix+0)
  94+ 82B3 A7                                   and     a             ; compare HL to DE
  95+ 82B4 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de         ; we can throw away HL now
  96+ 82B6 28 09                                jr      z,.FoundRank
  97+ 82B8 38 07                                jr      c,.FoundRank
  98+ 82BA DD 23                                inc     ix
  99+ 82BC DD 23                                inc     ix
 100+ 82BE 04                                   inc     b
 101+ 82BF 18 EC                                jr      .CompareLoop
 102+ 82C1 78           .FoundRank:             ld      a,b
 103+ 82C2 32 4A 7F                             ld      (CurrentRank),a
 104+ 82C5 C9                                   ret

 108+ 82CB 67                                   ld      h,a                                             ;

 110+ 82CD 22 91 7E                             ld      (DELT4Lo),hl                                    ;
 111+ 82D0 C9                                   ret
 112+ 82D1
 113+ 82D1 21 19 81     RechargeShip:           ld      hl,PlayerEnergy                                 ; if enery >= 128
 114+ 82D4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 115+ 82D5 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                                             ; then we can recharge shields
 116+ 82D7 28 0D                                jr      z,.UpdatePlayerEnergy
 117+ 82D9 21 17 81     .ShieldCharge:          ld      hl,ForeShield                                   ; charge front shield
 118+ 82DC 34                                   inc     (hl)
 119+ 82DD 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneForeShield
 120+ 82DF 35           .ForeOverCharge:        dec     (hl)
 121+ 82E0 23           .DoneForeShield:        inc     hl                                              ; point to aft shield
 122+ 82E1 34                                   inc     (hl)
 123+ 82E2 20 01                                jr      nz,.DoneAftShield
 124+ 82E4 35                                   dec     (hl)                                            ; back to 255
 125+ 82E5 23           .DoneAftShield:         inc     hl                                              ; point to energy
 126+ 82E6 34           .UpdatePlayerEnergy:    inc     (hl)
 127+ 82E7 28 0A                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy

 129+ 82EC                                      ReturnIfANENusng EquipmentItemFitted                    ; if energy unit fitted an extra step
 129+ 82EC FE FF       >                        cp      EquipmentItemFitted
 129+ 82EE C0          >                        ret     nz

 131+ 82F0 28 01                                jr      z,.OverflowedEnergy
 132+ 82F2 C9                                   ret
 133+ 82F3 35           .OverflowedEnergy:      dec     (hl)                                            ;  restore to 255
 134+ 82F4 C9                                   ret
 135+ 82F5 21 19 81     .SkipShieldCharge:      ld      hl,PlayerEnergy
 136+ 82F8 18 EC                                jr      .UpdatePlayerEnergy
 137+ 82FA
 138+ 82FA              ; sets carry to true if target
 139+ 82FA 3A 1C 81     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 82FD CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 82FF 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 8301 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 8303 CA 08 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 8306                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 8306 B7          >                        or a
 145+ 8307 C9                                   ret
 146+ 8308              .TargetSelected:        JumpIfSlotAEmpty .TargetInvalid     ; does slot A have an target
 146+ 8308 21 6A 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 146+ 830B ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 146+ 830D 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 146+ 830E 3C          >                        inc     a
 146+ 830F CA 15 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 146+ 8312 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 147+ 8313                                      SetCarryFlag
 147+ 8313 37          >                        scf
 148+ 8314 C9                                   ret
 149+ 8315 3E FF        .TargetInvalid:         ld      a, StageMissileNotTargeting     ; housekeep missile status if target gone
 150+ 8317 32 1C 81                             ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 151+ 831A C9                                   ret

1170  8430                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 8430              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 8430              doRND2:
   3+ 8430 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 8431              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 8431              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 8431              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 8431              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 8431 3A 8C 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 8434 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 8436 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 8437 21 8E 7D     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 843A 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 843B 32 8C 7D     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 843E 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 843F 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 8440 32 8E 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 8443 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 8444 3A 8D 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 8447 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 8448 21 8F 7D     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 844B 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 844C 32 8D 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 844F 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 8450 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 8451 32 8F 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 8454 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 8455                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 8455 C9                                   ret
  29+ 8456
  30+ 8456 21 8C 7D     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 8459 11 90 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 845C 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 845F ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 8461 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 8463 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 8465 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 8467 C9                                   ret
  38+ 8468
  39+ 8468 21 90 7D     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 846B 11 8C 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 846E 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 8471 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 8473 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8475 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8477 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 8479 C9                                   ret

   1+ 847A 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 847E 58 59 53 45
   1+ 8482 45 44
   2+ 8484 21 32 7F     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 8487 11 0E 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 848A ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 848C ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 848E ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 8490 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 8492 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 8494 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 8496 C9                                   ret
  11+ 8497
  12+ 8497 21 0E 7F     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 849A 11 32 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 849D 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 849F
  16+ 849F 21 32 7F     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 84A2 11 26 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 84A5 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 84A7
  20+ 84A7 21 26 7F     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 84AA 11 32 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 84AD 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 84AF
  24+ 84AF 21 26 7F     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 84B2 11 0E 7F                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 84B5 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 84B7
  28+ 84B7 21 0E 7F     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 84BA 11 26 7F                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 84BD 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 84BF
  32+ 84BF              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 84BF CD C2 84     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 84C2              .NextStep:
  35+ 84C2 CD C5 84     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 84C5              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 84C5 3A 0E 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 84C8 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 84C9 21 10 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 84CC 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 84CD 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 84CE 3A 0F 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 84D1 21 11 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 84D4 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 84D5 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 84D6 3A 10 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 84D9 32 0E 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 84DC 3A 11 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 84DF 32 0F 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 84E2 3A 13 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 84E5 32 11 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 84E8 3A 12 7F     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 84EB 32 10 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 84EE B7           		or		a
  55+ 84EF 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 84F0 21 10 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 84F3 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 84F4 32 12 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 84F7 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 84F8 21 11 7F     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 84FB 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 84FC 32 13 7F     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 84FF C9           		ret
  64+ 8500
  65+ 8500              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8500 CD 03 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 8503              .NextStep:
  68+ 8503 CD 06 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8506              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8506              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8506 3A 26 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8509 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 850A 21 28 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 850D 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 850E 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 850F              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 850F 3A 27 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 8512 21 29 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 8515 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 8516 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 8517 3A 28 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 851A 32 26 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 851D 3A 29 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 8520 32 27 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 8523 3A 2B 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 8526 32 29 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8529 3A 2A 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 852C 32 28 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 852F B7           		or		a
  90+ 8530 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 8531 21 28 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 8534 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 8535 32 2A 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 8538 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 8539 21 29 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 853C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 853D 32 2B 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 8540 C9           		ret
  99+ 8541
 100+ 8541 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 8542 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 8543 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 8544
 104+ 8544 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 8545 32 9B 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 8548 3A 0F 7F     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 854B 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 854C 3A 39 7F     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 854F 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 8550 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 8551 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 8552 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 8554 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 8556 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 8558 32 43 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 855B ED 5B 41 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 855F BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 8560 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 8562 3A 11 7F     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 8565 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 8566 3A 38 7F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 8569 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 856A 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 856B 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 856C CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 856E 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8570 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8572 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8573 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8574 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8576 3A 43 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 8579 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 857A ED 43 41 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 857E C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 857F CD B7 84                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8582 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8583 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8584 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8585 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8586 CD BF 84     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 8589 3A 9B 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 858C 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 858D FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 858F C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8590 32 9B 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8593 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8595
 148+ 8595              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8595 3A 27 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8598 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 859A 32 53 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 859D 3A 28 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 85A0 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 85A2 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 85A4 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 85A6 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 85A8 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 85AA 32 54 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 85AD CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 85AF FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 85B1 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 85B3              .Fedual:
 163+ 85B3 3A 53 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 85B6 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 85B8 32 53 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 85BB              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 85BB 3A 53 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 85BE EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 85C0 32 55 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 85C3 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 85C4 3A 29 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 85C7 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 85C9 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 85CA 32 55 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 85CD 3A 54 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 85D0 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 85D2 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 85D3 3A 55 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 85D6 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 85D7 32 55 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 85DA CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 85DC CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 85DE 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 85DF 3A 53 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 85E2 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 85E3 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 85E4 3A 54 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 85E7 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 85E8 32 56 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 85EB 3A 53 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 85EE EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 85F0 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 85F2 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 85F3 3A 54 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 85F6 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 85F8 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 85F9 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 85FB 3A 56 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 85FE 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 85FF ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8601 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 8603 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8605 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8607 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8609 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 860B CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 860D ED 53 58 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 8611              .DoRadius:
 209+ 8611 3A 29 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 8614 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 8615 3A 2B 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8618 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 861A C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 861C 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 861D ED 43 5C 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 8621 C9           		ret
 217+ 8622
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  53+ 877E              getTableText:
  54+ 877E              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 877E              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 877E D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 877F ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 8781 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 8783 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 8784 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 8785 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 8786 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8787 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 8788 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 8789
  66+ 8789
  67+ 8789              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 8789              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 8789              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 8789              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 8789              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 8789              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 8789              getRankIndex:
  74+ 8789              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 8789              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 8789 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 878A B3           	or		e
  78+ 878B FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 878D C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 878E AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 878F 21 C7 86     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 8792              .testLoop:
  83+ 8792 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 8793 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 8794 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8795 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8796 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8797 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8798 CD 3C 98     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 879B 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 879D              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 879D E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 879E 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 879F 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 87A0 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 87A1 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 87A3              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 87A3 E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 87A4 C9           	ret
 100+ 87A5
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 236+ 8DF8              CapitaliseString:
 237+ 8DF8              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8DF8              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8DF8 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8DF9 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8DFA FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8DFC C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8DFD FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8DFF 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E01 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E03 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E05              .LowerCase:

 249+ 8E07 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E08 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 256+ 8E13 ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8E15 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8E17 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8E18 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8E19 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8E1A 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8E1B EB                                   ex		de,hl
 263+ 8E1C D1                                   pop		de

 271+ 8E24 11 D7 8D     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8E27              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8E27 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8E28 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8E2A 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8E2C E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8E2D D5           	push	de
 278+ 8E2E 21 23 8C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8E31 CD 7E 87     	call	getTableText

 281+ 8E35              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8E35 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8E36 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8E38 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8E3A              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8E3A 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8E3B 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8E3C 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8E3D 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8E3F              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8E3F 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8E41 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8E42 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8E43 E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8E44 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8E45 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8E47              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8E47 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8E48 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8E49 12           	ld		(de),a

   6+ 8EEF 2A F8 83                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 8EF2 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 8EF4 22 F8 83                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 8EF7 C9                                   ret
  10+ 8EF8

  13+ 8EFC B5                                   or      l
  14+ 8EFD 2A F8 83                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 8F00 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 8F01 B5                                   or      l
  17+ 8F02 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return

  19+ 8F04 2A F6 83                             ld      hl,(Cash)

  21+ 8F09 22 F6 83                             ld      (Cash),hl

  26+ 8F19 C2 1D 8F    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 8F1C C9                                   ret

1180  8F27                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 8F27              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 8F27              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 8F27 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 8F28 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 8F29 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 8F2B 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 8F2D E5                                   push hl
   8+ 8F2E AF                                   xor a
   9+ 8F2F 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 8F30 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 8F31 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 8F33 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 8F35 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 8F37 17                                   rla
  15+ 8F38 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 8F39 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 8F3B 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 8F3D ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 8F3F 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 8F40 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 8F42 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 8F44 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 8F45 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 8F47 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 8F48 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 8F49 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 8F4A 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 8F4C D1                                   pop de
  29+ 8F4D 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 8F4E DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 8F50 D1                                   pop de
  32+ 8F51 C9                                   ret
  33+ 8F52
  34+ 8F52 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 8F54 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 8F56 CD 27 8F                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 8F59 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 8F5A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 8F5C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 8F5E B1                                   or      c
  41+ 8F5F 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 8F60 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 8F61 C9                                   ret
  44+ 8F62
  45+ 8F62                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 8F62 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 8F64 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 8F65 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 8F67 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 8F69 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 8F6A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 8F6C 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 8F6D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 8F6F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 8F71 CD 27 8F                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 8F74 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 8F76 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 8F78 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 8F79 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 8F7B 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 8F7C FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 8F7E C9                                   ret
  63+ 8F7F
  64+ 8F7F              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 8F7F              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 8F7F              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 8F7F              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 8F7F 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 8F80 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 8F82 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 8F84 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 8F87 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 8F88 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 8F8B 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 8F8C 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 8F8E CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 8F90 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 8F91 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 8F93 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 8F95 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 8F97 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 8F98 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 8F99 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 8F9B 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 8F9C 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 8F9F C9                                   ret
  87+ 8FA0

  90+ 8FA0

   1+ 8FA0              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 8FA0 2A 97 7E                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 8FA3 3A 96 7E                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 8FA6 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 8FA8 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 8FAB 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 8FAC                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 8FAC CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 8FAE CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 8FB0 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 8FB2 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 8FB4 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 8FB5 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 8FB6 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 8FB7              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 8FB7 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 8FB9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 8FBB CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 8FBD 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 8FBF 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 8FC1 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 8FC2 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 8FC4 C9                                   ret
  20+ 8FC5
  21+ 8FC5              ; FMLTU - A = A * Q / 256
  22+ 8FC5 57           AequAmulQdiv256usgn:    ld      d,a
  23+ 8FC6 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 8FC9 5F                                   ld      e,a
  25+ 8FCA              asm_defmutl:
  26+ 8FCA              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
  27+ 8FCA ED 30        AequDmulEdiv256usgn:    mul     de
  28+ 8FCC 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  29+ 8FCD C9                                   ret
  30+ 8FCE
  31+ 8FCE
  32+ 8FCE
  33+ 8FCE
  34+ 8FCE
  35+ 8FCE              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  36+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  37+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  38+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      e,a
  39+ 8FCE ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  40+ 8FCE ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  42+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  43+ 8FCE ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      d,a
  45+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  46+ 8FCE ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  47+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      e,a
  48+ 8FCE ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  49+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      a,d
  50+ 8FCE ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  51+ 8FCE ~                                    ld      d,a
  52+ 8FCE                                      ENDM
  53+ 8FCE
