  56+ 8FCE                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  57+ 8FCE              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  57+ 8FCE 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  57+ 8FCF 3A 96 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  57+ 8FD2 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  57+ 8FD3 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  57+ 8FD4 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  57+ 8FD6 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  57+ 8FD7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  57+ 8FD8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  57+ 8FDA 57          >                        ld      d,a

  61+ 8FEB                                      ClearCarryFlag
  61+ 8FEB B7          >                        or a
  62+ 8FEC DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e

  65+ 8FF0
  66+ 8FF0              madDEequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  66+ 8FF0 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  66+ 8FF1 3A 96 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  66+ 8FF4 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  66+ 8FF5 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  66+ 8FF6 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  66+ 8FF8 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  66+ 8FF9 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  66+ 8FFA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  66+ 8FFC 57          >                        ld      d,a
  66+ 8FFD 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  66+ 8FFE E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit

  66+ 9001 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  66+ 9003 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  66+ 9004 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit

  69+ 900C EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  70+ 900D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 900D B7          >                        or a
  71+ 900E C9                                   ret
  72+ 900F
  73+ 900F 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  74+ 9010 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  75+ 9012 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  76+ 9013 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  77+ 9014                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  77+ 9014 FA 2C 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  78+ 9017 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  79+ 9018 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9019                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  80+ 9019 FA 1E 90    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  81+ 901C 19                                   add     hl,de
  82+ 901D C9                                   ret
  83+ 901E 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  84+ 901F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  85+ 9021 67                                   ld      h,a
  86+ 9022 7A                                   ld      a,d
  87+ 9023 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  88+ 9025 57                                   ld      d,a
  89+ 9026 19                                   add     hl,de
  90+ 9027 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  91+ 9029 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  92+ 902A 67                                   ld      h,a
  93+ 902B C9                                   ret
  94+ 902C 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  95+ 902D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  96+ 902F 67                                   ld      h,a
  97+ 9030 7A                                   ld      a,d
  98+ 9031 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  99+ 9033 57                                   ld      d,a
 100+ 9034 B7                                   or      a
 101+ 9035 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 102+ 9037 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 103+ 9039 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 104+ 903A B4                                   or      h
 105+ 903B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 106+ 903C C9                                   ret
 107+ 903D              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 107+ 903D AF          >                    xor a
 107+ 903E 95          >                    sub l
 107+ 903F 6F          >                    ld l,a
 107+ 9040 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 107+ 9041 94          >                    sub h
 107+ 9042 67          >                    ld h,a
 108+ 9043 78                                   ld      a,b
 109+ 9044 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 110+ 9046 B4                                   or      h
 111+ 9047 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 112+ 9048 C9                                   ret
 113+ 9049
 114+ 9049
 115+ 9049                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 116+ 9049                  ;
 117+ 9049                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 118+ 9049                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 119+ 9049                  ;
 120+ 9049                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 121+ 9049                  ;         carry reset
 122+ 9049                  ;
 123+ 9049                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 124+ 9049 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 125+ 904A 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 126+ 904B ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 127+ 904D EB                                   ex de,hl
 128+ 904E ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 129+ 9050
 130+ 9050 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 131+ 9051 85                                   add a,l
 132+ 9052 57                                   ld  d,a
 133+ 9053 EB                                   ex de,hl
 134+ 9054
 135+ 9054 7A                                   ld  a,d
 136+ 9055 CE 00                                adc a,0
 137+ 9057 C9                                   ret
 138+ 9058
 139+ 9058 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 140+ 9059 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 141+ 905A ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 142+ 905C EB                                   ex      de,hl
 143+ 905D C9                                   ret
 144+ 905E
 145+ 905E                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 146+ 905E                 ;
 147+ 905E                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 148+ 905E                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 149+ 905E                 ;
 150+ 905E                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 151+ 905E                 ;         carry reset
 152+ 905E                 ;
 153+ 905E                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 154+ 905E
 155+ 905E
 156+ 905E
 157+ 905E 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 158+ 905F 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 159+ 9060 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 160+ 9061 6A                                   ld l,d
 161+ 9062 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 162+ 9063 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 163+ 9064              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 164+ 9064 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 165+ 9066 EB                                   ex de,hl
 166+ 9067 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 167+ 9069
 168+ 9069 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 169+ 906A 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 170+ 906B 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 171+ 906C
 172+ 906C 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 173+ 906D 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 174+ 906E ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 175+ 9070
 176+ 9070 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 177+ 9071 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 178+ 9072
 179+ 9072 7A                                   ld a,d
 180+ 9073 85                                   add a,l
 181+ 9074 67                                   ld h,a
 182+ 9075 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 183+ 9076
 184+ 9076 D1                                   pop de
 185+ 9077 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 186+ 9079
 187+ 9079 EB                                   ex de,hl
 188+ 907A ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 189+ 907C EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 190+ 907D
 191+ 907D C9                                   ret
 192+ 907E
 193+ 907E              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 194+ 907E              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 195+ 907E              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 196+ 907E              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 197+ 907E              ;         carry reset
 198+ 907E              ; maths is
 199+ 907E              ;        hl = y , de= x
 200+ 907E              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 201+ 907E              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 202+ 907E              ;
 203+ 907E              ;
 204+ 907E              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 205+ 907E C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 206+ 907F 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 207+ 9080 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 208+ 9081 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 209+ 9082 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 210+ 9083 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 211+ 9084 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 212+ 9086 EB                                   ex de,hl
 213+ 9087 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 214+ 9089 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 215+ 908A 59                                   ld e,c
 216+ 908B 50                                   ld d,b
 217+ 908C ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 218+ 908E 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 219+ 908F 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 220+ 9090 67                                   ld h,a
 221+ 9091 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 222+ 9092                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 223+ 9092 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 224+ 9093 C1                                   pop     bc
 225+ 9094 C9                                   ret
 226+ 9095
 227+ 9095
 228+ 9095              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 229+ 9095              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 230+ 9095 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 231+ 9096 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 232+ 9097 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 233+ 9099 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 234+ 909B 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 235+ 909C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 236+ 909E 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 237+ 909F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 238+ 90A0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 239+ 90A2              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 240+ 90A2 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 241+ 90A3 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 242+ 90A4 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 243+ 90A6 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 244+ 90A7 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 245+ 90A8 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 246+ 90A9 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 247+ 90AA 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 248+ 90AB 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 249+ 90AC ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 250+ 90AE 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 251+ 90AF 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 252+ 90B0 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 253+ 90B1 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 254+ 90B2 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 255+ 90B3 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 256+ 90B4 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 257+ 90B5 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 258+ 90B7 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 259+ 90B8 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 260+ 90B9 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 261+ 90BB 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 262+ 90BC C9                                   ret
 263+ 90BD
 264+ 90BD              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 265+ 90BD              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 266+ 90BD              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 267+ 90BD              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 268+ 90BD              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 269+ 90BD              ;mult3
 270+ 90BD              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 271+ 90BD              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 272+ 90BD              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 273+ 90BD              ; Algorithm
 274+ 90BD              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 275+ 90BD              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 276+ 90BD              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 277+ 90BD              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 278+ 90BD              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 279+ 90BD              ;
 280+ 90BD              ;
 281+ 90BD 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 282+ 90BE AC                                   xor     h
 283+ 90BF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 284+ 90C1 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 285+ 90C3 7C                                   ld      a,h
 286+ 90C4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ 90C6 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 288+ 90C8              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 288+ 90C8 AF          >                    xor a
 288+ 90C9 95          >                    sub l
 288+ 90CA 6F          >                    ld l,a
 288+ 90CB 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 288+ 90CC 94          >                    sub h
 288+ 90CD 67          >                    ld h,a
 289+ 90CE 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 290+ 90CF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 291+ 90D1 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 292+ 90D3              .DENegative:            NegDE
 292+ 90D3 AF          >                    xor a
 292+ 90D4 93          >                    sub e
 292+ 90D5 5F          >                    ld e,a
 292+ 90D6 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 292+ 90D7 92          >                    sub d
 292+ 90D8 57          >                    ld d,a
 293+ 90D9 CD 7E 90     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 294+ 90DC FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 295+ 90DE A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 296+ 90DF C8                                   ret     z
 297+ 90E0
 298+ 90E0
 299+ 90E0
 300+ 90E0 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 301+ 90E1 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 302+ 90E2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 303+ 90E4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 304+ 90E6 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 305+ 90E7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 306+ 90E9 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 307+ 90EA 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 308+ 90EB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 309+ 90ED 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 310+ 90EE B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 311+ 90EF 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 312+ 90F1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 313+ 90F2 B5                                   or      l
 314+ 90F3 B3                                   or      e
 315+ 90F4 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 316+ 90F6              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 90F6 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 318+ 90F7 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 319+ 90F9 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 320+ 90FA FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 321+ 90FC 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 322+ 90FD 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 323+ 90FE ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 324+ 9100 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 325+ 9102 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 326+ 9103 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 327+ 9104 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 328+ 9106 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 329+ 9107 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 330+ 9108 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 331+ 910A FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 332+ 910C 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 333+ 910D 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 334+ 910E 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 335+ 910F CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 336+ 9111 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 337+ 9113 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 338+ 9114 C9                                   ret
 339+ 9115 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 340+ 9118                                      ZeroA
 340+ 9118 AF          >                        xor a
 341+ 9119 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 911A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 343+ 911B C9                                   ret
 344+ 911C
 345+ 911C              ;;;
 346+ 911C              ;;;
 347+ 911C              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 348+ 911C              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 349+ 911C              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 350+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 351+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 352+ 911C              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 353+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 354+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 355+ 911C              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 356+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 357+ 911C              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 358+ 911C              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 359+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 360+ 911C              ;;;                        or      l
 361+ 911C              ;;;                        or      e
 362+ 911C              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 363+ 911C              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 364+ 911C              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 365+ 911C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 366+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 367+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 368+ 911C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 369+ 911C              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 370+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 371+ 911C              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 372+ 911C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 373+ 911C              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 374+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 375+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 376+ 911C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 377+ 911C              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 378+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 379+ 911C              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 380+ 911C              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 381+ 911C              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 382+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 383+ 911C              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 384+ 911C              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 385+ 911C              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 386+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 387+ 911C              ;;;                        ret
 388+ 911C              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 389+ 911C              ;;;                        ZeroA
 390+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 391+ 911C              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 392+ 911C              ;;;                        ret
 393+ 911C
 394+ 911C              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 395+ 911C              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 396+ 911C              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 397+ 911C              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 398+ 911C              ;         carry reset
 399+ 911C              ;
 400+ 911C              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 401+ 911C 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 402+ 911D AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 403+ 911E 32 1C 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 404+ 9121 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 405+ 9122 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 406+ 9125 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 407+ 9127 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 408+ 9129 57                                   ld      d,a
 409+ 912A 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 410+ 912C 32 1C 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 411+ 912F 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 412+ 9130 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 413+ 9133 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 414+ 9135 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 415+ 9137 67                                   ld      h,a
 416+ 9138 3A 1C 91                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 417+ 913B EE 80                                xor     $80
 418+ 913D 32 1C 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 419+ 9140 CD 7E 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 420+ 9143 3A 1C 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 421+ 9146 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 9149 C8                                   ret     z
 423+ 914A AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 424+ 914B 95                                   sub 	l
 425+ 914C 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 426+ 914D 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 427+ 914E 94                                   sub 	h
 428+ 914F 67                                   ld 		h,a
 429+ 9150 C9                                   ret
 430+ 9151
 431+ 9151 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 432+ 9152 32 1C 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 433+ 9155 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 434+ 9156 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 435+ 9159 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 436+ 915B E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 437+ 915D 57                                   ld      d,a
 438+ 915E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 439+ 9160 32 1C 91                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 440+ 9163 CD 7E 90     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 441+ 9166 3A 1C 91     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 442+ 9169 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 443+ 916C C8                                   ret     z
 444+ 916D AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 445+ 916E 95                                   sub 	l
 446+ 916F 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 447+ 9170 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 448+ 9171 94                                   sub 	h
 449+ 9172 67                                   ld 		h,a
 450+ 9173 C9                                   ret
 451+ 9174
 452+ 9174
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
1182  9174                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 9174              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9174              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 9174
   4+ 9174              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 9174 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 9174 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 9174 ~            			mul
   8+ 9174              			ENDM
   9+ 9174
  10+ 9174              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 9174 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 9174 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 9174 ~            			mul
  14+ 9174 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 9174              			ENDM
  16+ 9174
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
1183  9174                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sine.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sine.asm
   1+ 9174              ;- MACROS
   2+ 9174              LookupSineAMacro:       MACRO
   3+ 9174 ~                                    ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   4+ 9174 ~                                    add     hl, a
   5+ 9174 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
   6+ 9174                                      ENDM
   7+ 9174
   8+ 9174              ; Gets the sine of A from the lookup table into A
   9+ 9174              LookupSineA:            LookupSineAMacro
   9+ 9174 21 1D 92    >                        ld      hl,SNE                      ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
   9+ 9177 ED 31       >                        add     hl, a
   9+ 9179 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
  10+ 917A C9                                   ret
  11+ 917B

1184  917B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 917B              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 917B              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 917B              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 917B              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 917B              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 917B              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 917B 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 917E 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 917F 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 9180              .sqrloop:
  11+ 9180 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 9182 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 9184 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 9185 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9186 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 9188 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 918A EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 918B 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 918C 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 918E              .sqrbit:
  21+ 918E 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 918F EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 9190 B7           	or a
  24+ 9191 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 9193              .sqrfi:
  26+ 9193 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 9195 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 9197 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 9199 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 919B 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 919D C9           	ret
  32+ 919E
  33+ 919E
  34+ 919E              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 919E 3A 96 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 91A1 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 91A2 3A 97 7E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 91A5 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 91A6 CD 7B 91     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 91A9 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 91AA 32 96 7E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 91AD C9           	ret
  43+ 91AE
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1185  91AE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_arctan.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
   1+ 91AE              ;Calculate A = arctan(P / Q)
   2+ 91AE              ; This finds the angle in the right-angled triangle where the opposite side to angle A is length P and the adjacent side to angle A has
   3+ 91AE              ; length Q, so:  tan(A) = P / Q
   4+ 91AE              ;
   5+ 91AE              ; The result in A is an integer representing the angle in radians. The routine returns values in the range 0 to 128,  (or 0 to PI radians).
   6+ 91AE 3A 97 7D     ARCTAN:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set T1 = P EOR Q, which will have the sign of P * Q
   7+ 91B1 21 96 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; EOR Q
   8+ 91B4 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
   9+ 91B5 32 94 7D                             ld      (varT1),a                   ; STA T1
  10+ 91B8 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDA Q                  \ If Q = 0, jump to AR2 to return a right angle
  11+ 91BB A7                                   and     a                           ; BEQ AR2
  12+ 91BC CA FE 91                             jp      z, .AR2                     ; .
  13+ 91BF CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Set Q = |Q| * 2 (this is a quick way of clearing the
  14+ 91C1 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ sign bit, and we don't need to shift right again as we only ever use this value in the division with |P| * 2, which we set next)
  15+ 91C4 3A 97 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                  \ Set A = |P| * 2
  16+ 91C7 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; ASL A
  17+ 91C9 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a
  18+ 91CC 21 96 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
  19+ 91CF BE                                   cp      (hl)                        ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, i.e. |P| > |Q|, jump to AR1 to swap P
  20+ 91D0 D2 E2 91                             jp      nc, .AR1                    ; BCS AR1                \ and Q around, so we can still use the lookup table
  21+ 91D3 CD 0A 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table:  A = arctan(A / Q)  = arctan(|P / Q|)
  22+ 91D6                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag so the SBC instruction in AR3 will be correct, should we jump there
  22+ 91D6 B7          >                        or a
  23+ 91D7 4F           .AR4:                   ld      c,a                         ; as we have to use a we use c as a temp, we can't push af as we would loose flags on pop
  24+ 91D8 3A 94 7D                             ld      a,(varT1)                   ; LDX T1                 \ If T1 is negative, i.e. P and Q have different signs,
  25+ 91DB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  26+ 91DC A7                                   and     a                           ; BMI AR3                \ jump down to AR3 to return arctan(-|P / Q|)
  27+ 91DD 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; .                      \ we need to get a back before jump
  28+ 91DE FA 01 92                             jp      m, .AR3                     ; .
  29+ 91E1 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Otherwise P and Q have the same sign, so our result is correct and we can return from the subroutine
  30+ 91E2              ; We want to calculate arctan(t) where |t| > 1, so we can use the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 64 - arctan(1 / t)
  31+ 91E2              ; In the 6502 verion it works with A already being P but we will fetch it
  32+ 91E2 3A 96 7E     .AR1:                   ld      a,(varQ)                    ; LDX Q                  \ Swap the values in Q and P, using the fact that we
  33+ 91E5 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
  34+ 91E6 3A 97 7D                             ld      a,(varP)                    ; STA Q                  \ called AR1 with A = P
  35+ 91E9 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
  36+ 91EC 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; TXA                    \ This also sets A = P (which now contains the original argument |Q|)
  37+ 91ED 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STX P                  \
  38+ 91F0 CD 0A 92                             call    ARS1                        ; JSR ARS1               \ Call ARS1 to set the following from the lookup table: A = arctan(A / Q) = arctan(|Q / P|) = arctan(1 / |P / Q|)
  39+ 91F3 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T                  \ Set T = 64 - T, we use B as T (its not really that)
  40+ 91F6 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; its actually t = a, a = 64-a
  41+ 91F7 3E 40                                ld      a,64                        ; LDA #64 What is going on here is t = result
  42+ 91F9                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                            a = 64- result
  42+ 91F9 B7          >                        or a
  43+ 91FA 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; .
  44+ 91FB C3 D7 91                             jp      .AR4                        ; BCS AR4                \ Jump to AR4 to continue the calculation (this BCS is effectively a JMP as the subtraction will never underflow, as ARS1 returns values in the range 0-31)
  45+ 91FE              ; If we get here then Q = 0, so tan(A) = infinity and A is a right angle, or 0.25 of a circle. We allocate 255 to a full circle, so we should return 63 for a right angle
  46+ 91FE 3E 3F        .AR2:                   ld      a,63                        ; LDA #63                \ Set A to 63, to represent a right angle
  47+ 9200 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  48+ 9201              ; A contains arctan(|P / Q|) but P and Q have different signs, so we need to return arctan(-|P / Q|), using the calculation described in the documentation for the ACT table, i.e. 128 - A
  49+ 9201 32 B2 7E     .AR3:                   ld      (varT),a
  50+ 9204 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; STA T                  \ Set A = 128 - A, we use b as T
  51+ 9205 3E 80                                ld      a,128                       ; LDA #128               \
  52+ 9207                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; SBC T                  \ The subtraction will work because we did a SEC before calling AR3
  52+ 9207 B7          >                        or a
  53+ 9208 98                                   sbc     a,b
  54+ 9209 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  55+ 920A              ; This routine fetches arctan(A / Q) from the ACT table, so A will be set to an integer in the range 0 to 31 that represents an angle from 0 to 45 degrees (or 0 to \ PI / 4 radians)
  56+ 920A CD 33 A0     ARS1:                   call    LL28Amul256DivQ_6502        ; JSR LL28               \ Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q
  57+ 920D 3A 97 7E                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set X = R / 8
  58+ 9210 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \       = 32 * A / Q
  59+ 9212 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \
  60+ 9214 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ so X has the value t * 32 where t = A / Q, which is
  61+ 9216 21 3D 92                             ld      hl,ACT                      ; TAX                    \ what we need to look up values in the ACT table
  62+ 9219 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; LDA ACT,X              \ Fetch ACT+X from the ACT table into A, so now:
  63+ 921B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                        \   A = value in ACT + X = value in ACT + (32 * A / Q)= arctan(A / Q)
  64+ 921C C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  65+ 921D
  66+ 921D              ;;;arctan:										; .ARCTAN	\ -> &2A3C  \ A=TAN-1(P/Q) \ A=arctan (P/Q)  called from block E
  67+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; a = var P
  68+ 921D              ;;;		ld		hl,varQ
  69+ 921D              ;;;		xor		(hl)						; a = var p XOR varQ
  70+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(varT1)					; \ T1	 \ quadrant info
  71+ 921D              ;;;		ld		c,a							; c = copy of T1
  72+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; Q
  73+ 921D              ;;;		cp		0
  74+ 921D              ;;;		jr		z,.AR2						;  Q=0 so set angle to 63, pi/2
  75+ 921D              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; Q move to reg B?
  76+ 921D              ;;;		ld		d,a							; copy to reg d
  77+ 921D              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  78+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(varP)					; P
  79+ 921D              ;;;		ld		e,a							; copy to reg e
  80+ 921D              ;;;		sla		a							; drop sign
  81+ 921D              ;;;		cp		d							; compare with b (unsigned varQ * 2)
  82+ 921D              ;;;		jr		nc, .ars1					; if q >  p then adjust  swop A and Q as A >= Q
  83+ 921D              ;;;		call	ars1						; \ ARS1 \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
  84+ 921D              ;;;		scf									; set carry flag
  85+ 921D              ;;;.ar4:										; sub o.k
  86+ 921D              ;;;		bit 	7,c							; is T1 (also in c) negative?
  87+ 921D              ;;;		jr		nz,.ar3						;  -ve quadrant
  88+ 921D              ;;;		ret
  89+ 921D              ;;;.ar1:										; swop A and Q entering here d = q and e = P
  90+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,d							; a = varQ
  91+ 921D              ;;;		ld		d,e							; varQ = varP
  92+ 921D              ;;;		ld		e,a							; swap D and E around
  93+ 921D              ;;;		ld		(varP),a					; write to actual variables
  94+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,d
  95+ 921D              ;;;		ld		(varQ),a					; write to actual variables
  96+ 921D              ;;;		call	.ars1
  97+ 921D              ;;;		ld		(varT),b
  98+ 921D              ;;;		ld		b,a							; B = T = angle
  99+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,64						; next range of angle, pi/4 to pi/2
 100+ 921D              ;;;		sub		a,b							; a = 64 - T (or b)
 101+ 921D              ;;;		jr		nc,.ar4						;  sub o.k
 102+ 921D              ;;;.ar2:										; .AR2	\ set angle to 90 degrees
 103+ 921D              ;;;		ld 		a,&3F						;  #63
 104+ 921D              ;;;		ret
 105+ 921D              ;;;.ar3:										;.AR3	\ -ve quadrant
 106+ 921D              ;;;		ld		b,a							; b = T	= \ angle
 107+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,ConstPi					; a = Pi
 108+ 921D              ;;;		sub		b,a							; A = 128-T, so now covering range pi/2 to pi correctly
 109+ 921D              ;;;		ret
 110+ 921D              ;;;.ars1:										; .ARS1	\ -> &2A75  \ get Angle for A*32/Q from table.
 111+ 921D              ;;;		call	RequAmul256divQ				;  LL28 \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
 112+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(regA)
 113+ 921D              ;;;		srl		a
 114+ 921D              ;;;		srl		a
 115+ 921D              ;;;		srl		a							;  31 max.
 116+ 921D              ;;;		ld		hl, ArcTanTable				; root of index into table at end of words data
 117+ 921D              ;;;		add		hl,a						; now at real data
 118+ 921D              ;;;		ld		a,(hl)						; a =  ACT[a]
 119+ 921D              ;;;.arsr:										; rts used by laser lines below (will not in later code)
 120+ 921D              ;;;		ret
 121+ 921D
 122+ 921D
 123+ 921D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_arctan.asm
1186  921D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/SineTable.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/SineTable.asm
   1+ 921D              ;; PRINT "SIN TABLE"
   2+ 921D              ;; FOR I% =  0 TO  31
   3+ 921D              ;; N = ABS(SIN((I%/64)*2*PI))
   4+ 921D              ;; IF N >= 1 THEN B% = 255  ELSE B% = INT(256 * N + 0.5)
   5+ 921D              ;; PRINT B%
   6+ 921D              ;; NEXT I%
   7+ 921D
   8+ 921D
   9+ 921D 00 19 32 4A  SNE:            DB 000, 025, 050, 074, 098, 121, 142, 162
   9+ 9221 62 79 8E A2
  10+ 9225 B5 C6 D5 E2                  DB 181, 198, 213, 226, 237, 245, 251, 255
  10+ 9229 ED F5 FB FF
  11+ 922D FF FF FB F5                  DB 255, 255, 251, 245, 237, 226, 213, 198
  11+ 9231 ED E2 D5 C6
  12+ 9235 B5 A2 8E 79                  DB 181, 162, 142, 121, 098, 074, 050, 025
  12+ 9239 62 4A 32 19

1187  923D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/ArcTanTable.asm"

   1+ 923D              ;PRINT "ARCTAN TABLE"

   3+ 923D              ;    PRINT INT((128/PI) * ATN(I%/32)+0.5)

   5+ 923D
   6+ 923D 00 01 03 04  ACT:            DB 000, 001, 003, 004, 005, 006, 008, 009
   6+ 9241 05 06 08 09
   7+ 9245 0A 0B 0C 0D                  DB 010, 011, 012, 013, 015, 016, 017, 018
   7+ 9249 0F 10 11 12
   8+ 924D 13 14 15 16                  DB 019, 020, 021, 022, 023, 024, 025, 025
   8+ 9251 17 18 19 19
   9+ 9255 1A 1B 1C 1D                  DB 026, 027, 028, 029, 030, 031, 031, 031
   9+ 9259 1E 1F 1F 1F
