1188  925D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 925D              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 925D              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 925D                      ; Input:
   4+ 925D                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 925D                      ; Output:
   6+ 925D                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 925D                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 925D                      ;       AF
   9+ 925D                      ;
  10+ 925D              negate16:
  11+ 925D AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 925E 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 925F 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 9260 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 9261 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 9262 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 9263 C9                               ret
  18+ 9264
  19+ 9264 AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 9265 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 9266 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 9267 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 9268 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 9269 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 926A C9                               ret
  26+ 926B
  27+ 926B AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 926C 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 926D 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 926E 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 926F 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 9270 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 9271 C9                               ret
  34+ 9272
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1189  9272                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 9272              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 9272              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 9272
   4+ 9272              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 9272 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 9276 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 9279
   8+ 9279                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 9279              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 9279              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 9279
  12+ 9279              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 9279              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 9279 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 927B DA 90 92                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 927E                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 927E 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 927F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 927F B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 9280 DA 85 92    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 9283                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 9283 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 9284                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 9284 B7          >                        or a
  21+ 9285              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 9285 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 9286 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 9288 DA 79 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 928B 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 928C 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 928F C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 9290 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 9291                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 9291 37          >                        scf
  29+ 9292 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 9294 DA 79 92                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 9297 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 9298 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 929B C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 929C 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 929E 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 92A1 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 92A2                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 92A2 37          >                        scf
  38+ 92A3 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 92A4
  40+ 92A4
  41+ 92A4 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 92A5
  43+ 92A5 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 92A6 32 74 92                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 92A9 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 92AA E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 92AC 32 73 92                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 92AF 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 92B0 E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 92B2 32 72 92                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 92B5 C3 BB 92                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 92B8              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 92B8              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 92B8 32 99 7D     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 92BB                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 92BB                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 92BB                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 92BB                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 92BB                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 92BB                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 92BB              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 92BB 3A 97 7D     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 92BE F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 92C0 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 92C3              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 92C3 3A 99 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 92C6 21 98 7E                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 92C9 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 92CA E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 92CC 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 92CF              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 92CF 3A 96 7E     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 92D2 21 97 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 92D5 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 92D6 C2 DE 92                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 92D9 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 92DB 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 92DE              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 92DE 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 92E0 3A 99 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 92E3 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 92E5              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 92E5              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 92E5                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 92E5              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 92E5 FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 92E7 D2 F8 92                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 92EA 21 97 7D                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 92ED CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 92EF 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 92F0 CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 92F2 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 92F4 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 92F5 C3 E5 92                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 92F8              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 92F8 32 99 7D     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 92FB 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 92FE E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 9300                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 9300              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 9300              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 9300              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 9300              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 9300 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 9301 21 96 7E                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 9304 CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 9306 21 97 7E                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 9309 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 930B CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 930D F2 00 93                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 9310              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 9310              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 9310 32 96 7E     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 9313 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 9314 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 9315 32 A4 92                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 9318              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 9318 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 931A 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 931D 3A 99 7D                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 9320 CD 79 92                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 9323              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 9323                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 9323 AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 9324 32 AA 7E                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 9327 32 AB 7E                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 932A 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 932D 3A A4 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 9330 B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 9331 CA 5C 93                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 9334 F2 67 93                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 9337              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 9337                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 9337 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 9338 3A A4 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 933B 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 933C 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 933D                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 933D CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 933F 21 AA 7E                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 9342 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 9344 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 9345 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 9347 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 9348 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 934A 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 934B C2 3D 93                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 934E 32 A9 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 9351 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 9354 21 B2 7E                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 9357 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 9358 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 935B C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 935C              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 935C 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 935D 32 A9 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 9360 3A B2 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 9363 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 9366 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 9367              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 9367              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 9367              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 9367              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 9367                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 9367 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 9368 3A A4 92                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 936B 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 936C 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 936D CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 936F 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 9370 C2 6D 93                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 9373 32 A9 7E                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 9376 3A B2 7E                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 9379 32 AC 7E                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 937C C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 937D              ;
 176+ 937D              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 937D              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 937D              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 937D              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 937D              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 937D              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 937D              ;           else
 183+ 937D
 184+ 937D              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 937D              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 937D              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 937D              ;
 188+ 937D              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 937D              ;
 190+ 937D              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 937D              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 937D
 193+ 937D 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 937E 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 9381 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 9382 3A 97 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 9385 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 9386                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 9386 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 9387 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 9388 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 938A 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 938B A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 938C 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 938E 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 938F A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 9390 E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 9392 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 9393 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 9395 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 9397                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 9397 CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 9399 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 939B CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 939D CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 939F CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 93A1                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 93A1 B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 93A2 DA A8 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 93A5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 93A5 B7          >                        or a
 217+ 93A6 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 93A7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 93A7 B7          >                        or a
 219+ 93A8 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 93A9 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 93AB CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 93AD 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 93AE 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 93B0 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 93B1 B5                                   or      l
 226+ 93B2 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 93B3 C9                                   ret
 228+ 93B4              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 93B4 AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 93B5 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 93B6 C9                                   ret
 231+ 93B7 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 93B9 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 93BA C9                                   ret
 234+ 93BB
 235+ 93BB 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 93BC 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 93BF 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 93C1 3A 97 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 93C4 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 93C5                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 93C5 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 93C6 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 93C7 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 93C9 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 93CA A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 93CB E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 93CD 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 93CE 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 93D0 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 93D2                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 93D2 CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 93D4 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 93D6 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 93D8 CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 93DA CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 93DC                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 93DC B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 93DD DA E3 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 93E0                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 93E0 B7          >                        or a
 256+ 93E1 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 93E2                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 93E2 B7          >                        or a
 258+ 93E3 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 93E4 CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 93E6 CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 93E8 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 93E9 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 93EB 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 93EC B5                                   or      l
 265+ 93ED 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 93EE C9                                   ret
 267+ 93EF              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 93EF AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 93F0 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 93F1 C9                                   ret
 270+ 93F2
 271+ 93F2 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 93F3 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 93F4 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 93F6 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 93F8 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 93FA 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 93FB B3                                   or      e
 278+ 93FC 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 93FE 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 93FF 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 9400 CD 52 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 9403                                      ZeroA
 282+ 9403 AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 9404 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 9405 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 9407 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 9408 C9                                   ret
 287+ 9409 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 940A 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 940B 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 940C 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 940D C9                                   ret
 292+ 940E 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 9410 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 9411 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 9412                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 9412 37          >                        scf
 296+ 9413 C9                                   ret
 297+ 9414
 298+ 9414              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 9414                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 9414 ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 9414 ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 9414 ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 9414 ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 9414 ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 9414 ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 9414 ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 9414 ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 9414 ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 9414 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 9414 ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 9414 ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 9414 ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 9414 ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 9414 ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 9414 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 9414 ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 9414 ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 9414 ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 9414 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 9414 ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 9414 ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 9414 ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 9414 ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 9414 ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 9414 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 9414 ~                                    ret
 327+ 9414 ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 9414 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 9414 ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 9414 ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 9414 ~                                    ret
 332+ 9414 ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 9414 ~                                    ret
 334+ 9414                          ENDIF
 335+ 9414
 336+ 9414 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 9415 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 9417 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 9419 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 941B CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 941D 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 941F                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 941F BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 9420 DA 25 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 9423 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 9424                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 9424 B7          >                        or a
 345+ 9425              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 9425 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 9426 CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 9428 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 942A 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 942B C9                                   ret
 350+ 942C 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 942D                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 942D 37          >                        scf
 352+ 942E CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 9430 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 9432 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 9433 C9                                   ret
 356+ 9434 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 9436 C9                                   ret
 358+ 9437 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 9439 C9                                   ret
 360+ 943A
 361+ 943A              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 943A              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 943A              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 943A              ;
 365+ 943A              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 943A              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 943A              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 943A              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 943A              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 943A              ;;;    rla
 371+ 943A              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 943A              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 943A              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 943A              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 943A              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 943A              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 943A              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 943A              ;;;    rla
 379+ 943A              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 943A              ;;;    ret
 381+ 943A
 382+ 943A              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 943A              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 943A              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 943A              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 943A              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 943A              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 943A              ;140 bytes
 389+ 943A              ;145cc
 390+ 943A
 391+ 943A              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 943A ~                                rla
 393+ 943A ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 943A ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 943A ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 943A ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 943A                                  ENDM

 401+ 943D 7A                               ld a,d

 427+ 94C6              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 94C6              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 94C6              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 94C6              ; Our use
 431+ 94C6              ; BC = A0
 432+ 94C6              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 94C6              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 94C6              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 94C6 B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 94C7 D2 F2 94    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 94CA 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 94CB 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 94CC 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 94CE 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 94D0 C3 DD 94                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 94D3 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 94D4 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 94D6 21 96 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 94D9 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 94DA 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 94DC 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 94DD              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 94DD 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 94E0 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 94E1 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 94E3 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 94E5 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 94E6 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 94E8 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 94EA 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 94EC 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 94ED 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 94EE 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 94F0 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 94F1 C9                                   ret
 460+ 94F2 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 94F5 C9                                   ret
 462+ 94F6              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 94F6              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 94F6 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 94F8 AF                                   xor a
 466+ 94F9 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 94FB 17                                   rla
 468+ 94FC BA                                   cp d
 469+ 94FD 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 94FF
 470+ 94FF 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 9500 92                                   sub d
 472+ 9501 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 9503 C9                                   ret
 474+ 9504              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 9504 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 9506 AF                                   xor a
 477+ 9507 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 9509 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 950B              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 950B 17                                   rla
 481+ 950C B9                                   cp c
 482+ 950D 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 950F 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 9510 91                                   sub c
 485+ 9511 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 9513 C9                                   ret
 487+ 9514              ;
 488+ 9514              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 9514              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 9514              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 9514              ;
 492+ 9514              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 9514 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 9514 ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 9514 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 9514 ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 9514 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 9514 ~            1:
 499+ 9514 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 9514                                      ENDM
 501+ 9514
 502+ 9514              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 503+ 9514 ~                                    rl  e
 504+ 9514 ~                                    rla
 505+ 9514 ~                                    sub c
 506+ 9514 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 507+ 9514 ~                                    add a,c
 508+ 9514 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 509+ 9514                                      ENDM
 510+ 9514
 511+ 9514              ; Switch to a logarithm version
 512+ 9514              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 513+ 9514              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 513+ 9514 AF          >                        xor a
 514+ 9515                                      EDivC_Iteration
 514+ 9515 CB 13       >                        rl  e
 514+ 9517 17          >                        rla
 514+ 9518 91          >                        sub c
 514+ 9519 30 01       >                        jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 514+ 951B 81          >                        add a,c

 521+ 954C 81          >                        add a,c
 521+ 954D             >.Div8_NoAdd:
 522+ 954D 47                                   ld      b,a
 523+ 954E 7B                                   ld      a,e
 524+ 954F 17                                   rla
 525+ 9550 2F                                   cpl
 526+ 9551 C9                                   ret
 527+ 9552
 528+ 9552
 529+ 9552              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 9552 ~                                    rla
 531+ 9552 ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 9552 ~                                    add	    hl,de
 533+ 9552 ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 534+ 9552 ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 535+ 9552 ~            1:
 536+ 9552                                      ENDM
 537+ 9552
 538+ 9552
 539+ 9552              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 9552              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 9552              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 9552              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 9552              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 9552              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 9552              ;144 bytes
 546+ 9552 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 9553 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 9554 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 9555 93                                   sub e
 550+ 9556 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 9557 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 9558 92                                   sub d
 553+ 9559 57                                   ld d,a
 554+ 955A 78                                   ld a,b
 555+ 955B                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 555+ 9561 ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de

 577+ 95E1              ; BC = BC / DE
 578+ 95E1              ; HL = BC % DE
 579+ 95E1              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 580+ 95E1 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 581+ 95E2 B3                                   or      e
 582+ 95E3 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 583+ 95E5 D5                                   push    de
 584+ 95E6 CD 52 95     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 585+ 95E9 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 586+ 95EA CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 587+ 95EC C2 FC 95                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 588+ 95EF 7A                                   ld      a,d
 589+ 95F0 B3                                   or      e
 590+ 95F1 CA FC 95                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 591+ 95F4 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 592+ 95F6 C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 593+ 95F7 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 594+ 95F8                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 594+ 95F8 B7          >                        or a
 595+ 95F9 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 596+ 95FB C9                                   ret
 597+ 95FC CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 598+ 95FE C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 599+ 95FF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 600+ 9600 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 601+ 9601 C8                                   ret     z
 602+ 9602 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 603+ 9603                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 603+ 9603 B7          >                        or a
 604+ 9604 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 605+ 9606 C9                                   ret
 606+ 9607
 607+ 9607
 608+ 9607 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 609+ 960A 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 610+ 960D C9                                   ret

 612+ 960E
 613+ 960E              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 614+ 960E ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 615+ 960E ~                                    ex      de,hl
 616+ 960E ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 617+ 960E ~                                    ex      de,hl
 618+ 960E ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 619+ 960E ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 620+ 960E ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 621+ 960E ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 622+ 960E ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 623+ 960E ~                                    ex      de,hl
 624+ 960E ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 625+ 960E ~                                    ex      de,hl
 626+ 960E ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 627+ 960E ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 628+ 960E ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 629+ 960E ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 630+ 960E                                      ENDM

 648+ 9737 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 649+ 973A              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 649+ 973A CB 25       >			   sla l
 649+ 973C CB 14       >			   rl  h
 650+ 973E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 651+ 973F 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 652+ 9741                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 652+ 9741 B9          >                        cp      c
 652+ 9742 DA 4D 97    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 653+ 9745 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 654+ 9746 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 655+ 9747 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 656+ 9748 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 657+ 9749 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 658+ 974B 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 659+ 974C 3F                                   ccf
 660+ 974D              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 660+ 974D CB 13       >               rl  e
 660+ 974F CB 12       >               rl  d
 661+ 9751 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 662+ 9753 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 663+ 9754 C9                                   ret
