 665+ 9755
 666+ 9755 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 667+ 9756 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 668+ 9758 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 669+ 9759 17                                   rla
 670+ 975A 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 671+ 975C B9                                   cp	c
 672+ 975D 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 673+ 975F 91                                   sub	c
 674+ 9760 2C                                   inc	l
 675+ 9761 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 676+ 9763 C9                                   ret
 677+ 9764              ;l_div, signed division
 678+ 9764              ; comes in with DE and HL
 679+ 9764              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 680+ 9764 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 681+ 9765 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 682+ 9766 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 683+ 9767 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 684+ 9768 7A                                   ld      a,d
 685+ 9769 B7                                   or      a
 686+ 976A F2 73 97                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 687+ 976D              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 687+ 976D AF          >					xor 	a
 687+ 976E 93          >                    sub 	e
 687+ 976F 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 687+ 9770 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 687+ 9771 92          >                    sub 	d
 687+ 9772 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 688+ 9773 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 689+ 9774 B7                                   or      a
 690+ 9775 F2 7E 97                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 691+ 9778                                      macronegate16bc
 691+ 9778 AF          >					xor 	a
 691+ 9779 91          >                    sub 	c
 691+ 977A 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 691+ 977B 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 691+ 977C 90          >                    sub 	b
 691+ 977D 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 692+ 977E CD 0E 96     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 693+ 9781                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 694+ 9781 C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 695+ 9782 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ 9783 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 697+ 9784 F2 8D 97                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 698+ 9787                                      macronegate16hl
 698+ 9787 AF          >					xor 	a
 698+ 9788 95          >					sub 	l
 698+ 9789 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 698+ 978A 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 698+ 978B 94          >					sub 	h
 698+ 978C 67          >					ld 		h,a
 699+ 978D 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 700+ 978E B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 701+ 978F F0                                   ret     p
 702+ 9790                                      macronegate16de
 702+ 9790 AF          >					xor 	a
 702+ 9791 93          >                    sub 	e
 702+ 9792 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 702+ 9793 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 702+ 9794 92          >                    sub 	d
 702+ 9795 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 703+ 9796 C9                                   ret
 704+ 9797
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1190  9797                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9797              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9797              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9797              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9797 F5           	push af
   5+ 9798 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 979A 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 979B 3A 96 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 979E 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 979F 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 97A0 BB           	cp e
  11+ 97A1 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 97A3 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 97A5 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 97A7 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 97A8 3A 96 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 97AB 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 97AC CD 04 95     	call asm_div16
  18+ 97AF F1           	pop af
  19+ 97B0 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 97B2 B5           	or l
  21+ 97B3 C9           	ret
  22+ 97B4              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 97B4 F1           	pop af
  24+ 97B5 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 97B7 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 97B9 C9           	ret
  27+ 97BA
  28+ 97BA
  29+ 97BA              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 97BA              squareregfx:
  31+ 97BA 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 97BD 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 97BE 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 97BF ED 30        	mul
  35+ 97C1 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 97C2              squareregfy:
  37+ 97C2 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 97C5 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 97C6 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 97C7 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 97C9 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 97CA              squareregfz:
  43+ 97CA 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 97CD 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 97CE 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 97CF ED 30        	mul
  47+ 97D1 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 97D2 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 97D3              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 97D3 CD 7B 91     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 97D6 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 97D7 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 97D8 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 97D9              normfx:
  55+ 97D9 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 97DC E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 97DD 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 97DE 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 97DF CD 97 97     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 97E2 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 97E5              normfy:
  62+ 97E5 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 97E8 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 97E9 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 97EA 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 97EB CD 97 97     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 97EE 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 97F1              normfz:
  69+ 97F1 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 97F4 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 97F5 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 97F6 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 97F7 CD 97 97     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 97FA 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 97FD              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 97FD C9           	ret
  77+ 97FE
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1191  97FE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 97FE              ; Input:
   2+ 97FE              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 97FE              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 97FE              ; Output:
   5+ 97FE              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 97FE              ;
   7+ 97FE              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 97FE              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 97FE              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 97FE              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 97FE              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 97FE              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 97FE              ;
  14+ 97FE
  15+ 97FE
  16+ 97FE E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 97FF A7                               and     a
  18+ 9800 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9802 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 9804 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9805 C9                               ret
  22+ 9806
  23+ 9806 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9807 A7                               and     a
  25+ 9808 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 980A ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 980C E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 980D C9                               ret
  29+ 980E
  30+ 980E
  31+ 980E              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 980E              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 980E 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 980F AA                               xor d
  35+ 9810 FA 1A 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 9813 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9815 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9817 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9818                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9818 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9819 C9                               ret
  41+ 981A CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 981C 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 981E              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 981E B7          >                        or a
  44+ 981F C9                               ret
  45+ 9820 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 9821                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 9821 B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9822 C9                               ret
  48+ 9823              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 9823 37          >                        scf
  49+ 9824 C9                               ret
  50+ 9825
  51+ 9825              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9825 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 9826 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9827 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9828 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9829 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 982A C9                               ret
  58+ 982B
  59+ 982B
  60+ 982B
  61+ 982B 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 982C A8                               xor b
  63+ 982D FA 36 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 9830 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9832 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 9834              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 9834 37          >                        scf
  67+ 9835 C9                               ret
  68+ 9836 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 9838 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 983A              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 983A B7          >                        or a
  71+ 983B C9                               ret
  72+ 983C
  73+ 983C              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 983C E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 983D A7                               and     a
  76+ 983E ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 9840 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 9841 C9                               ret
  79+ 9842              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 9842 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 9843 A7                               and     a
  82+ 9844 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 9846 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 9847 C9                               ret
  85+ 9848
  86+ 9848              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 9848              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 9848
  89+ 9848 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 984A 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 984B E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 984D 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 984E 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 984F E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 9851 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9852 A7                               and     a
  97+ 9853 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 9855 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 9857 C9                               ret
 100+ 9858
 101+ 9858
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1192  9858                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9858              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9858
   3+ 9858
   4+ 9858 DD 7E 00     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+0)	        ; XX15+0
   5+ 985B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   6+ 985D              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   6+ 985D 5F          >			ld	e,a
   6+ 985E 57          >			ld  d,a
   6+ 985F ED 30       >			mul
   7+ 9861 62 6B                                ld		hl,de		 		; h == varR d = varO e= varA
   8+ 9863 DD 7E 01     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(ix+1)
   9+ 9866 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; = abs
  10+ 9868                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  10+ 9868 5F          >			ld	e,a
  10+ 9869 57          >			ld  d,a
  10+ 986A ED 30       >			mul
  11+ 986C 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  12+ 986D DD 7E 02     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(ix+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  13+ 9870 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  14+ 9872                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  14+ 9872 5F          >			ld	e,a
  14+ 9873 57          >			ld  d,a
  14+ 9874 ED 30       >			mul
  15+ 9876 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  16+ 9877 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  17+ 9878 CD 7B 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  18+ 987B DD 7E 00     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+0)
  19+ 987E 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  20+ 987F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  21+ 9881 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  22+ 9882 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  23+ 9885 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  24+ 9886 79                                   ld      a,c
  25+ 9887 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  26+ 9889 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  27+ 988A DD 77 00                             ld		(ix+0),a
  28+ 988D DD 7E 01     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  29+ 9890 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  30+ 9891 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  31+ 9893 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  32+ 9894 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  33+ 9897 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  34+ 9898 79                                   ld      a,c
  35+ 9899 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  36+ 989B B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  37+ 989C DD 77 01                             ld		(ix+1),a
  38+ 989F DD 7E 02     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+2)
  39+ 98A2 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  40+ 98A3 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  41+ 98A5 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  42+ 98A6 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  43+ 98A9 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  44+ 98AA 79                                   ld      a,c
  45+ 98AB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  46+ 98AD B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  47+ 98AE DD 77 02                             ld		(ix+2),a
  48+ 98B1 C9                                   ret
  49+ 98B2
  50+ 98B2              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  51+ 98B2 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  52+ 98B5 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  53+ 98B7 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  54+ 98B9              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  54+ 98B9 5F          >			ld	e,a
  54+ 98BA 57          >			ld  d,a
  54+ 98BB ED 30       >			mul
  55+ 98BD 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  56+ 98BE 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  57+ 98BF 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  58+ 98C2 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  59+ 98C4 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  60+ 98C6                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  60+ 98C6 5F          >			ld	e,a
  60+ 98C7 57          >			ld  d,a
  60+ 98C8 ED 30       >			mul
  61+ 98CA 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  62+ 98CB 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  63+ 98CE FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  64+ 98D0 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  65+ 98D2                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  65+ 98D2 5F          >			ld	e,a
  65+ 98D3 57          >			ld  d,a
  65+ 98D4 ED 30       >			mul
  66+ 98D6 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  67+ 98D7 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  68+ 98D8 CD 7B 91     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  69+ 98DB 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 98DE E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  71+ 98E0 4F                                   ld		c,a
  72+ 98E1 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  73+ 98E2 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  74+ 98E5 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  75+ 98E6 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  76+ 98E8 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  77+ 98EA B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  78+ 98EB 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  79+ 98EE 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  80+ 98F1 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  81+ 98F3 4F                                   ld		c,a
  82+ 98F4 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  83+ 98F5 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  84+ 98F8 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  85+ 98F9 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  86+ 98FB E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  87+ 98FD B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  88+ 98FE 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  89+ 9901 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  90+ 9904 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  91+ 9906 4F                                   ld		c,a
  92+ 9907 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  93+ 9908 CD 75 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  94+ 990B 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  95+ 990C FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  96+ 990E E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  97+ 9910 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  98+ 9911 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  99+ 9914 C9                                   ret
 100+ 9915
 101+ 9915              ; Normalise vector
 102+ 9915              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
 103+ 9915              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
 104+ 9915              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
 105+ 9915              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
 106+ 9915
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1193  9915                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9915              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9915              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9915              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9915              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9915              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9915              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9915              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9915 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9918 CD 2E 99     	call	Num1
  10+ 991B 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 991E CD 2E 99     	call	Num1
  12+ 9921 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9924 CD 2E 99     	call	Num1
  14+ 9927 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9929 CD 2E 99     	call	Num1
  16+ 992C 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 992E              Num1:
  18+ 992E 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9930              .Num2:
  20+ 9930 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9931 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9932 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9934 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9936 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9937 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9938 C9           	ret
  27+ 9939
  28+ 9939              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9939 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 993B 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 993C C3 15 99     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 993F
  33+ 993F              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 993F 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9941 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9942 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9945 CD 55 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9948 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 994A CD 2E 99     	call	Num1
  40+ 994D 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 994F                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 994F 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9950 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9951 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 9953 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 9955              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 9955 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9957              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9957 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9958 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9959 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 995B FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 995D 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 995F              .Blank:
  55+ 995F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9961              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9961 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 9963 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 9964 13           	inc	de
  60+ 9965 C9           	ret
  61+ 9966
  62+ 9966              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 9966 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9968 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 996A 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 996C 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 996D 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9970 CD 7C 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 9973 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 9975 CD 7C 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9978 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 997A 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 997C              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 997C 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 997E              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 997E 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 997F 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9980 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 9982 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 9984 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 9986              .Blank:
  82+ 9986 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9988              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9988 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 998A 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 998B 13           	inc	de
  87+ 998C C9           	ret
  88+ 998D              .NoStock:
  89+ 998D 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 998F 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9990 13           	inc	de
  92+ 9991 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 9992 13           	inc	de
  94+ 9993 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 9995 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 9996 13           	inc de
  97+ 9997 C9           	ret
  98+ 9998
  99+ 9998
 100+ 9998              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 9998              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 9998              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 9998              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 9998 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 999C 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 99A0 64 00 00 00
 104+ 99A4 E8 03 00 00
 104+ 99A8 10 27 00 00
 105+ 99AC A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 105+ 99B0 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 99B4 80 96 98 00
 105+ 99B8 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 99BC 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 99C0 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 99C4
 108+ 99C4              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 99C4 CD D3 99     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 99C7 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 99CA FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 99CD 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 99CF FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 99D2 C9                                   ret
 115+ 99D3
 116+ 99D3 DD 22 C0 99  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 117+ 99D7 ED 53 C2 99                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 118+ 99DB DD 21 BC 99                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 119+ 99DF 06 09                                ld b,9
 120+ 99E1 0E 00                                ld c,0
 121+ 99E3 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 122+ 99E5 B7                                   or a
 123+ 99E6 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 124+ 99E9 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 125+ 99EC 2A C0 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 126+ 99EF ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 99F1 22 C0 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 99F4 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 99F7 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 99FA 2A C2 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 99FD ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 99FF 22 C2 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 133+ 9A02 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 134+ 9A04 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9A05 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9A06 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9A08 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 138+ 9A0B DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 139+ 9A0E 2A C0 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)

 141+ 9A12 22 C0 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9A15 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9A18 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9A1B 2A C2 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9A1E ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9A20 22 C2 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9A23 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4

 150+ 9A29 0D                                   dec c

 152+ 9A2C FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a

1194  9A40                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9A40              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9A40 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9A41 D2 5C 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9A44 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9A46 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9A48                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9A48 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9A49 DA 5F 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9A4C 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9A4D 37                                   scf
   7+ 9A4E CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9A50 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9A52 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9A53 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9A55 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9A57 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9A58 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9A5A 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9A5B C9                                   ret
  16+ 9A5C 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9A5E C9                                   ret
  18+ 9A5F B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9A60 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9A62 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9A64 C3 52 9A                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9A67
  23+ 9A67
  24+ 9A67              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9A67              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9A67              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9A67 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9A69 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9A6B ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9A6D CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9A6F              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9A6F              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9A6F              TIS2:
  34+ 9A6F 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9A70 3A 96 7E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9A73 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9A74 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9A75              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9A75 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9A76 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9A77 CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9A79 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9A7B              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9A7B B7               or          a
  45+ 9A7C CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9A7E
  47+ 9A7E 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9A7F E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9A81 CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9A83 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9A84 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9A85 E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9A87 B0               or          b
  54+ 9A88 C3 8C 9A         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9A8B              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9A8B 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9A8C              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9A8C 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9A8D E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9A8F              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9A8F BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9A90 D2 B0 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9A93 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9A95              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9A95 CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9A97              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9A97 BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9A98 DA B6 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9A9B 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9A9C 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9A9D CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9A9F 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9AA1              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9AA1 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9AA2 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9AA4 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9AA6 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9AA7 CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9AA9 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9AAA 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9AAB 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9AAC E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9AAE B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9AAF C9           	ret
  81+ 9AB0              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9AB0              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9AB0 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9AB1 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9AB3 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9AB5 C9           	ret
  87+ 9AB6              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9AB6              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9AB6 B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9AB7 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9AB9 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9ABB C3 A1 9A     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9ABE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1195  9ABE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"

   1+ 9ABE              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9ABE              fmltu:
   3+ 9ABE 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9ABF 3A 96 7E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9AC2 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9AC3 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9AC5 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9AC6 C9                                   ret
   9+ 9AC7
  10+ 9AC7 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9AC8 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9ACA 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9ACB C9                                   ret

1196  9ACC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9ACC              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9ACC              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9ACC 21 42 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9ACF FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9AD1 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9AD3 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9AD4 C3 E0 9A     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9AD7              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9AD7 21 42 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9ADA 3A 81 7D     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9ADD ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9ADF 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9AE0              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9AE0 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9AE1 3A 90 7E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9AE4              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9AE4 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9AE6 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9AE8 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9AE9 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9AEA              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9AEA CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9AEC 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9AEE BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9AEF 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9AF1              DV8:
  27+ 9AF1 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9AF2 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9AF3              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9AF3 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9AF5 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9AF7              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9AF7              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9AF7 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9AF9 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9AFA              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9AFA CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9AFC 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9AFE B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9AFF 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9B01              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9B01 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9B02              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9B02 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9B04 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9B06 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9B07 32 97 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9B0A 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9B0B 32 97 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9B0E C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9B0F              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9B0F 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9B10 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9B11 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9B13 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9B15 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9B16 32 97 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9B19 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9B1A 32 97 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9B1D C9           		ret
  61+ 9B1E              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9B1E 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9B20 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9B21 32 97 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9B24 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9B25 32 97 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9B28 C9           		ret
  68+ 9B29
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1197  9B29              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm" Moved to general multiply code
1198  9B29
1199  9B29                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9B29              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9B29              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9B29              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9B29 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9B2B 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9B2D 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9B2E 3A 96 7E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9B31 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9B32 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9B34 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9B36 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9B37 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9B39 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9B3A 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9B3B E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9B3D 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9B3E 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9B3F E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9B41 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9B42 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9B44 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9B45 32 97 7D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9B48 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9B49 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9B4A 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9B4B C9           	ret
  27+ 9B4C              .mul0:
  28+ 9B4C AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9B4D 32 97 7D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9B50 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9B51 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9B52 C9           	ret
  33+ 9B53
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1200  9B53                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9B53              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9B53              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9B53              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9B53              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9B53              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9B53              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9B53              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9B53              LL38:
   9+ 9B53              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9B53              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9B53              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9B53              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9B53              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9B53              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9B53              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9B53              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9B53              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9B53              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9B53              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9B53              ;	ret
  21+ 9B53              ; calculation table
  22+ 9B53              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9B53              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9B53              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9B53              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9B53              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9B53              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9B53              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9B53              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9B53              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9B53
  32+ 9B53              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9B53              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9B53              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9B53              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9B53
  37+ 9B53
  38+ 9B53              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9B53 21 98 7E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9B56 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9B57 FA 62 9B     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9B5A 3A 96 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9B5D 21 97 7E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9B60 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9B61 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9B62              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9B62 3A 97 7E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9B65 21 96 7E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9B68              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9B68              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9B68 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9B69 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9B6A 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9B6C              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9B6C              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9B6C              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9B6C C9           	ret
  57+ 9B6D              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9B6D FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9B6F 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9B71 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9B73 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9B74 3A 98 7E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9B77 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9B79 32 98 7E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9B7C 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9B7D                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9B7D B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9B7E C9           	ret
  68+ 9B7F              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9B7F 32 98 7E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9B82                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9B82 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9B83 C9               ret
  72+ 9B84              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9B84              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9B84              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9B84              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9B84              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9B84              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9B84              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9B84              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9B84              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9B84              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9B84              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9B84              ;--	ret
  84+ 9B84
  85+ 9B84              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9B84              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9B84              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9B84              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9B84              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9B84              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9B84              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9B84              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9B84              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9B84              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9B84              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9B84              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9B84              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9B84              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9B84              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9B84              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9B84              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9B84              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9B84              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9B84              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9B84              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9B84              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9B84              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9B84              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9B84              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9B84              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9B84              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9B84              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9B84              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9B84              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9B84              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9B84              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9B84              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9B84              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9B84              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9B84              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9B84              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9B84              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9B84              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9B84              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9B84
 142+ 9B84
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

1203  9B84                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9B84              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9B84              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9B84              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9B84              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9B84              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9B84              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9B84              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9B84              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9B84              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9B84              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9B84              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9B84              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9B84              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9B84              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9B84              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9B84              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9B84              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9B84              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9B84              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9B84              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9B84              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9B84              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9B84              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9B84              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9B84              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9B84              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9B84              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9B84              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9B84              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9B84
  40+ 9B84              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9B84 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9B85 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9B86 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9B88              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9B88 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9B89 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9B8A C8             ret z
  48+ 9B8B 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9B8E 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9B90              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9B90 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9B92 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9B93 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9B95 C9             ret
  55+ 9B96
  56+ 9B96              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9B96              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9B96              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9B96              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9B96 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9B98 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9B99              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9B99 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9B9A 17                   rla
  65+ 9B9B B9                   cp c
  66+ 9B9C 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9B9E 91                   sub c
  68+ 9B9F 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9BA0              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9BA0 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9BA2 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9BA3 32 97 7E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9BA6 C9                   ret
  74+ 9BA7
  75+ 9BA7
  76+ 9BA7
  77+ 9BA7              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9BA7              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9BA7              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9BA7 F5           		push	af
  81+ 9BA8 3A 96 7E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9BAB 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9BAC F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9BAD FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9BAF CA C6 9B     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9BB2              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9BB2 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9BB4 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9BB5              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9BB5 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9BB7 AF           		xor a
  92+ 9BB8              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9BB8 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9BB9 17           		rla
  95+ 9BBA B9           		cp c
  96+ 9BBB 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9BBD 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9BBE 91           		sub c
  99+ 9BBF              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9BBF 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9BC1 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9BC2 32 97 7E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9BC5 C9           		ret
 104+ 9BC6              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9BC6 32 97 7E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9BC9 C9           		ret
 107+ 9BCA              ;	push	af
 108+ 9BCA              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9BCA              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9BCA              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9BCA              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9BCA              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9BCA              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9BCA              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9BCA              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9BCA              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9BCA              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9BCA              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9BCA              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9BCA              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9BCA              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9BCA              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9BCA              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9BCA              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9BCA              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9BCA              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9BCA              ;	scf
 128+ 9BCA              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9BCA              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9BCA              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9BCA              ;LL2:
 132+ 9BCA              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9BCA              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9BCA              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9BCA              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9BCA              ;	ret
 137+ 9BCA
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1204  9BCA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9BCA              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9BCA              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9BCA              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9BCA 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9BCB 3A 96 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9BCE FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9BD0 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9BD2 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9BD3 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9BD5 AF               xor a
  11+ 9BD6              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9BD6 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9BD8 17               rla
  14+ 9BD9 BA               cp d
  15+ 9BDA 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9BDC 0C               inc c
  17+ 9BDD 92               sub d
  18+ 9BDE              LL64:
  19+ 9BDE 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9BE0 32 95 7E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9BE3 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9BE4 32 97 7E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9BE7 C9               ret
  24+ 9BE8              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9BE8 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9BEA 32 97 7E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9BED 32 95 7E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9BF0 C9           	ret
  29+ 9BF1
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
1205  9BF1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9BF1              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9BF1              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9BF1              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9BF1 CD 29 9B     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9BF4 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9BF5 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9BF6 32 98 7E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9BF9 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9BFA 32 97 7E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9BFD 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9BFE C9           	ret

   1+ 9C8F              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9C8F              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ 9C8F              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ 9C8F              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9C8F              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ 9C8F              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14
   7+ 9C8F              ;rotmap1xLo: DB	0				; INWK +15
   8+ 9C8F              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ 9C8F              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ 9C8F              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ 9C8F              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ 9C8F              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ 9C8F              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ 9C8F              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22

  19+ 9C8F              ;
  20+ 9C8F              ;rotmatFx	equ	rotmat0xHi

  27+ 9C8F              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ 9C8F
  29+ 9C8F
  30+ 9C8F
  31+ 9C8F
  32+ 9C8F              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9C8F
  34+ 9C8F              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9C8F              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9C8F              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9C8F
  38+ 9C8F
  39+ 9C8F 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9C92 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9C95 E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9C97 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9C99 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9C9A 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9C9B ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9C9D 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9C9F 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9CA0 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9CA2 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9CA4 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9CA5 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9CA6 ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9CA8 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9CA9 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9CAA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9CAC DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9CAE 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9CAF 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9CB0 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9CB2 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9CB3 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9CB4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9CB5 CD 7B 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9CB8 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9CB9 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9CBB DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9CBD CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9CC0 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9CC1 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9CC4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9CC6 B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9CC7 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9CCA DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9CCC 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9CCD CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9CD0 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9CD1 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9CD4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9CD6 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9CD7 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9CDA FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9CDC 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9CDD CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9CE0 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9CE1 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9CE4 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9CE6 B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9CE7 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9CEA C9                                   ret
  90+ 9CEB
  91+ 9CEB              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9CEB ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9CEB ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9CEB ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9CEB                                      ENDM
  96+ 9CEB              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9CEB ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9CEB ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9CEB ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9CEB                                      ENDM

 104+ 9CEE CD 8F 9C    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ 9CF1 CD 38 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .

 110+ 9D01 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9D03              ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 112+ 9D03 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ 9D06 32 96 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y

 120+ 9D1B 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ 9D1C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ 9D1E 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ 9D1F 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ 9D22 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ 9D25 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ 9D26 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ 9D28 B3                                   or      e
 128+ 9D29 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ 9D2B 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ 9D2D                                      ZeroA
 130+ 9D2D AF          >                        xor a
 131+ 9D2E C3 8B 9D                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ 9D31 FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0

 142+ 9D44 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ 9D47 C3 D5 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof

 175+ 9D8B 32 34 C0     .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 176+ 9D8E C3 D5 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ 9D91              ;...roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 178+ 9D91 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ 9D94 32 96 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y

 209+ 9DDB CD 55 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9DDE              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9DDE 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9DE1 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9DE3 32 96 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9DE6 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ 9DE9 CD F1 9B                             call	RSequQmulA

 218+ 9DF2 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ 9DF5 CD F0 8F                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9DF8 CD C5 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9DFB 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9DFC 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9DFF              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9DFF 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ 9E02 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ 9E04 32 96 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9E07 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z

 229+ 9E0D 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z

 247+ 9E3D 78                                   ld      a,b

 254+ 9E4C
 255+ 9E4C
 256+ 9E4C              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9E4C              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9E4C              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9E4C 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9E4D 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9E4E 32 96 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9E51 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9E52 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9E54 CD CE 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9E57              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9E57              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9E57              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9E57 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9E58 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9E5A 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9E5B 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9E5C E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9E5E 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9E60              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9E60 CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9E62              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9E62 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9E64 DA 71 9E    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9E67 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9E69 37           		scf
 279+ 9E6A CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9E6C 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9E6E              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9E6E 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9E6F B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9E70 C9           		ret
 285+ 9E71              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9E71 B7           	or			a
 287+ 9E72 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9E74 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9E76 C3 6E 9E     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9E79
 291+ 9E79              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9E79              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz

 307+ 9E87 E6 60        		and		%01100000
 308+ 9E89 CA 79 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall

 311+ 9E90 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 312+ 9E93 CD 68 9F     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
