 329+ 9EAD              .RotXIsBig:
 330+ 9EAD CD 2E 9F             call	CalcRoofvX
 331+ 9EB0 32 30 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 332+ 9EB3              NormaliseRoofV:
 333+ 9EB3 CD 12 9C     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 334+ 9EB6 CD B2 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 335+ 9EB9              ;calc sidev x
 336+ 9EB9 CD 55 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 337+ 9EBC 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 338+ 9EBF 32 96 7E     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 339+ 9EC2 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 340+ 9EC5 CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 341+ 9EC8 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 342+ 9ECB 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 343+ 9ECC 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 344+ 9ECF CD 4C 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 345+ 9ED2                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ 9ED2 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 345+ 9ED3 CA D8 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 346+ 9ED6 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 347+ 9ED8              NormSideXNoNeg:
 348+ 9ED8 32 2A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 349+ 9EDB              ;calc sidev y
 350+ 9EDB 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 351+ 9EDE 32 96 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 352+ 9EE1 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 353+ 9EE4 CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 354+ 9EE7 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 355+ 9EEA 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 356+ 9EEB 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 357+ 9EEE CD 4C 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 358+ 9EF1                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 358+ 9EF1 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 358+ 9EF2 CA F7 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 359+ 9EF5 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 360+ 9EF7              NormSideYNoNeg:
 361+ 9EF7 32 38 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 362+ 9EFA              ;calc sidev z
 363+ 9EFA 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 364+ 9EFD 32 96 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 365+ 9F00 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 366+ 9F03 CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 367+ 9F06 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 368+ 9F09 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 369+ 9F0A 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 370+ 9F0D CD 4C 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 371+ 9F10                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ 9F10 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 371+ 9F11 CA 16 9F    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 372+ 9F14 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 373+ 9F16              NormSideZNoNeg:
 374+ 9F16 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 375+ 9F19              .ClearLoBytes:
 376+ 9F19 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 377+ 9F1C 06 09        		ld		b,9
 378+ 9F1E AF                   xor     a
 379+ 9F1F              .ClearLoLoop:
 380+ 9F1F 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 381+ 9F20 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9F21 23           		inc		hl
 383+ 9F22 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 384+ 9F24 CD 25 9C     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ 9F27 CD B2 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 386+ 9F2A              ;calc sidev x
 387+ 9F2A CD 72 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 388+ 9F2D
 389+ 9F2D C9           		ret
 390+ 9F2E
 391+ 9F2E
 392+ 9F2E              CalcRoofvX:
 393+ 9F2E              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 394+ 9F2E              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 394+ 9F2E 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 394+ 9F31 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 395+ 9F34 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 396+ 9F37 CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 397+ 9F3A              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 397+ 9F3A 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 397+ 9F3D 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 398+ 9F40 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 399+ 9F43 CD CE 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 400+ 9F46 7A           		ld		a,d
 401+ 9F47 E6 80        		and 	$80
 402+ 9F49 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 403+ 9F4B              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 404+ 9F4B 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 405+ 9F4E 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 406+ 9F4F E6 80        		and		$80
 407+ 9F51 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 408+ 9F53 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 409+ 9F55 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 410+ 9F56 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 411+ 9F58 42           		ld		b,d
 412+ 9F59 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 413+ 9F5A 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 414+ 9F5B 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 415+ 9F5D CD 52 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 416+ 9F60 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 417+ 9F62 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 418+ 9F64 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 419+ 9F66 B0           		or		b
 420+ 9F67 C9           		ret
 421+ 9F68
 422+ 9F68
 423+ 9F68              CalcRoofvY:
 424+ 9F68              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 425+ 9F68              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 425+ 9F68 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 425+ 9F6B 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 426+ 9F6E 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 427+ 9F71 CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 428+ 9F74              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 428+ 9F74 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 428+ 9F77 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 429+ 9F7A 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 430+ 9F7D CD CE 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 431+ 9F80 7A           		ld		a,d
 432+ 9F81 E6 80        		and 	$80
 433+ 9F83 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 434+ 9F85 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 435+ 9F88 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 436+ 9F89 E6 80        		and		$80
 437+ 9F8B FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 438+ 9F8D FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 439+ 9F8F 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 440+ 9F90 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 441+ 9F92 42           		ld		b,d
 442+ 9F93 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 443+ 9F94 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 444+ 9F95 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 445+ 9F97 CD 52 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 446+ 9F9A FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 447+ 9F9C EE 80        		xor		$80
 448+ 9F9E E6 80        		and		$80
 449+ 9FA0 B0           		or		b
 450+ 9FA1 C9           		ret
 451+ 9FA2
 452+ 9FA2              CalcRoofvZ:
 453+ 9FA2              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 454+ 9FA2              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 454+ 9FA2 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 454+ 9FA5 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 455+ 9FA8 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 456+ 9FAB CD F1 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 457+ 9FAE              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 457+ 9FAE 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 457+ 9FB1 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 458+ 9FB4 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 459+ 9FB7 CD CE 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 460+ 9FBA 7A           		ld		a,d
 461+ 9FBB E6 80        		and 	$80
 462+ 9FBD FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 463+ 9FBF 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 464+ 9FC2 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 465+ 9FC3 E6 80        		and		$80
 466+ 9FC5 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 467+ 9FC7 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 468+ 9FC9 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 469+ 9FCA E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 470+ 9FCC 42           		ld		b,d
 471+ 9FCD 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 472+ 9FCE 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 473+ 9FCF 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 474+ 9FD1 CD 52 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 475+ 9FD4 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 476+ 9FD6 EE 80        		xor		$80
 477+ 9FD8 E6 80        		and		$80
 478+ 9FDA B0           		or		b
 479+ 9FDB C9           		ret
 480+ 9FDC
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1210  9FDC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ 9FDC
   2+ 9FDC              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ 9FDC BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ 9FDD D2 FB 9F    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ 9FE0 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ 9FE2 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ 9FE4 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ 9FE6                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ 9FE6 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ 9FE7 DA EC 9F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ 9FEA 92                                   sub     d
   8+ 9FEB                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ 9FEB B7          >                        or a
   9+ 9FEC 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ 9FED CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ 9FEF 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ 9FF1 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ 9FF2 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9FF3 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ 9FF4 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ 9FF5 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ 9FF7 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ 9FF9 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ 9FFA C9                                   ret
  20+ 9FFB 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ 9FFD C9                                   ret
  22+ 9FFE
  23+ 9FFE              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
  24+ 9FFE              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
  25+ 9FFE              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
  26+ 9FFE              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
  27+ 9FFE              ;               a     a
  28+ 9FFE              ;               b     x
  29+ 9FFE              ;               c     q
  30+ 9FFE              ;               d     r
  31+ 9FFE              ;
  32+ 9FFE 21 B6 F1     LL28Amul256DivD_6502:   ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  33+ A001 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  34+ A002 B9                                   cp      c
  35+ A003                                      FlipCarryFlag
  35+ A003 3F          >                        ccf
  36+ A004 DA 2C A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  37+ A007 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  38+ A009 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  39+ A00B DA 20 A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  40+ A00E                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  40+ A00E 3F          >                        ccf
  41+ A00F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  41+ A00F B9          >                        cp      c
  41+ A010 DA 15 A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  42+ A013                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  43+ A013 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  44+ A014                                      ClearCarryFlag
  44+ A014 B7          >                        or a
  45+ A015              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  45+ A015 3F          >                        ccf
  46+ A016 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  47+ A018 DA 09 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  48+ A01B 78                                   ld      a,b
  49+ A01C 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  50+ A01F C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  51+ A020 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  52+ A021                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  52+ A021 37          >                        scf
  53+ A022 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  54+ A024 DA 09 A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  55+ A027 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  56+ A028 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  57+ A02B C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  58+ A02C 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  59+ A02E 32 B7 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  60+ A031                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  60+ A031 37          >                        scf
  61+ A032 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  62+ A033
  63+ A033
  64+ A033 21 96 7E     LL28Amul256DivQ_6502:   ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  65+ A036 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  66+ A037 B9                                   cp      c
  67+ A038                                      FlipCarryFlag
  67+ A038 3F          >                        ccf
  68+ A039 DA 61 A0                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  69+ A03C 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  70+ A03E CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  71+ A040 DA 55 A0                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  72+ A043                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  72+ A043 3F          >                        ccf
  73+ A044                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  73+ A044 B9          >                        cp      c
  73+ A045 DA 4A A0    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  74+ A048                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  75+ A048 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  76+ A049                                      ClearCarryFlag
  76+ A049 B7          >                        or a
  77+ A04A              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  77+ A04A 3F          >                        ccf
  78+ A04B CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  79+ A04D DA 3E A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  80+ A050 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ A051 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  82+ A054 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  83+ A055 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  84+ A056                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  84+ A056 37          >                        scf
  85+ A057 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  86+ A059 DA 3E A0                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  87+ A05C 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  88+ A05D 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  89+ A060 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  90+ A061 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  91+ A063 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  92+ A066                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  92+ A066 37          >                        scf
  93+ A067 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  94+ A068
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1211  A068                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A068              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A068              TIS1:
   3+ A068 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A069 3A 80 7D     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A06C 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A06D 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A06E              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A06E 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A06F 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A070 32 96 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A073 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A074 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A076 CD CE 8F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A079              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A079              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A079              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A079 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A07A E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A07C 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A07D 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A07E E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A080 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A082 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A083              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A083 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A085 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A087 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A089 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A08B              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A08B CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A08D 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A08F 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A090 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A091 C9           		ret
  35+ A092
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  50+ A0B5 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  50+ A0B7 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  51+ A0B8 21 92 A0                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  52+ A0BB ED 31                               add      hl,a
  53+ A0BD ED 31                               add      hl,a
  54+ A0BF 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  55+ A0C0 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  56+ A0C1 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  57+ A0C2 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  58+ A0C3 E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  59+ A0C4 C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this

  72+ A0CA              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  73+ A0CA ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  74+ A0CA                                      ENDIF
  75+ A0CA 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  76+ A0CD 47                                   ld      b,a
  77+ A0CE E6 02                                and     %00000010
  78+ A0D0 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  79+ A0D2 78                                   ld      a,b
  80+ A0D3 E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  81+ A0D5 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  82+ A0D8 B6                                   or      (hl)
  83+ A0D9 47                                   ld      b,a
  84+ A0DA 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  85+ A0DD E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  86+ A0DF B0                                   or      b
  87+ A0E0 47                                   ld      b,a
  88+ A0E1 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  89+ A0E4                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  89+ A0E4 FE 40       >                        cp      64
  89+ A0E6 DA ED A0    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  90+ A0E9 78                                   ld      a,b
  91+ A0EA F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  92+ A0EC 47                                   ld      b,a
  93+ A0ED 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  94+ A0EE 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  95+ A0F1 C9                                   ret
  96+ A0F2 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  97+ A0F4 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  98+ A0F7 C9                                   ret
  99+ A0F8              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 100+ A0F8              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 101+ A0F8 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 102+ A0FB                                      ;break
 103+ A0FB                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 103+ A0FB 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 103+ A0FE FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 103+ A100 CA 1F A1    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile

 106+ A108 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data

 107+ A10B CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 107+ A10D C8          >                        ret		z
 108+ A10E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 109+ A10F                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 109+ A10F 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 109+ A111 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a

 111+ A116 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .

 157+ A171              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 158+ A171              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
 158+ A171 AF          >                        xor a
 159+ A172 32 68 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 160+ A175 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
 161+ A178 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
 162+ A17B 11 6F 7F                             ld      de,MissileXPos
 163+ A17E ED B0                                ldir

 168+ A18A C9                                   ret
 169+ A18B
 170+ A18B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 171+ A18B              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 172+ A18B ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 173+ A18B ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 174+ A18B ~                                    xor     (hl)
 175+ A18B ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 176+ A18B ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 177+ A18B ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 178+ A18B ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 179+ A18B ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 180+ A18B ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 181+ A18B ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 182+ A18B ~                                    NegHL
 183+ A18B ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 184+ A18B ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 185+ A18B ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 186+ A18B ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 187+ A18B ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 188+ A18B ~                                    ld      a,l
 189+ A18B ~                                    and     a
 190+ A18B ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 191+ A18B                                      ENDM
 192+ A18B              ;...................................................................
 193+ A18B              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 194+ A18B 3A 68 80     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 195+ A18E                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A18E FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 195+ A190 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 196+ A191 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 197+ A193 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 198+ A194 32 68 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 199+ A197                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 199+ A197 21 6A 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 199+ A19A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 199+ A19C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 199+ A19D 3C          >                        inc     a
 199+ A19E C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 199+ A19F 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 200+ A1A0 CD C2 83                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 201+ A1A3 D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic

 204+ A1A9                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 204+ A1A9 C0          >                        ret     nz

 206+ A1AD FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type

 208+ A1B1                                      MMUSelectUniverseA

 208+ A1B3 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a

 209+ A1C8 A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
 209+ A1C9 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 209+ A1CB             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 209+ A1CB F2 D9 A1    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 209+ A1CE             >                        NegHL
 209+ A1CE AF          >                    xor a
 209+ A1CF 95          >                    sub l
 209+ A1D0 6F          >                    ld l,a

 209+ A1D4 C3 D9 A1    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
 209+ A1D7 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 209+ A1D8             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 209+ A1D8 F8          >                        ret     m

 250+ A275                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 250+ A275 C0          >                        ret     nz
 251+ A276 7D                                   ld      a,l
 252+ A277                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if z far
 252+ A277 B9          >                        cp    c
 252+ A278 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 253+ A279              .ItsAHit:               SetCarryFlag                                ; So must have hit
 253+ A279 37          >                        scf
 254+ A27A C9                                   ret

 258+ A27B ~                                    MMUSelectUnivBankA
 259+ A27B                                      ENDM

 263+ A27B ~                                    MMUSelectUnivBankA

 112++A407 47                                   ld      b,a
 113++A408 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 114++A40B 22 C8 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 115++A40E 32 CA A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 116++A411              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 117++A411              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A411              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A411 2A C1 A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A414 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A415 ED 5B C5 A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A419 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A41A ED 4B C9 A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A41E B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A41F                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A41F E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A421                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A421 C2 30 A4    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A424 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A425 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A426 B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A427                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A427 C2 30 A4    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A42A                                      ELSE
 132++A42A ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A42A                                      ENDIF
 134++A42A              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A42A 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A42D C3 4C A1                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A430                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 138++A430              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A430 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A432             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A432 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A435                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A435 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 139++A438 A7          >                        and     a
 139++A439 C2 56 A4    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 140++A43C                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 140++A43C 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A43F FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A441 DA 56 A4    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 141++A444                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 141++A444 3A AB 7D    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 141++A447 A7          >                        and     a
 141++A448 C2 56 A4    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 142++A44B 3A 8E 7D     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A44E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A44E FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A450 D2 56 A4    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A453              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A453 C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A456              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A456              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A456              .NoECM:
 149++A456                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A456                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A456              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A456              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A456                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A456 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A458             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A458 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A45B                                      ;break
 155++A45B                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A45B              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A45B ~                                        break
 158++A45B                                      ENDIF
 159++A45B CD BA A9                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A45E                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A45E CD 81 A8                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A461                                      ENDIF
 163++A461              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A461 3A C2 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A464 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A466 32 C2 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A469                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A469 3A C6 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A46C EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A46E 32 C6 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A471                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A471 3A CA A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A474 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A476 32 CA A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A479 CD 90 A4                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A47C C9                                   ret
 168++A47D 3A 68 80     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A480                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A480 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A482 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A483 C3 71 A1     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A486                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A486 CD 45 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A489                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A489 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A48A 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A48D C3 7D A4                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A490                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A490
 177++A490 CD C6 A8     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A493 32 83 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A496 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A499 32 87 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A49C CD 1C A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A49F 32 86 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A4A2 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A4A5 32 87 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A4A8 CD B2 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A4AB CD D6 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A4AE CD 04 A5                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A4B1 C9                                   ret
 189++A4B2
 190++A4B2              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A4B2 2A 86 A2                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A4B5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A4B6 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A4B8 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A4BA 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A4BB 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A4BC CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A4BE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A4BE FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A4C0 D2 CC A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A4C3                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A4C3 AF          >                        xor a
 200++A4C4 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A4C5 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A4C8                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A4C8 32 13 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A4CB                                      ENDIF
 205++A4CB C9                                   ret
 206++A4CC 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A4CE B4                                   or      h
 208++A4CF 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A4D2                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A4D2 32 13 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A4D5                                      ENDIF
 212++A4D5 C9                                   ret
 213++A4D6
 214++A4D6              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A4D6              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A4D6              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A4D6              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A4D6              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A4D6              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A4D6              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A4D6              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A4D6              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A4D6              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A4D6
 225++A4D6
 226++A4D6
 227++A4D6              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A4D6                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A4D6                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A4D6 CD 22 A9                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A4D9 32 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A4DC 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A4DD 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A4E0 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A4E3 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A4E4 3A 87 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A4E7                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A4E7                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A4E7                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A4E7                                      ;xor $80
 241++A4E7 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A4E8 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A4E9 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A4EB                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A4EB FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A4ED D2 F9 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A4F0                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A4F0 AF          >                        xor a
 246++A4F1 B0                                   or      b
 247++A4F2 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 248++A4F5                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A4F5 32 11 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A4F8                                      ENDIF
 251++A4F8 C9                                   ret
 252++A4F9 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A4FB B4                                   or      h
 254++A4FC A8                                   xor     b
 255++A4FD 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 256++A500                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A500 32 11 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 258++A503                                      ENDIF
 259++A503 C9                                   ret
 260++A504
 261++A504 2A 83 A2     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A507 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A508 A7                                   and     a
 264++A509 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A50B ED 5B 86 A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A50F 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A510                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A510 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A512 DA 1E A5    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A515 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A517 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A51A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A51A 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A51D                                      ENDIF
 273++A51D C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A51E              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A51E FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A520 DA 2C A5    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A523 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A525 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A528                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A528 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A52B                                      ENDIF
 280++A52B C9                                   ret
 281++A52C              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A52C AF          >                        xor a
 282++A52D 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 283++A530                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A530 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A533                                      ENDIF
 286++A533 C9                                   ret
 287++A534
 288++A534
 289++A534 CD 73 A5     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 290++A537 7C                                   ld      a,h
 291++A538 A7                                   and     a
 292++A539 06 16                                ld      b,22
 293++A53B 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 294++A53D 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 295++A53E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A53E FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 295++A540 D2 45 A5    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 296++A543 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 297++A545 2A 83 A2     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A548 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A549 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A54B C2 5C A5                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A54E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A54F                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A54F B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A550 DA 5C A5    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A553 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 304++A555 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 305++A558                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A558 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A55B                                      ENDIF
 308++A55B C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A55C 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A55D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A55D FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A55F D2 6A A5    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 311++A562              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 311++A562 AF          >                        xor a
 312++A563 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 313++A566                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A566 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 315++A569                                      ENDIF
 316++A569 C9                                   ret
 317++A56A 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 318++A56C 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 319++A56F                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 320++A56F 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 321++A572                                      ENDIF
 322++A572 C9                                   ret
 323++A573
 324++A573 2A C0 A2     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)

 327++A57E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 328++A57F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A581 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A582 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A583 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A585 47                                   ld      b,a
 333++A586 7A                                   ld      a,d
 334++A587 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 335++A589 57                                   ld      d,a
 336++A58A 09                                   add     hl,bc
 337++A58B 19                                   add     hl,de
 338++A58C                                      ShiftHLRight1
 338++A58C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 338++A58E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A590                                      ShiftHLRight1

 138++A6F5 47                                   ld      b,a
 139++A6F6 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 140++A6F9                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 140++A6F9 A7          >                        and     a
 140++A6FA C2 16 A7    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 141++A6FD 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 142++A6FE                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 142++A6FE FE 20       >                        cp      32
 142++A700 DA 11 A7    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot
 143++A703              .FireLaser:             ;break                        ;      do fire laser logic (drain energy, add beam to lines as random line from ship to a random edge of screen)
 144++A703 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 145++A704                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 145++A704 FE 23       >                        cp     35
 145++A706 CA 11 A7    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 146++A709                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 146++A709 FE 24       >                        cp     36
 146++A70B CA 11 A7    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 147++A70E C3 11 A7     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 148++A711              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 149++A711 21 47 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnKAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 150++A714 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 151++A716              .TooFarForLaser:
 152++A716              .UpdateShip             ;break
 153++A716 CD CA A0                             call    CalculateAgression              ; refresh aggression levels
 154++A719 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)
 155++A71C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 155++A71C FE 03       >                        cp     3
 155++A71E D2 2C A7    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway
 156++A721 3A 21 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 157++A724 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 158++A727 B6                                   or      (hl)
 159++A728 E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++A72A 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 161++A72C 3A 8E 7D     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 162++A72F                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 163++A72F                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnKShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 163++A72F 21 53 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 163++A732 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++A733 D2 52 A7    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++A736                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++A736 3A C2 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++A739 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A73B 32 C2 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++A73E                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++A73E 3A C6 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++A741 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A743 32 C6 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++A746                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++A746 3A CA A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++A749 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++A74B 32 CA A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++A74E CD 56 A7                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++A751 C9                                   ret
 169++A752 CD 56 A7     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++A755                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A755 C9                                   ret
 172++A756
 173++A756 CD C6 A8     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A759 32 83 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A75C 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A75F 32 87 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A762 CD 1C A9     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A765 32 86 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A768 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A76B 32 87 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A76E CD 78 A7                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A771 CD 9C A7                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A774 CD CA A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A777 C9                                   ret
 185++A778
 186++A778 2A 86 A2     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A77B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A77C EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A77E E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A780 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A781 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A782 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A784                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A784 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A786 D2 92 A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A789                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A789 AF          >                        xor a
 195++A78A B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A78B 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A78E                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A78E 32 13 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A791                                      ENDIF
 200++A791 C9                                   ret
 201++A792 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A794 B4                                   or      h
 203++A795 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A798                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A798 32 13 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A79B                                      ENDIF
 207++A79B C9                                   ret
 208++A79C
 209++A79C CD 22 A9     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A79F 32 89 A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A7A2 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A7A3 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A7A6 32 8A A2                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A7A9 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A7AA 3A 87 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A7AD 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A7AE 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A7AF CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A7B1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A7B1 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A7B3 D2 BF A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A7B6                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A7B6 AF          >                        xor a
 221++A7B7 B0                                   or      b
 222++A7B8 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A7BB                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A7BB 32 11 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A7BE                                      ENDIF
 226++A7BE C9                                   ret
 227++A7BF 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A7C1 B4                                   or      h
 229++A7C2 A8                                   xor     b
 230++A7C3 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A7C6                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A7C6 32 11 A3                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A7C9                                      ENDIF
 234++A7C9 C9                                   ret
 235++A7CA
 236++A7CA 2A 83 A2     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A7CD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A7CE A7                                   and     a
 239++A7CF 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A7D1 ED 5B 86 A2                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A7D5 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A7D6                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A7D6 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A7D8 DA E4 A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A7DB 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A7DD 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A7E0                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A7E0 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A7E3                                      ENDIF
 248++A7E3 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A7E4              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A7E4 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A7E6 DA F2 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A7E9 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A7EB 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A7EE                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A7EE 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A7F1                                      ENDIF
 255++A7F1 C9                                   ret
 256++A7F2              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A7F2 AF          >                        xor a
 257++A7F3 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A7F6                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A7F6 32 15 A3                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A7F9                                      ENDIF
 261++A7F9 C9                                   ret
 262++A7FA              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break
 263++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 264++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A7FA              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A7FA              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A7FA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 276++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF

 282++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF

 291++A7FA              ;;;                        call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct

 315++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF

 329++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 330++A7FA              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .

 333++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a

 335++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 336++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 337++A7FA              ;;;                        ret
 338++A7FA              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 339++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 340++A7FA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 341++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 342++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 343++A7FA              ;;;                        ret
 344++A7FA              ;;;

 350++A7FA              ;;;
 351++A7FA              ;;;
 352++A7FA              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign

 354++A7FA              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 355++A7FA              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .

 358++A7FA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 364++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 365++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF

 367++A7FA              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,l
 368++A7FA              ;;;                        or      h
 369++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a

 371++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 372++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 373++A7FA              ;;;                        ret
 374++A7FA              ;;;
 375++A7FA              ;;;
 376++A7FA              ;;;                        ;
 377++A7FA              ;;;ShipRoll:               call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 378++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 379++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      l,a                                ; .
 380++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 381++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 382++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 384++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 385++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++A7FA              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 387++A7FA              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng RAT2,.skipRollZero           ;

 389++A7FA              ;;;                        or      b
 390++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a

 393++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 394++A7FA              ;;;                        ret
 395++A7FA              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++A7FA              ;;;                        or      h
 397++A7FA              ;;;                        xor     b
 398++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++A7FA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A7FA              ;;;                        ret
 403++A7FA              ;;;
 404++A7FA              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)

 406++A7FA              ;;;                        and     a
 407++A7FA              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown

 409++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++A7FA              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++A7FA              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++A7FA              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++A7FA              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++A7FA              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++A7FA              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange

 419++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a

 422++A7FA              ;;;                        ENDIF

 425++A7FA              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
