 271+ A7FA
 272+ A7FA              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 273+ A7FA              ; on exit a == new roll
 274+ A7FA EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 275+ A7FC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 276+ A7FE 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 277+ A7FF F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 278+ A801 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 279+ A804 C9                                   ret
 280+ A805
 281+ A805 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 282+ A807 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 283+ A808 3A 86 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 284+ A80B                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 284+ A80B FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 284+ A80D DA 1A A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 285+ A810 78                                   ld      a,b
 286+ A811 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ A813                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 288+ A813                                     ; ld      a,
 289+ A813 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 290+ A815 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 291+ A816 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 292+ A819 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 293+ A81A B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 294+ A81B 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 295+ A81E C9                                   ret                                     ;
 296+ A81F
 297+ A81F 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 298+ A822 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 299+ A824 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 300+ A826 F6 05                                or      5
 301+ A828 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 302+ A82B C9                                   ret
 303+ A82C
 304+ A82C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 305+ A82D F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 306+ A82F 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 307+ A832 C9                                   ret
 308+ A833
 309+ A833
 310+ A833
 311+ A833 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 312+ A835 47                                   ld      b,a
 313+ A836 3A 86 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 314+ A839                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 314+ A839 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 314+ A83B DA 45 A8    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 315+ A83E 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 316+ A840 B1                                   or      c
 317+ A841 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 318+ A844 C9                                   ret
 319+ A845 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 320+ A846 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 321+ A849 C9                                   ret
 322+ A84A
 323+ A84A
 324+ A84A 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 325+ A84D C3 59 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 326+ A850
 327+ A850 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 328+ A853 C3 59 A8                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 329+ A856
 330+ A856 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 331+ A859              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 332+ A859 11 A4 A2     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 333+ A85C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 334+ A85D 47                                   ld      b,a
 335+ A85E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 336+ A860 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 337+ A861 13                                   inc     de
 338+ A862 78                                   ld      a,b
 339+ A863 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 340+ A865 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 341+ A866 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 342+ A867 23                                   inc     hl
 343+ A868 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 344+ A869 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 345+ A86A 47                                   ld      b,a
 346+ A86B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 347+ A86D 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 348+ A86E 13                                   inc     de
 349+ A86F 78                                   ld      a,b
 350+ A870 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 351+ A872 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 352+ A873 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 353+ A874 23                                   inc     hl
 354+ A875 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 355+ A876 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 356+ A877 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ A878 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 358+ A87A 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 359+ A87B 13                                   inc     de
 360+ A87C 78                                   ld      a,b
 361+ A87D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 362+ A87F 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 363+ A880 C9                                   ret
 364+ A881
 365+ A881                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 366+ A881              DebugTacticsCopy:
 367+ A881 2A 29 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 368+ A884 ED 5B 2B C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 369+ A888 ED 4B 2D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 370+ A88C 22 E0 A2                             ld      (TacticsSideX),hl
 371+ A88F ED 53 E4 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideY),de
 372+ A893 ED 43 E8 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc
 373+ A897
 374+ A897 2A 2F C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 375+ A89A ED 5B 31 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 376+ A89E ED 4B 33 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 377+ A8A2 22 F0 A2                             ld      (TacticsRoofX),hl
 378+ A8A5 ED 53 F4 A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofY),de
 379+ A8A9 ED 43 F8 A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofZ),bc
 380+ A8AD
 381+ A8AD 2A 35 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 382+ A8B0 ED 5B 37 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 383+ A8B4 ED 4B 39 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 384+ A8B8 22 00 A3                             ld      (TacticsNoseX),hl
 385+ A8BB ED 53 04 A3                          ld      (TacticsNoseY),de
 386+ A8BF ED 43 08 A3                          ld      (TacticsNoseZ),bc
 387+ A8C3
 388+ A8C3 C9                                   ret
 389+ A8C4                                      ENDIF
 390+ A8C4
 391+ A8C4 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 392+ A8C6 CD 50 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 393+ A8C9 21 A4 A2     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 394+ A8CC 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 395+ A8CD 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 396+ A8CE 3A C0 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 397+ A8D1 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 398+ A8D2 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 399+ A8D4 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 400+ A8D5 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 401+ A8D8 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 402+ A8D9 3A C2 A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 403+ A8DC AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 404+ A8DD 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 405+ A8DE 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 406+ A8DF 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 407+ A8E0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 408+ A8E1 3A C4 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 409+ A8E4 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 410+ A8E5 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 411+ A8E7 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 412+ A8E8 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 413+ A8EA 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 414+ A8EB 3A C6 A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 415+ A8EE AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 416+ A8EF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 417+ A8F0 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 418+ A8F1 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 419+ A8F2 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 420+ A8F5 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 421+ A8F7 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 422+ A8F8 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 423+ A8FB 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 424+ A8FC 22 C4 A8                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 425+ A8FF E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 426+ A900 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 427+ A901 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 428+ A902 3A C8 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 429+ A905 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 430+ A906 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 431+ A908 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 432+ A909 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 433+ A90B 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 434+ A90C 3A CA A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 435+ A90F AE                                   xor     (hl)
 436+ A910 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 437+ A911 2A C4 A8                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 438+ A914 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 439+ A917 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 440+ A91A 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 441+ A91B C9                                   ret
 442+ A91C
 443+ A91C CD 56 A8     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 444+ A91F C3 C9 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 445+ A922
 446+ A922 CD 4A A8     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 447+ A925 C3 C9 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 448+ A928
 449+ A928 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 450+ A92B 11 B0 A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 451+ A92E 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 452+ A931 ED B0                                ldir
 453+ A933 C9                                   ret
 454+ A934
 455+ A934 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 456+ A937 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 457+ A93A                                      ;xor     $80
 458+ A93A 22 C0 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 459+ A93D 32 C2 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 460+ A940
 461+ A940 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 462+ A943 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 463+ A946                                      ;xor     $80
 464+ A946 22 C4 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 465+ A949 32 C6 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 466+ A94C
 467+ A94C 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 468+ A94F 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 469+ A952                                      ;xor     $80
 470+ A952 22 C8 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 471+ A955 32 CA A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 472+ A958 C9                                   ret
 473+ A959
 474+ A959              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 474+ A959 AF          >                        xor a
 475+ A95A 21 B0 A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 476+ A95D 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 477+ A95F 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 478+ A960 23                                   inc     hl
 479+ A961 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 480+ A963 C9                                   ret
 481+ A964
 482+ A964 CD 59 A9     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 483+ A967 CD 34 A9                             call    CopyPosToVector
 484+ A96A                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 485+ A96A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 486+ A96A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 487+ A96A                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 488+ A96A C9                                   ret
 489+ A96B
 490+ A96B ED 5B B0 A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 491+ A96F 3A B2 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 492+ A972                                      FlipSignBitA
 492+ A972 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 493+ A974 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 494+ A975 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 495+ A978 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 496+ A97B 47                                   ld      b,a
 497+ A97C CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 498+ A97F 22 C0 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 499+ A982 32 C2 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 500+ A985 ED 5B B3 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 501+ A989 3A B5 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 502+ A98C                                      FlipSignBitA
 502+ A98C EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 503+ A98E 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 504+ A98F 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 505+ A992 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 506+ A995 47                                   ld      b,a
 507+ A996 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 508+ A999 22 C4 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 509+ A99C 32 C6 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 510+ A99F ED 5B B6 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 511+ A9A3 3A B8 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 512+ A9A6                                      FlipSignBitA
 512+ A9A6 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 513+ A9A8 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 514+ A9A9 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 515+ A9AC 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 516+ A9AF 47                                   ld      b,a
 517+ A9B0 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 518+ A9B3 22 C8 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 519+ A9B6 32 CA A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 520+ A9B9 C9                                   ret
 521+ A9BA
 522+ A9BA              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 523+ A9BA              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 524+ A9BA              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 525+ A9BA 2A C0 A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 526+ A9BD ED 5B C4 A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 527+ A9C1 ED 4B C8 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 528+ A9C5 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 529+ A9C6 B2                                   or      d
 530+ A9C7 B0                                   or      b
 531+ A9C8 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 532+ A9CA                                      ShiftHLRight1
 532+ A9CA CB 3C       >			   srl h
 532+ A9CC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 533+ A9CE                                      ShiftDERight1
 533+ A9CE CB 3A       >			   srl d
 533+ A9D0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 534+ A9D2                                      ShiftBCRight1
 534+ A9D2 CB 38       >			   srl b
 534+ A9D4 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 535+ A9D6 C3 C5 A9                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 536+ A9D9              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 536+ A9D9 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 536+ A9DB CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 537+ A9DD                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 537+ A9DD CB 3A       >			   srl d
 537+ A9DF CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 538+ A9E1                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 538+ A9E1 CB 38       >			   srl b
 538+ A9E3 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 539+ A9E5 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 540+ A9E8 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 541+ A9E9 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 542+ A9EB EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 543+ A9EC 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 544+ A9ED ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 545+ A9EF 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 546+ A9F0 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 547+ A9F1 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 548+ A9F2 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 549+ A9F4 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 550+ A9F5 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 551+ A9F6 CD 7B 91                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 552+ A9F9                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 553+ A9F9 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 554+ A9FA FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 555+ A9FC 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 556+ A9FD C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 557+ A9FE 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 558+ A9FF CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 559+ AA02 32 C8 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 560+ AA05 D1                                   pop     de
 561+ AA06 7B                                   ld      a,e
 562+ AA07 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ AA09 CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ AA0C 32 C4 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 565+ AA0F E1                                   pop     hl
 566+ AA10 7D                                   ld      a,l
 567+ AA11 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 568+ AA13 CD 75 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 569+ AA16 32 C0 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 570+ AA19                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 571+ AA19                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 572+ AA19                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 572+ AA19 AF          >                        xor a
 573+ AA1A 32 C1 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 574+ AA1D 32 C5 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 575+ AA20 32 C9 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 576+ AA23                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 576+ AA23 3A C2 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 576+ AA26 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 576+ AA28 32 C2 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 577+ AA2B                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 577+ AA2B 3A C6 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 577+ AA2E E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 577+ AA30 32 C6 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 578+ AA33                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 578+ AA33 3A CA A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 578+ AA36 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 578+ AA38 32 CA A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 579+ AA3B C9                                   ret

 694+ AA3C              ;                      >>escape pod>> point at planet and jump to step 7
 695+ AA3C              ;                      >>space station>> if hostile
 696+ AA3C              ;                                           then if cop counter < 7 and 6.2% chance
 697+ AA3C              ;                                                   then spawm hostile cop
 698+ AA3C              ;                                                end if
 699+ AA3C              ;                                           else
 700+ AA3C              ;                                                if 0.8% change and transporter count = 0
 701+ AA3C              ;                                                   then if 50% chance
 702+ AA3C              ;                                                           then spawn transporter
 703+ AA3C              ;                                                           else spawn shuttle
 704+ AA3C              ;                                                        end if
 705+ AA3C              ;                                                end if
 706+ AA3C              ;                                        end if
 707+ AA3C              ;                                        return
 708+ AA3C              ;                      >>targoid and no mother ship in slot list>> set random drift
 709+ AA3C              ;                                                                  return
 710+ AA3C              ;                      >>if bounty hunter flag>> if ship not hostile
 711+ AA3C              ;                                                   then if trader flag clear or 20% chance
 712+ AA3C              ;                                                        then if fugitive or offender
 713+ AA3C              ;                                                                then set hosile
 714+ AA3C              ;                                                end if
 715+ AA3C              ;                      >>Carrier and hanger slots > 0 >> if 22% chance (code to be added later)
 716+ AA3C              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of types carried
 717+ AA3C              ;                                              reduce ships in hanger by 1
 718+ AA3C              ;                                              return
 719+ AA3C              ;                      >>rock hermit>> if 22% chance
 720+ AA3C              ;                                         then spawn agressive hosting one of Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder or Gecko
 721+ AA3C              ;                                              return
 722+ AA3C              ;                      >>pirate and in safe zone>> stop pirate being hostile by removing agressive and hostileflags
 723+ AA3C              ;                 end case
 724+ AA3C              ;         end if
 725+ AA3C              ;         recharge ship energy by recharge factor (TODO as a config item on ship type but by default 1)
 726+ AA3C              ; .PART 3
 727+ AA3C              ;         calulcate dot product of ship nose to us
 728+ AA3C              ; .PART 4
 729+ AA3C              ;         2.5% change ship rill roll a noticable amount
 730+ AA3C              ;         if ship has > 50% energy jump to part 6
 731+ AA3C              ;         if ship > 1/8th energy jump to part 5
 732+ AA3C              ;         if random 10% chance (i.e. ship < 1/8 energy and bails out)
 733+ AA3C              ;            then launch escape pod
 734+ AA3C              ;                 set AI to null
 735+ AA3C              ;                 set random pitch and roll
 736+ AA3C              ;                 set accelleation to 0
 737+ AA3C              ;         end if
 738+ AA3C              ; .PART 5
 739+ AA3C              ;         if ship does not have any missilesor ECM is firing to part 6
 740+ AA3C              ;            then if random > threshold for ship type (TODO as a config item on ship type)
 741+ AA3C              ;                    then if tharoid ; note this means thargoids are sensitve to ECM
 742+ AA3C              ;                            then launch thargon
 743+ AA3C              ;                            else spawn angry missle under ship
 744+ AA3C              ;                         end if
 745+ AA3C              ;                 end if
 746+ AA3C              ;            else return
 747+ AA3C              ;         end if
 748+ AA3C              ; .PART 6
 749+ AA3C              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 750+ AA3C              ;            then jump to part 7
 751+ AA3C              ;            else if ship is pointing directly at us ( < 163 i.e. > -35)
 752+ AA3C              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 753+ AA3C              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 754+ AA3C              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 755+ AA3C              ;                         return
 756+ AA3C              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 757+ AA3C              ;                 end if
 758+ AA3C              ;         end if
 759+ AA3C              ; .PART 7#
 760+ AA3C              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 761+ AA3C              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 762+ AA3C              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 763+ AA3C              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 764+ AA3C              ;                         if random < AI flag
 765+ AA3C              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 766+ AA3C              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 767+ AA3C              ;                         end if
 768+ AA3C              ;                end if
 769+ AA3C              ;           end if
 770+ AA3C              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 771+ AA3C
 772+ AA3C
 773+ AA3C              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 774+ AA3C              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 775+ AA3C              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 776+ AA3C              ; .PART 8 - new
 777+ AA3C              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 778+ AA3C              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 779+ AA3C              ;              if chance 25%
 780+ AA3C              ;                 then fire ECM
 781+ AA3C              ;
 782+ AA3C
 783+ AA3C
 784+ AA3C
 785+ AA3C
 786+ AA3C 2A C0 A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 787+ AA3F ED 5B C4 A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 788+ AA43 ED 4B C8 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 789+ AA47 3A C2 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 790+ AA4A FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 791+ AA4C 3A C6 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 792+ AA4F FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 793+ AA51 3A CA A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 794+ AA54 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 795+ AA56 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 796+ AA58 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 797+ AA5A                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 797+ AA5A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 798+ AA5C 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 799+ AA5E FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 800+ AA60 CB 2F                            sra     a
 801+ AA62 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 802+ AA64 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 803+ AA66 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 804+ AA68 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 805+ AA6A CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 806+ AA6C FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 807+ AA6E CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 808+ AA70 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 809+ AA72 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 810+ AA74 CB 2F                            sra     a
 811+ AA76 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 812+ AA78 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 813+ AA7A CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 814+ AA7C C3 56 AA                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 815+ AA7F 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 816+ AA80 B2                               or      d
 817+ AA81 B0                               or      b
 818+ AA82                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 818+ AA82 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 819+ AA84 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 820+ AA86              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 820+ AA86 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 820+ AA88 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 821+ AA8A                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 821+ AA8A CB 3A       >			   srl d
 821+ AA8C CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 822+ AA8E                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 822+ AA8E CB 38       >			   srl b
 822+ AA90 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 823+ AA92 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 824+ AA93 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 825+ AA95 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 826+ AA96 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 827+ AA97 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 828+ AA99 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 829+ AA9A 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 830+ AA9B DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 831+ AA9D 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 832+ AA9E 22 D0 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 833+ AAA1 22 D4 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 834+ AAA4 22 D8 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 835+ AAA7 C9                               ret
 836+ AAA8                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 837+ AAA8
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

  21+ AAA8              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ AAA8              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ AAA8 F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ AAAC DD E5
  24+ AAAE AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ AAAF CF                                   rst	    $08

 191+ AAC9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AAC9              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AAC9              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AAC9              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AAC9              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AAC9              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AAC9 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AACA C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AACB E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AACC DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AACF CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AAD0 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AAD1 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AAD2 C9                                   ret
 205+ AAD3
 206+ AAD3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AAD3              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AAD3              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AAD3              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AAD3              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AAD3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AAD3 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AAD4 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AAD5 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AAD6 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AAD9 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AADA 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AADB E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AADC C9                                   ret
 220+ AADD
 221+ AADD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AADD              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AADD              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AADD              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AADD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AADD B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AADE C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AADF CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AAE0 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE

 266+ AAEF
 267+ AAEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AAEF              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AAEF              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AAEF              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AAEF              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AAEF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AAEF CD A8 AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AAF2 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AAF5                                      ; get file size
 276+ AAF5 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AAF8 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AAFB 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AAFD CD BB AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AB00 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AB02 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AB04 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AB06 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AB09 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AB0A CD C9 AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AB0D 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AB0F F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AB10 CD DD AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AB13 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AB15 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AB18 C9                                   ret
 292+ AB19              ;
 293+ AB19              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AB19              ;
 295+ AB19 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AB1B C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AB1C
 298+ AB1C              .error_closing:
 299+ AB1C C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AB1D D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AB1E C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AB1F C9                                   ret
 303+ AB20
 304+ AB20              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AB20              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AB20              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AB20              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AB20              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AB20              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AB20 CD A8 AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AB23 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AB26 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AB29 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AB2B CD BB AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AB2E 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AB30 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AB32 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AB34 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AB37 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AB38 CD D3 AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AB3B 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AB3D F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AB3E CD DD AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AB41 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AB42              ;
 326+ AB42              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AB42              ;
 328+ AB42 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AB45 C9                                   ret
 330+ AB46
 331+ AB46 00           DefaultDrive:	        DB	0
 332+ AB47 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ AB48 00           CardFlags               DB  0
 334+ AB49 00 00        TargetSize              DW  0
 335+ AB4B 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ AB4D 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data
 337+ AD4D 00           FilereadsPerformed      DB  0
 338+ AD4E 00 00        FilemapBlockCount       DW  0
 339+ AD50 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ AD52 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0
 341+ AD54 00 00 00...  FilemapBuffer           DS  FILEMAP_BLOCK_SIZE * FILEMAP_SIZE        ; expecting 60 to be overkill as most should be 1
 342+ AE14
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

  21+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCTBoilerTextLoop:

  23+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  25+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  27+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  29+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  31+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data

  37+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			bc
  38+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AEC1              ;;DEFUNCT	ret
  40+ AEC1
  41+ AEC1

  51+ AEC1              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  52+ AEC1              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AEC1              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl

1244  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
1245  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
1246  B109
1247  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
1248  B109                              org $B1B1
1249  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
1250  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
1251  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
1252  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
1253  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
1254  B1B1 ~                                            ei
1255  B1B1 ~                                            reti
1256  B1B1                                      ELSE
1257  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
1258  B1B1                                      ENDIF
1259  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1259  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
1260  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
1261  B1BA D9                                   exx
1262  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1263  B1BF 21 94 7E                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
1264  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
1265  B1C3                                      ;break
1266  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
1267  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1268  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
1269  B1CB D9                                   exx
1270  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1270  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
1271  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
1272  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti
1273  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
1274  B1D7              EndOfNonBanked:
1275  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
1276  B1D7
1277  B1D7
1278  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
1279  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1280  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
1281  B1D7                                      ENDM
1282  B1D7
1283  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
1284  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1285  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1286  B1D7                                      ENDM
1287  B1D7
1288  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
1289  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1290  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1291  B1D7                                      ENDM
1292  B1D7
1293  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
1294  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1295  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1296  B1D7                                      ENDM
1297  B1D7
1298  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
1298  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1298  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1298  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1298  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
1298  B1DE 04          >            inc b
1298  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1298  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1299  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
1299  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1300  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1301  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1302  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1303  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
1304  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1304  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1304  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1305  B1F1 C9                                   ret
1306  B1F2

1308  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1308  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1308  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a

1308  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1309  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
1309  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1310  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1311  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1312  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1313  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
1314  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1314  B206 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1314  B209 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1315  B20C C9                                   ret
1316  B20D

1318  B20D                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTMUSIC
1319  B20D ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode Music disabled"
1320  B20D                                  ELSE
1321  B20D                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode Music enabled"
1322  B20D CD F2 B1                             call    IM2PlayDanube
1323  B210                                  ENDIF
1324  B210                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTGRAPHICS
1325  B210 ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics disabled"
1326  B210                                  ELSE
1327  B210                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics enabled"
1328  B210                                      SaveMMU6
1328  B210             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1328  B210 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1328  B213 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1328  B215 ED 79       >            out (c),a
1328  B217 04          >            inc b
1328  B218 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1328  B21A 32 07 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU6),a
1329  B21D                                      SaveMMU7
1329  B21D             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1329  B21D 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1329  B220 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1329  B222 ED 79       >            out (c),a
1329  B224 04          >            inc b
1329  B225 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1329  B227 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a

1332  B230 ED 92 56    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1333  B233                                      RestoreMMU7

1333  B236 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1334  B239                                  ENDIF

  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret
  23++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B 3A 7F                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B 38 7F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite

 191+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 192+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 193+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 194+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 195+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 196+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 198+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 199+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 200+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 201+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 202+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 203+ C236 83                                   add     e
 204+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 205+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 206+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 207+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 209+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height
 210+ C240 ED 43 2D C2                          ld      (PosScan1),bc
 211+ C244 ED 53 2F C2                          ld      (PosScan2),de
 212+ C248 DD 21 41 C0  .CheckBoxes:            ld      ix,src_printed_text
 213+ C24C 3A C1 C0                             ld      a,(src_buffer_size)
 214+ C24F FE 00                                cp      0
 215+ C251 28 3C                                jr      z,.SafeToPrint
 216+ C253 60                                   ld      h,b                     ; h will substite for row b as b is used in dnjz
 217+ C254 47                                   ld      b,a
 218+ C255 DD 7E 02     .CheckBoxLoop:          ld      a,(ix+2)
 219+ C258 FE 00                                cp      0                       ; zerolength, not applicable
 220+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 221+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)
 222+ C25F 3C                                   inc     a
 223+ C260                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+2), .NoBox  ; X1 >= BottomLeftX
 223+ C260 DD BE 02    >                        cp     (ix+2)
 223+ C263 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 224+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)
 225+ C269                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+0),  .NoBox   ; X2 <= TopRightX
 225+ C269 DD BE 00    >                        cp      (ix+0)
 225+ C26C DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 226+ C26F 3A 2E C2     .SafeToPrintX:          ld      a,(PosScan1+1)
 227+ C272 3C                                   inc     a
 228+ C273                                      JumpIfAGTENusng (ix+3), .NoBox  ; Y1 >= BottomLeftY
 228+ C273 DD BE 03    >                        cp     (ix+3)
 228+ C276 D2 85 C2    >                        jp		nc,.NoBox
 229+ C279 3A 30 C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2+1)
 230+ C27C                                      JumpIfALTNusng (ix+1),  .NoBox  ; Y2 <= TopRightY
 230+ C27C DD BE 01    >                        cp      (ix+1)
 230+ C27F DA 85 C2    >                        jp		c, .NoBox
 231+ C282 3E FF        .MatchedBox:            ld      a,$FF
 232+ C284 C9                                   ret

 234+ C287 DD 23                                inc     ix
 235+ C289 DD 23                                inc     ix
 236+ C28B DD 23                                inc     ix
 237+ C28D 10 C6                                djnz    .CheckBoxLoop
 238+ C28F 21 41 C0     .SafeToPrint:           ld      hl,src_printed_text

 338+ C34C 21 A3 8E     SRCPrintName:           ld		hl, name_expanded
 339+ C34F 3A 18 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_row)
 340+ C352 D6 05                                sub		local_label_shift_y
 341+ C354 47                                   ld		b,a					; b = effective pixel row
 342+ C355 3A 19 C0                             ld		a,(local_name_col)
 343+ C358 C6 03                                add		a,local_label_shift_x
 344+ C35A 4F                                   ld		c,a
 345+ C35B 1E FF                                ld		e,$FF
 346+ C35D                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 346+ C35D ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 347+ C361 CD BE E3                             call	l2_print_7at
 348+ C364 C9                                   ret
 349+ C365
 350+ C365 AF           plot_local_stars:       xor		a
 351+ C366 32 9B 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 352+ C369 DD 21 16 E0                          ld      ix,galaxy_data
 353+ C36D 32 C1 C0                             ld      (src_buffer_size),a
 354+ C370 21 41 C0     SRCClearNameList:       ld		hl,src_printed_text
 355+ C373 11 80 00                             ld		de,src_fill_buffer_size
 356+ C376 CD 32 7D                             call	memfill_dma
 356+ C379
 357+ C379 AF           SRCCounterLoop:         xor		a
 358+ C37A 3A 25 7F                             ld      a,(Galaxy)
 359+ C37D                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 359+ C37D ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 360+ C380 DD E5                                push    ix
 361+ C382 DD E5                                push    ix
 362+ C384 E1                                   pop     hl
 363+ C385 11 0E 7F                             ld      de,SystemSeed
 364+ C388 CD 8A 84                             call    copy_seed
 365+ C38B 3A 0F 7F                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 366+ C38E 4F                                   ld		c,a
 367+ C38F 3A 39 7F     SRCcalcLocaldy:         ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 368+ C392 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 369+ C393 79                                   ld		a,c
 370+ C394 90                                   sub		b
 371+ C395 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 372+ C397 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedy
 373+ C399 ED 44        SRCnegativedy:          neg
 374+ C39B FE 26        SRCpositivedy:          cp		local_max_range_y
 375+ C39D 30 48                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 376+ C39F 3A 11 7F     SRCcalcLocaldx:         ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 377+ C3A2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 378+ C3A3 3A 38 7F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 379+ C3A6 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 380+ C3A7 79                                   ld		a,c
 381+ C3A8 90                                   sub		b
 382+ C3A9 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 383+ C3AB 28 02                                jr		z,SRCpositivedx
 384+ C3AD ED 44        SRCnegativedx:          neg
 385+ C3AF FE 14        SRCpositivedx:          cp		local_max_range_x
 386+ C3B1 30 34                                jr		nc,SRCtoofar
 387+ C3B3 3A 0F 7F     SRCOKToPlot             ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
 388+ C3B6 21 39 7F                             ld		hl,PresentSystemY
 389+ C3B9 96                                   sub		(hl)
 390+ C3BA CB 27                                sla		a								; * 2
 391+ C3BC C6 60                                add		src_y_centre
 392+ C3BE 32 18 C0                             ld		(local_name_row),a
 393+ C3C1 47                                   ld		b,a
 394+ C3C2 3A 11 7F                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
 395+ C3C5 21 38 7F                             ld		hl,PresentSystemX
 396+ C3C8 96                                   sub		(hl)
 397+ C3C9 CB 27                                sla		a
 398+ C3CB CB 27                                sla		a								; * 4
 399+ C3CD C6 80                                add		src_x_centre
 400+ C3CF 32 19 C0                             ld		(local_name_col),a
 401+ C3D2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 402+ C3D3 3A 13 7F                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
 403+ C3D6 E6 01                                and		$01
 404+ C3D8 C6 02                                add		a,2
 405+ C3DA 57                                   ld		d,a
 406+ C3DB 1E D8                                ld		e,local_chart_star_colour
 407+ C3DD                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 407+ C3DD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 408+ C3E1 CD F4 ED                             call	l2_draw_circle_fill
 409+ C3E4                                     ; call    src_get_name
 410+ C3E4 CD B3 C2                             call	src_label_ssytem
 411+ C3E7 E1           SRCtoofar:              pop     hl
 412+ C3E8 ED 34 08 00                          add     hl,8
 413+ C3EC E5                                   push    hl
 414+ C3ED DD E1                                pop     ix
 415+ C3EF 3A 9B 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 416+ C3F2 3D                                   dec		a
 417+ C3F3 FE 00                                cp		0
 418+ C3F5 C8                                   ret		z
 419+ C3F6 32 9B 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 420+ C3F9 C3 79 C3                             jp		SRCCounterLoop
 421+ C3FC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 422+ C3FC              draw_local_chart_menu:  InitNoDoubleBuffer
 422+ C3FC             >                            MMUSelectLayer1
 422+ C3FC ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 422+ C400 CD 8F E0    >                            call	l1_cls
 422+ C403 3E 07       >                            ld		a,7
 422+ C405 CD AA E0    >                            call	l1_attr_cls_to_a
 422+ C408             >                            MMUSelectLayer2
 422+ C408 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 422+ C40C CD 0A E0    >                            call    asm_l2_double_buffer_off
 422+ C40F CD 0E E2    >                            call	l2_cls	; Get some space
 422+ C412             >                            MMUSelectSpriteBank
 422+ C412 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 422+ C416 CD 6E E5    >                            call    sprite_cls_cursors

 424+ C41B 32 A3 7E                             ld      (MenuIdMax),a
 425+ C41E                                      CopyPresentSystemToTarget               ; for short range we always start at present and cusor on present
 425+ C41E 2A 38 7F    >                        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 425+ C421 22 3A 7F    >                        ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 426+ C424 01 01 01     SRCDrawbox:             ld		bc,$0101
 427+ C427 11 FD BE                             ld		de,$BEFD

 445+ C45A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 446+ C45A 3A 85 80     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 447+ C45D                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 447+ C45D A7          >                        and     a
 447+ C45E C8          >                        ret     z
 448+ C45F 17                                   rla
 449+ C460 DC 78 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 450+ C463 17                                   rla
 451+ C464 DC 95 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 452+ C467 17                                   rla
 453+ C468 DC B4 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 454+ C46B 17                                   rla
 455+ C46C DC D1 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 456+ C46F 17                                   rla
 457+ C470 DC F0 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 458+ C473 17                                   rla
 459+ C474 DC FA C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 460+ C477 C9                                   ret
 461+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 462+ C478 3A 3B 7F     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 463+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 463+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 463+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 465+ C480 3A 39 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 466+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 467+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 468+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 468+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 468+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 469+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 470+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 471+ C48E 32 3B 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 472+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 473+ C494 C9                                   ret
 474+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 475+ C495 3A 39 7F     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 476+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 477+ C499 3A 3B 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 478+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 479+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 479+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 479+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 480+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 481+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 482+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 482+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 482+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 483+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 484+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 485+ C4AD 32 3B 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 486+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 487+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 488+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 489+ C4B4 3A 3A 7F     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 490+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 490+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 490+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 492+ C4BC 3A 38 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 493+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 494+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 495+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 495+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 495+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 496+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 497+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 498+ C4CA 32 3A 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 499+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 500+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 501+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 502+ C4D1 3A 38 7F     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 503+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 504+ C4D5 3A 3A 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 505+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 506+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 506+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 506+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 507+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 508+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 509+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 509+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 509+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 510+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 511+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 512+ C4E9 32 3A 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 513+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 515+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4F0 2A 38 7F     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 517+ C4F3 22 3A 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 518+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 519+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 520+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 521+ C4FA 3A 25 7F     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 522+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 522+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 523+ C500 ED 4B 3A 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 524+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 525+ C507 ED 43 3A 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 526+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 527+ C50E C9                                   ret
 528+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 529+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 530+ C510 C9                                   ret
