  21++CCE8 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  22++CCE9 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  23++CCEA D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  24++CCEB C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  25++CCEC D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  26++CCED E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  27++CCEE 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  28++CCF1 E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  29++CCF2 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  30++CCF3 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  31++CCF4 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  32++CCF7 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  33++CCF8 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  34++CCF9 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  35++CCFA DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  36++CCFC C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  37++CCFD
  38++CCFD
  39++CCFD
  40++CCFD              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  41++CCFD              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++CCFD              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  43++CCFD              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  44++CCFD              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  45++CCFD              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  46++CCFD              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  47++CCFD              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  48++CCFD              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  49++CCFD              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  50++CCFD              ;                        ret
  51++CCFD
  52++CCFD              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  53++CCFD ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  54++CCFD ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  55++CCFD ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  56++CCFD ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  57++CCFD ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  58++CCFD                                      ENDM
  59++CCFD
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 722+ CCFD                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CCFD              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CCFD 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CD00 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CD01 E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CD03 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CD04                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CD04 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CD05 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CD07 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CD08                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CD08 ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CD0C 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CD0F E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CD11 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CD12 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CD15 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CD16 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CD17 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CD1A              ; ..................................
  20++CD1A 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CD1D 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CD1E E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CD20 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CD21                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CD21 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CD22 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CD24 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CD25                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CD25 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CD29 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CD2C E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CD2E 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CD2F CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CD32 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CD33 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CD34 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CD37              ; ..................................
  38++CD37 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CD3A 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CD3B E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CD3D 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CD3E                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CD3E 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CD3F E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CD41 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CD42                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CD42 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CD46 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CD49 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CD4B 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CD4C CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CD4F B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CD50 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CD51 CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CD53 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CD55 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CD57 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CD59 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CD5A              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CD5A FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CD5C DA 6B CD    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CD5F              NoClampZto4:
  61++CD5F 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CD62 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CD63 32 B2 7E             ld      (varT),a
  64++CD66 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CD67 32 95 7E             ld      (varU),a
  66++CD6A C9           		ret
  67++CD6B              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CD6B 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CD6E 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CD71 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CD72 32 B2 7E             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CD75 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CD76 32 95 7E             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CD79 C9           		ret
  75++CD7A
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 723+ CD7A                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CD7A              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CD7A ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CD7E 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CD81 ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CD85              SetABSbc:
   6++CD85 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CD86 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CD88 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CD8A 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CD8B              SetABShl:
  11++CD8B 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CD8C DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CD8E E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CD90 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CD91              SetABSde:
  16++CD91 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CD92 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CD94 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CD96 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CD97              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CD97 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CD98 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CD99 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CD9A 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CD9C                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CD9C CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CD9E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CDA0                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CDA0 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CDA2 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CDA4              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CDA4 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CDA6 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CDA8 C3 97 CD         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CDAB              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CDAB DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CDAD E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CDAF B0           	or			b
  33++CDB0 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CDB1              SignforHL:
  35++CDB1 DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CDB3 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CDB5 B4           	or			h
  38++CDB6 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CDB7              SignforDE:
  40++CDB7 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CDB9 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CDBB B2           	or			d
  43++CDBC 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CDBD              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CDBD ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CDC1 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CDC4 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CDC8 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CDC9 32 95 7E     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CDCC 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CDCD 32 B2 7E     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CDD0 C9           	ret
  53++CDD1
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 727+ CDD4 ED 31                                add     hl,a

 729+ CDD8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 730+ CDD9 C9                                   ret

 733+ CDDD ED 31                                add     hl,a
 734+ CDDF AF                                   xor     a
 735+ CDE0 77                                   ld      (hl),a

 739+ CDE5 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 740+ CDE7 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0

 743+ CDED 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF

 746+ CDF0 23                                   inc     hl
 747+ CDF1 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop

 751+ CDF7 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 752+ CDF9 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 753+ CDFB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 754+ CDFC 06 10                                ld      b,16
 755+ CDFE 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 756+ CE01 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 757+ CE03 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 758+ CE04 23                                   inc     hl
 759+ CE05 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop
 760+ CE07 C9                                   ret

 774+ CE08                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CE08              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CE08 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CE09 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CE0B 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CE0D 3A 96 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CE10 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CE11              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CE11              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CE11 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CE14 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE15 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CE17 CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CE19 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CE1A ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CE1C ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CE1E 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CE20 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CE21 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CE22 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CE24 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CE25 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CE28 C9                                   ret
  23++CE29
  24++CE29 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CE2B                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CE2B E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CE2D CD 08 CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CE30 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CE32                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CE32 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CE34 B1                                   or      c
  30++CE35 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CE38 C9                                   ret
  32++CE39
  33++CE39              ; Tested OK
  34++CE39              ;LL21
  35++CE39              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CE39                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CE39 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CE39 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CE39 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CE39 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CE39 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CE39 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CE39 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CE39 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CE39 ~                            push	hl
  46++CE39 ~                            push	bc
  47++CE39 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CE39 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CE39 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CE39 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CE39 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CE39 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CE39 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CE39 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CE39 ~                            ret
  56++CE39                      ELSE
  57++CE39 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CE3C 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CE3E 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CE3F 32 96 7E                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CE42 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CE44 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CE45 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CE46 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CE47                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CE47 CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CE49 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CE4B 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CE4C E5                           push	hl
  68++CE4D C5                           push	bc
  69++CE4E CD 08 CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CE51                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CE51 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CE52 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CE53 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CE54 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CE55 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CE56 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CE58 C9                           ret
  78++CE59                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 775+ CE59              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"
 776+ CE59              ;-LL91---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 777+ CE59
 778+ CE59              ; Now we have
 779+ CE59              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 780+ CE59              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 781+ CE59              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 782+ CE59              ;
 783+ CE59              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 784+ CE59                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CE59              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CE59
   3++CE59              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CE59              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CE59              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CE59              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CE59              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CE59              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CE59              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CE59              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CE59              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CE59              ;        sla      a
  13++CE59              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CE59              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CE59              ;        inc     hl
  16++CE59              ;        inc     hl
  17++CE59              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CE59              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CE59              ;        ret
  20++CE59
  21++CE59
  22++CE59              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CE59              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CE59              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CE59              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CE59              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CE59              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CE59              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CE59              ; OUTPUT
  30++CE59              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CE59              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CE59              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CE59              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CE59 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CE5C ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CE60 ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CE64 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CE67 ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CE6B ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CE6F 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CE72 ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CE76 ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CE7A 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CE7D ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CE81 ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CE85 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CE88 ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CE8C ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CE90 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CE93 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CE97 ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CE9B C9                   ret
  53++CE9C
  54++CE9C
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 785+ CE9C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 786+ CE9C              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 787+ CE9C              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 788+ CE9C              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 789+ CE9C              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 790+ CE9C              ; Returns
 791+ CE9C              ;
 792+ CE9C              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 793+ CE9C              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 794+ CE9C              ;
 795+ CE9C              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 796+ CE9C              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 797+ CE9C              ;
 798+ CE9C              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 799+ CE9C              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 800+ CE9C              ; TESTEDOK
 801+ CE9C              XX12DotOneRow:
 802+ CE9C              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 802+ CE9C 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 802+ CE9F 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 802+ CEA0 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 802+ CEA1 57          >                        ld      d,a
 802+ CEA2 ED 30       >                        mul
 802+ CEA4 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 802+ CEA5 32 B2 7E    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 803+ CEA8 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 804+ CEA9              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 804+ CEA9 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 804+ CEAC AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 805+ CEAD 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 806+ CEB0 23                                   inc     hl
 807+ CEB1              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 807+ CEB1 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 807+ CEB4 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 807+ CEB5 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 807+ CEB6 57          >                        ld      d,a
 807+ CEB7 ED 30       >                        mul
 807+ CEB9 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 807+ CEBA 32 96 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 808+ CEBD                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 808+ CEBD 3A B2 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 808+ CEC0 32 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 809+ CEC3 23                                   inc     hl
 810+ CEC4                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 810+ CEC4 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 810+ CEC7 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 811+ CEC8              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 812+ CEC8 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 813+ CEC9 CD 53 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 814+ CECC E1                                   pop     hl
 815+ CECD 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 816+ CED0 23                                   inc     hl
 817+ CED1              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 817+ CED1 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 817+ CED4 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 817+ CED5 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 817+ CED6 57          >                        ld      d,a
 817+ CED7 ED 30       >                        mul
 817+ CED9 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 817+ CEDA 32 96 7E    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 818+ CEDD                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 818+ CEDD 3A B2 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 818+ CEE0 32 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 819+ CEE3 23                                   inc     hl
 820+ CEE4                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 820+ CEE4 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 820+ CEE7 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 821+ CEE8              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 822+ CEE8 CD 53 9B                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 823+ CEEB              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 824+ CEEB C9                                   ret
 825+ CEEC
 826+ CEEC
 827+ CEEC                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 828+ CEEC
 829+ CEEC              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 830+ CEEC              ;TESTED OK
 831+ CEEC              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 832+ CEEC              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 833+ CEEC 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 834+ CEEF 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 835+ CEF2 CD 9C CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 836+ CEF5 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 837+ CEF8 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 838+ CEFB 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 839+ CEFE 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 840+ CF01 CD 9C CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 841+ CF04 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 842+ CF07 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 843+ CF0A 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 844+ CF0D 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 845+ CF10 CD 9C CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 846+ CF13 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 847+ CF16 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)
 848+ CF19 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 849+ CF1C C9                                   ret
 850+ CF1D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 851+ CF1D                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CF1D              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CF1D              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++CF1D                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++CF1D 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12)
   3++CF20 32 9A C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a
   4++CF23                      ldCopyByte XX12+1       ,XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++CF23 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+1)
   4++CF26 32 9C C0    >                        ld       (XX18+2),a
   5++CF29                      ldCopyByte XX12+2       ,XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++CF29 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   5++CF2C 32 9D C0    >                        ld       (XX18+3),a
   6++CF2F                      ldCopyByte XX12+3       ,XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++CF2F 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++CF32 32 9F C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++CF35                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++CF35 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   7++CF38 32 A0 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+6),a
   8++CF3B                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++CF3B 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+5)
   8++CF3E 32 A2 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+8),a
   9++CF41 C9                   ret

   1++CF8C 2A 20 C0     LoadCraftToCamera:      ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)            ; UBnKxlo, UBnKxhi
   2++CF8F ED 5B 22 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxsgn)           ; UBnKxsgn, UBnKylo
   3++CF93 ED 4B 24 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnKyhi)            ; UBnKyhi, UBnKysgn
   4++CF97 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl    ; UBnkDrawCam0xLo, UBnkDrawCam0xHi
   5++CF9A ED 53 9C C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xSgn),de   ; UBnkDrawCam0xSgn,UBnkDrawCam0yLo
   6++CF9E ED 43 9E C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yHi),bc    ; UBnkDrawCam0yHi, UBnkDrawCam0ySgn
   7++CFA2

  16++CFAF C9                                   ret
  17++CFB0
  18++CFB0 2A 9A C0     CopyCameraToXX15Signed: ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  19++CFB3 3A 9C C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
  20++CFB6 B4                                   or  h
  21++CFB7 67                                   ld  h,a
  22++CFB8 22 A6 C0                             ld  (UBnkXScaled),hl
  23++CFBB 2A 9D C0                             ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  24++CFBE 3A 9F C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
  25++CFC1 B4                                   or  h
  26++CFC2 67                                   ld  h,a
  27++CFC3 22 A8 C0                             ld  (UBnkYScaled),hl
  28++CFC6 2A A0 C0                             ld  hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  29++CFC9 3A A2 C0                             ld  a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)
  30++CFCC B4                                   or  h
  31++CFCD 67                                   ld  h,a
  32++CFCE 22 AA C0                             ld  (UBnkZScaled),hl
  33++CFD1 C9                                   ret
  34++CFD2
  35++CFD2              ;;;CopyXX18ScaledToXX15:
  36++CFD2              ;;;CopyDrawCamToScaledMatrix:
  37++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zSgn, UBnkZScaledSign   ; XX18+8 => XX15+5
  38++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo,  UBnkXScaled       ; XX18+0 => XX15+0
  39++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xSgn, UBnkXScaledSign   ; XX18+2 => XX15+1
  40++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo,  UBnkYScaled       ; XX18+3 => XX15+2
  41++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0ySgn, UBnkYScaledSign   ; XX18+5 => XX15+3
  42++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo,  UBnkZScaled       ; XX18+6 => XX15+4
  43++CFD2              ;;;        ret
  44++CFD2
  45++CFD2              ;;;CopyXX15ToXX18Scaled:
  46++CFD2              ;;;CopyScaledMatrixToDrawCam:
  47++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkZScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0zSgn  ; XX15+5 => XX18+8
  48++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0xLo   ; XX15+0 => XX18+0
  49++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkXScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0xSgn  ; XX15+1 => XX18+2
  50++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0yLo   ; XX15+2 => XX18+3
  51++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkYScaledSign,   UBnkDrawCam0ySgn  ; XX15+3 => XX18+5
  52++CFD2              ;;;        ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled,       UBnkDrawCam0zLo   ; XX15+4 => XX18+6
  53++CFD2              ;;;        ret
  54++CFD2
  55++CFD2
  56++CFD2              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  57++CFD2              LL94Z:
  58++CFD2 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++CFD4 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++CFD6 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++CFD9 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++CFDA 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++CFDD 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++CFDE 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++CFE1 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++CFE2 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++CFE5 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++CFE6 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++CFE9 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++CFEA 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++CFEB 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++CFEC 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++CFEF 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++CFF0 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  75++CFF3              LL94X:
  76++CFF3 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  77++CFF5 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  78++CFF7 3A A6 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  79++CFFA 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  80++CFFB 3A A7 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  81++CFFE 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++CFFF 3A 9A C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  83++D002 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  84++D003 3A 9C C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  85++D006 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  86++D007 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  87++D00A 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  88++D00B 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  89++D00C 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  90++D00D 32 A7 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  91++D010 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  92++D011 32 A6 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  93++D014              LL94Y:
  94++D014 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  95++D016 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  96++D018 3A A8 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  97++D01B 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  98++D01C 3A A9 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                                     ;
  99++D01F 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 100++D020 3A 9D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
 101++D023 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
 102++D024 3A 9F C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
 103++D027 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
 104++D028 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
 105++D02B 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 106++D02C 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
 107++D02D 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 108++D02E 32 A9 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
 109++D031 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
 110++D032 32 A8 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;
 111++D035 C9                   ret

 855+ D036                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D036              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D036              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D036                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D036 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D039 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D03C                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D03C 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D03F 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D042                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D042 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D045 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D048 C9                   ret
   7++D049
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 856+ D049              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 857+ D049                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D049              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D049              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D049              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D049              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D049              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D049              ;;; R = T
   7++D049              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D049              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D049              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D049              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D049              ;;; R = T
  12++D049              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D049
  14++D049
  15++D049
  16++D049
  17++D049
  18++D049              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D049 ~            						mul
  20++D049 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D049              						ENDM
  22++D049              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D049 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D04C                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D04C A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D04D CA 6A D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D050 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D051 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D054 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D055                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D055 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D056 CA 6A D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D059 ED 30        		mul
  30++D05B 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D05C 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D05F 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D062 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D063 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D065 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D067 C3 6E D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D06A              dotxskipzero:
  38++D06A AF                   xor         a
  39++D06B 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D06C FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D06E              dotmuly:
  42++D06E              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D06E 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D071                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D071 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D072 CA 91 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D075 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D076 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D079                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D079 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D07A CA 91 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D07D 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D07E ED 30                mul
  50++D080 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D081 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D083 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D086 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D089 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D08A E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D08C DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D08E C3 95 D0             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D091              dotyskipzero:
  59++D091 AF                   xor         a
  60++D092 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D093 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D095              dotaddxy:
  63++D095              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D095 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D097 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D098 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D09A 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D09B FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D09D 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D09E CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D0A1 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D0A2 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D0A5                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D0A5 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D0A6 CA CB D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D0A9 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D0AA 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D0AD                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D0AD A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D0AE CA CB D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D0B1 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D0B2 ED 30                mul
  79++D0B4 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D0B5 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D0B8 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D0BB AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D0BC E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D0BE 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D0BF E1                   pop         hl
  86++D0C0 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D0C1 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D0C3 CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D0C6 32 98 7E             ld          (varS),a
  90++D0C9 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D0CA C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D0CB              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D0CB 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D0CC 32 98 7E             ld          (varS),a
  95++D0CF 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D0D0 C9                   ret
  97++D0D1              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D0D1              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D0D1              ;;;;		mul
 104++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D0D1              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D0D1              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D0D1              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D0D1              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D0D1              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D0D1              ;;;;       mul
 117++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D0D1              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D0D1              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D0D1              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D0D1              ;;;;       mul
 132++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D0D1              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D0D1              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D0D1              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D0D1              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D0D1              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D0D1              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D0D1
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 858+ D0D1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 859+ D0D1              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 860+ D0D1              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 861+ D0D1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 862+ D0D1                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D0D1              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D0D1              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D0D1 3A 09 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D0D4 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D0D5              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D0D5 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D0D8 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D0D9                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D0D9 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D0DA C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D0DB              LL90Loop:
  10++D0DB              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D0DB 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D0DC                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D0DC 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D0DF CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D0E1 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D0E3 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D0E6                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D0E6 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D0E9 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D0EB CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D0ED 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D0F0                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D0F0 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D0F3 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D0F5 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D0F7 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D0FA 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D0FB                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D0FB A7          >                        and     a
  16++D0FC C2 DB D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D0FF C9                   ret
  18++D100
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 863+ D100              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 864+ D100
 865+ D100              ; Backface cull
 866+ D100              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 867+ D100              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 868+ D100              ;
 869+ D100                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D100 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D101 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D102 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D104 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D107 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D108 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D10A 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D10B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D10D 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D110 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D111 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D113 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D115 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D118 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D119 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D11A 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D11D 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D11E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D11F 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D122 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D123 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D124 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D127 C9                                   ret
  24++D128
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 870+ D128                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D128 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D129 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D12A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D12C 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D12F 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D130 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D132 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D133 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D135 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D138 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D139 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D13B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D13D 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D140 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D141 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D142 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;

  18++D146 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D147 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;

  23++D14F C9                                   ret
  24++D150
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 871+ D150              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 872+ D150              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 873+ D150              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 874+ D150              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 875+ D150              ; return if no faces
 876+ D150              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 877+ D150              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 878+ D150              ; While Z hi <> 0
 879+ D150              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 880+ D150              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 881+ D150              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 882+ D150              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 883+ D150              ; Loop
 884+ D150              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 885+ D150              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 886+ D150              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 887+ D150              ; For each face
 888+ D150              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 889+ D150              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 890+ D150              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 891+ D150              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 892+ D150              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 893+ D150              ;        else
 894+ D150              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 895+ D150              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 896+ D150              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 897+ D150              ;           While X >= 0
 898+ D150              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 899+ D150              ;              if  x >= 0
 900+ D150              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 901+ D150              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 902+ D150              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 903+ D150              ;           loop
 904+ D150              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 905+ D150              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 906+ D150              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 907+ D150              ;               X = 1
 908+ D150              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 909+ D150              ;           else
 910+ D150              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 911+ D150              ;           endif
 912+ D150              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 913+ D150              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 914+ D150              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 915+ D150              ;               X = 1
 916+ D150              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 917+ D150              ;           else
 918+ D150              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 919+ D150              ;           endif
 920+ D150              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 921+ D150              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 922+ D150              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 923+ D150              ;               X = 1
 924+ D150              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 925+ D150              ;           else
 926+ D150              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 927+ D150              ;           endif
 928+ D150              ;        endif
 929+ D150              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 930+ D150              ;        if dot product < 0
 931+ D150              ;           set face visible
 932+ D150              ;        else
 933+ D150              ;           set face invisible
 934+ D150              ;        end if
 935+ D150              ;     else
 936+ D150              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 937+ D150              ;     end if
 938+ D150              ; Next Face
 939+ D150
 940+ D150              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 941+ D150
 942+ D150              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 943+ D150              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 944+ D150              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 945+ D150              ;
 946+ D150              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 947+ D150              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 948+ D150              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 949+ D150              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 950+ D150              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 951+ D150                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D150              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D150                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D150               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D150 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D151              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D151              ; EE29:
   7++D151
   8++D151              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D151              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D151              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D151              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D151              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D151              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D151              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D151              ;
  16++D151              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D151              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D151              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D151              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D151              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D151              ;
  22++D151              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D151              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D151              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D151              ;
  26++D151              ; so
  27++D151              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D151              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D151              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D151              ;
  31++D151              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D151              ;
  33++D151              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D151              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D151              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D151              ;
  37++D151
  38++D151
  39++D151
  40++D151 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D154                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D154 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D155 CA 81 D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone

  46++D165                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D165 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D167 CB 1D       >			   rr  l

  91++D1BF ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D1BF ~                                        srl     a
  93++D1BF ~                                        srl     a

 179++D274              ; Add normal to XX15
 180++D274              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 181++D274              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 182++D274              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 183++D274              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
