 196++D2AD CD 53 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 197++D2B0 DA 1F D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 198++D2B3 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 199++D2B6                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 199++D2B6 3A 98 7E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D2B9 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 200++D2BC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 200++D2BC 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 200++D2BF 32 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 201++D2C2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 201++D2C2 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 201++D2C5 32 98 7E    >                        ld       (varS),a
 202++D2C8                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 202++D2C8 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 202++D2CB 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 203++D2CE 3A 9F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 204++D2D1 CD 53 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 205++D2D4 DA 1F D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 206++D2D7 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 207++D2DA                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 207++D2DA 3A 98 7E    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 207++D2DD 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 208++D2E0              ; calculate dot product LL89
 209++D2E0              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 209++D2E0 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 209++D2E3 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D2E6 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 211++D2E9 CD BE 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 212++D2EC 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D2EF 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 214++D2F2 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 215++D2F5 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 216++D2F6 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 217++D2F9                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 217++D2F9 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 217++D2FC 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 218++D2FF 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 219++D302 CD BE 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 220++D305 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D308                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 221++D308 3A B2 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 221++D30B 32 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 222++D30E 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 223++D311 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 224++D314 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 225++D315 CD 53 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 226++D318 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D31B                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 227++D31B 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 227++D31E 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 228++D321 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 229++D324 CD BE 9A                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 230++D327 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D32A                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 231++D32A 3A B2 7E    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 231++D32D 32 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),a
 232++D330 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 233++D333 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 234++D336 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 235++D337 CD 53 9B                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 236++D33A FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 237++D33C 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 238++D33E 3A 98 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 239++D341 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 240++D344 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 241++D346 3A 50 D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 242++D349 CD DA CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 243++D34C C3 55 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 244++D34F 3A 50 D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 245++D352 CD D1 CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 246++D355 21 50 D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 247++D358 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 248++D359 C1                                   pop         bc
 249++D35A E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 250++D35B 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 251++D35D ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 252++D35F 22 9C 7D                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 253++D362 05                                   dec         b
 254++D363 C2 FF D1                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 255++D366 C9                                   ret
 256++D367
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm

 954+ D367              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:

 959+ D375              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 960+ D375              NodeXPositiveX:
 961+ D375 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 962+ D376 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 963+ D378 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo

 965+ D37D 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 966+ D37E 22 A6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 967+ D381 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 968+ D382 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 969+ D385 C3 A4 D3             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 970+ D388              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 971+ D388              NodeNegativeX:

 978+ D396              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 979+ D396              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 980+ D396 CD 5D 92             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 981+ D399 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2

 983+ D39E 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2

1050+ D411              LL56Overflow:

1169+ D4DC 3A 95 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1170+ D4DF 67                   ld          h,a
1171+ D4E0 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1172+ D4E2 ED 31                add         hl,a
1173+ D4E4 EB                   ex          de,hl
1174+ D4E5 C3 F8 D4             jp          LL50
1175+ D4E8              NegativeYPoint:
1176+ D4E8              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1177+ D4E8 3A 97 7E             ld          a,(varR)
1178+ D4EB 6F                   ld          l,a
1179+ D4EC 3A 95 7E             ld          a,(varU)
1180+ D4EF 67                   ld          h,a
1181+ D4F0 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1182+ D4F2 06 00                ld          b,0
1183+ D4F4                      ClearCarryFlag
1183+ D4F4 B7          >                        or a
1184+ D4F5 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1185+ D4F7 EB                   ex          de,hl
1186+ D4F8              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1187+ D4F8 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1188+ D4FB FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1189+ D4FE FD 23                inc         iy
1190+ D500 FD 23                inc         iy
1191+ D502 C9                   ret
1192+ D503              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1193+ D503              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1194+ D503              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1195+ D503              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1196+ D503              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1197+ D503              CopyNodeToXX15:
1198+ D503                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1198+ D503 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1198+ D504 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1199+ D507 23                   inc         hl
1200+ D508                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1200+ D508 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1200+ D509 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1201+ D50C 23                   inc         hl
1202+ D50D                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1202+ D50D 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1202+ D50E 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1203+ D511 23                   inc         hl
1204+ D512              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1205+ D512              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1206+ D512 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1207+ D513 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1208+ D514 47                   ld          b,a
1209+ D515 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1210+ D517 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1211+ D51A 78                   ld          a,b
1212+ D51B E6 40                and         $40
1213+ D51D CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1214+ D51F 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1215+ D522 78                   ld          a,b
1216+ D523 E6 20                and         $20
1217+ D525 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1218+ D527 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1219+ D529 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1220+ D52C 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1221+ D52D E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1222+ D52F 32 B2 7E             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1223+ D532 C9                   ret
1224+ D533
1225+ D533              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1226+ D533              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1227+ D533              ;..............................................................................................................................
1228+ D533              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1229+ D533              LL48GetScale:
1230+ D533 3A 88 7D             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1231+ D536 5F                   ld          e,a
1232+ D537 CD 03 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1233+ D53A              LL48GetVertices:
1234+ D53A              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1235+ D53A                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1235+ D53A BB          >                        cp      e
1235+ D53B DA 78 D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1236+ D53E              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1237+ D53E                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1237+ D53E 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1237+ D53F 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1237+ D540 32 97 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1238+ D543 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1239+ D544 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1240+ D546 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1241+ D547                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1241+ D547 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1241+ D54A ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1241+ D54C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1242+ D54D E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1243+ D54E                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1243+ D54E A7          >                        and     a
1243+ D54F C2 7E D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1244+ D552              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1245+ D552 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1246+ D553 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1247+ D555 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1248+ D557                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1248+ D557 A7          >                        and     a
1248+ D558 C2 7E D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1249+ D55B              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1250+ D55B                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1250+ D55B 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1250+ D55C 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1250+ D55D 32 97 7D    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1251+ D560 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1252+ D561 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1253+ D563 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1254+ D564                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1254+ D564 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1254+ D567 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1254+ D569 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1255+ D56A E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1256+ D56B                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1256+ D56B A7          >                        and     a
1256+ D56C C2 7E D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1257+ D56F              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1258+ D56F 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1259+ D570 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1260+ D572 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1261+ D574                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1261+ D574 A7          >                        and     a
1261+ D575 C2 7E D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1262+ D578              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1263+ D578 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1264+ D57B FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1265+ D57D                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1266+ D57D C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1267+ D57E              NodeIsVisible:
1268+ D57E              LL49:
1269+ D57E CD 25 D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1270+ D581 C9                   ret
1271+ D582
1272+ D582                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1273+ D582
1274+ D582              ProjectNodeToEye:
1275+ D582 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1276+ D586 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1277+ D587 32 96 7E         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1278+ D58A 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1279+ D58D CD C6 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1280+ D590 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1281+ D593                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1281+ D593 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1281+ D595 C2 A0 D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1282+ D598              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1283+ D598 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1284+ D59A 26 00            ld          h,0
1285+ D59C 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1286+ D59D C3 A7 D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1287+ D5A0              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1288+ D5A0 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1289+ D5A2 26 00            ld          h,0
1290+ D5A4                  ClearCarryFlag
1290+ D5A4 B7          >                        or a
1291+ D5A5 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1292+ D5A7              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1293+ D5A7 EB               ex          de,hl
1294+ D5A8 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1295+ D5AB FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1296+ D5AE              EyeProcessYPoint:
1297+ D5AE ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1298+ D5B2 79               ld          a,c
1299+ D5B3 32 96 7E         ld          (varQ),a
1300+ D5B6 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1301+ D5B9 CD C6 94         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1302+ D5BC 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1303+ D5BF                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1303+ D5BF CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1303+ D5C1 C2 CC D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1304+ D5C4              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1305+ D5C4 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1306+ D5C6                  ClearCarryFlag
1306+ D5C6 B7          >                        or a
1307+ D5C7 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1308+ D5C9 C3 D1 D5         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1309+ D5CC              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1310+ D5CC 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1311+ D5CE 26 00            ld          h,0
1312+ D5D0 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1313+ D5D1              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1314+ D5D1 EB               ex          de,hl
1315+ D5D2 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1316+ D5D5 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1317+ D5D8 C9               ret
1318+ D5D9
1319+ D5D9
1320+ D5D9
1321+ D5D9              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1322+ D5D9              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1323+ D5D9              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1324+ D5D9              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1325+ D5D9              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1326+ D5D9              ; which can be simplified as:
1327+ D5D9              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1328+ D5D9              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1329+ D5D9              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1330+ D5D9              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1331+ D5D9              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1332+ D5D9              ;      Roll calculations:
1333+ D5D9              ;
1334+ D5D9              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1335+ D5D9              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1336+ D5D9              ;      Pitch calculations:
1337+ D5D9              ;
1338+ D5D9              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1339+ D5D9              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1340+ D5D9
1341+ D5D9
1342+ D5D9              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1343+ D5D9                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D5D9
   2++D5D9              ; Full version
   3++D5D9              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D5D9              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D5D9              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D5D9              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D5D9
   8++D5D9
   9++D5D9              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D5D9 ~                                    push    bc
  11++D5D9 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D5D9 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D5D9 ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D5D9 ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D5D9 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D5D9 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D5D9 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D5D9 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D5D9 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D5D9 ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D5D9 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D5D9 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D5D9 ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D5D9 ~                                    ret
  25++D5D9 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D5D9 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D5D9 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D5D9 ~                                    or      a
  29++D5D9 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D5D9 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D5D9 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D5D9 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D5D9 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D5D9 ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D5D9 ~                                    ret
  36++D5D9 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D5D9 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D5D9 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D5D9 ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D5D9 ~                                    ret
  41++D5D9                                      ENDM
  42++D5D9
  43++D5D9
  44++D5D9              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D5D9 C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D5DA 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D5DB 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D5DE 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D5DF 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D5E0 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D5E1 FA F2 D5    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D5E4             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D5E4 ED 5B 98 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D5E8 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D5EB 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D5EC 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D5EF 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D5F0 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D5F1 C9          >                        ret
  44++D5F2             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D5F2 ED 5B 98 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D5F6 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D5F9 B7          >                        or      a
  44++D5FA ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D5FC 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D5FE 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D5FF 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D602 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D604 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D605 C9          >                        ret
  44++D606             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D606 AF          >                    xor a
  44++D607 95          >                    sub l
  44++D608 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D609 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D60A 94          >                    sub h
  44++D60B 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D60C 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D60F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D610 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D611 C9          >                        ret
  45++D612
  46++D612              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D612 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D613 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D614 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D617 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D618 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D619 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D61A FA 2B D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D61D             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D61D ED 5B 98 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D621 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D624 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D625 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D628 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D629 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D62A C9          >                        ret
  46++D62B             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D62B ED 5B 98 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D62F 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D632 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D633 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D635 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D637 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D638 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D63B EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D63D C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D63E C9          >                        ret
  46++D63F             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D63F AF          >                    xor a
  46++D640 95          >                    sub l
  46++D641 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D642 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D643 94          >                    sub h
  46++D644 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D645 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D648 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D649 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D64A C9          >                        ret
  47++D64B
  48++D64B              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D64B C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D64C 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D64D 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D650 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D651 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D652 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D653 FA 64 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D656             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D656 ED 5B 98 7D >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D65A 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D65D 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D65E 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D661 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D662 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D663 C9          >                        ret
  48++D664             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D664 ED 5B 98 7D >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D668 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D66B B7          >                        or      a
  48++D66C ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D66E 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D670 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D671 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D674 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D676 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D677 C9          >                        ret
  48++D678             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D678 AF          >                    xor a
  48++D679 95          >                    sub l
  48++D67A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D67B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D67C 94          >                    sub h
  48++D67D 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D67E 22 98 7D    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D681 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D682 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D683 C9          >                        ret
  49++D684
  50++D684              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D684 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D687              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D687              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D687              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D687
  56++D687              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D687              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D687 3A B0 7D     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D68A 21 A4 7D                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D68D B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D68E CA 4A D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D691                                      ;break
  63++D691              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  64++D691 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  65++D692 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  66++D695 CD 49 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  67++D698 32 99 7D                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  68++D69B 22 97 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  69++D69E              ; A = Flip sign
  70++D69E 3A B1 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  71++D6A1 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  72++D6A4 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  73++D6A5              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  74++D6A5 CD 12 D6                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  75++D6A8              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  76++D6A8 32 86 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  77++D6AB 22 84 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  78++D6AE              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  79++D6AE 3A A4 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  80++D6B1 5F                                   ld      e,a
  81++D6B2 CD 49 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  82++D6B5 32 99 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  83++D6B8 22 97 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
  84++D6BB              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  85++D6BB 3A 86 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  86++D6BE 5F                                   ld      e,a
  87++D6BF 3A A5 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)
  88++D6C2 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  89++D6C3              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  90++D6C3 CD 4B D6                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
  91++D6C6 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
  92++D6C9 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
  93++D6CC              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
  94++D6CC 3A A4 7D                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
  95++D6CF 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D6D0 CD 49 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
  97++D6D3 32 99 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
  98++D6D6 22 97 7D                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
  99++D6D9              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 100++D6D9 3A 86 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 101++D6DC 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 102++D6DF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 103++D6E0 3A A5 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 104++D6E3 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 105++D6E4 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 106++D6E5 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 107++D6E8 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 108++D6E9 F2 F8 D6                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 109++D6EC 2A 98 7D                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 110++D6EF ED 5B 84 D6                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 111++D6F3 B7                                   or      a
 112++D6F4 19                                   add     hl,de
 113++D6F5 C3 12 D7                             jp      .MV44
 114++D6F8 2A 84 D6     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 115++D6FB ED 5B 98 7D                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 116++D6FF B7                                   or      a
 117++D700 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 118++D702 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 119++D704                                      NegHL
 119++D704 AF          >                    xor a
 119++D705 95          >                    sub l
 119++D706 6F          >                    ld l,a
 119++D707 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 119++D708 94          >                    sub h
 119++D709 67          >                    ld h,a
 120++D70A 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and suns are sign + 23 bit xpos
 121++D70D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122++D70F 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 123++D712              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 124++D712 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 125++D715 3A B0 7D                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 126++D718 5F                                   ld      e,a
 127++D719 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 128++D71C CD 49 90                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 129++D71F 32 99 7D                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 130++D722 22 97 7D                             ld      (varP),hl
 131++D725 3A B2 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 132++D728 5F                                   ld      e,a
 133++D729 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 134++D72C AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 135++D72D CD D9 D5                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 136++D730 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 137++D733 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 138++D736                                      ;break
 139++D736                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
 140++D736                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 140++D736             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 140++D736 3A AF 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 140++D739 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 140++D73C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 140++D73C 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 140++D73F 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D742             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 140++D742 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D745 32 97 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 140++D748 3A 36 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 140++D74B EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 140++D74D CD CE 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 140++D750 ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 140++D754             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 140++D754 2A 35 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 140++D757 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 140++D75A 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 140++D75D CD CE 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 140++D760 ED 53 35 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 141++D764                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 141++D764             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 141++D764 3A AF 7D    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 141++D767 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 141++D76A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 141++D76A 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 141++D76D 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D770             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 141++D770 3A 29 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D773 32 97 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 141++D776 3A 2A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 141++D779 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 141++D77B CD CE 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 141++D77E ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 141++D782             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 141++D782 2A 29 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 141++D785 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 141++D788 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 141++D78B CD CE 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 141++D78E ED 53 29 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 142++D792                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:

 142++D7A4 3A 30 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 142++D7A7 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 142++D7A9 CD CE 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 142++D7AC ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 142++D7B0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 142++D7B0 2A 2F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)

 142++D7BC ED 53 2F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 143++D7C0                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:

 144++D7EE             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)

 144++D80C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 144++D80C 2A 2D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)

 144++D812 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 144++D815 CD CE 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 144++D818 ED 53 2D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 145++D81C                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY    ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 145++D81C             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 145++D81C 3A A2 7D    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 145++D81F 32 96 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 145++D822             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 145++D822 2A 31 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 145++D825 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 145++D828             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 145++D828 3A 33 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 145++D82B 32 97 7D    >                        ld       (varP),a
 145++D82E 3A 34 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 145++D831 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 145++D833 CD CE 8F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 145++D836 ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 145++D83A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 145++D83A 2A 33 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 145++D83D 22 97 7E    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 145++D840 3A 32 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 145++D843 CD CE 8F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 145++D846 ED 53 33 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 146++D84A 3A 90 7E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 147++D84D 16 00                                ld      d,0
 148++D84F 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 149++D850 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 150++D853 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 151++D856 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 152++D857 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 153++D859 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 154++D85C 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 155++D85F 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 156++D862 C9                                   ret

1344+ D863                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D863
   2++D863              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D863              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D863              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D863              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D863 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D863 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D863 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D863 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D863 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D863 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D863 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D863 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D863 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D863 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D863 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D863 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D863 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D863                                      ENDM
  20++D863
  21++D863              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D863 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D863 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D863 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D863 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D863 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D863 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D863 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D863 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D863 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D863 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D863 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D863 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D863 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D863 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D863                                      ENDM
  37++D863
  38++D863
  39++D863              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D863              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D863              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D863 3A 49 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D866 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D868 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D86A                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D86A 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D86B E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D86D CA AF D8    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D870 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D871 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D873 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D874 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D877 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D878 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D87A 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D87B 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D87E B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D87F 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  46++D882                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D882 21 2F C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D885 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D888 21 35 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D88B 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D88E CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D891 21 31 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D894 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D897 21 37 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D89A 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D89D CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D8A0 21 33 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D8A3 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D8A6 21 39 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D8A9 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D8AC CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D8AF 3A 48 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D8B2 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D8B4 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D8B6                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D8B6 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D8B7 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D8B9 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D8BA C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D8BB 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D8BC E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D8BE 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D8BF 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D8C2 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++D8C3 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++D8C5 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++D8C6 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++D8C9 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++D8CA 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++D8CD 21 2F C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++D8D0 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++D8D3 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++D8D6 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++D8D9 CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++D8DC 21 31 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++D8DF 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++D8E2 21 2B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++D8E5 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++D8E8 CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++D8EB 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++D8EE 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++D8F1 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++D8F4 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++D8F7 CD FB D8                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++D8FA C9                                   ret
  82++D8FB
  83++D8FB
  84++D8FB
  85++D8FB              ; Roate around axis
  86++D8FB              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++D8FB              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++D8FB              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++D8FB              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++D8FB              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++D8FB              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++D8FB              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++D8FB              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++D8FB              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++D8FB 2A 7C 7D     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++D8FE 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++D8FF 23                                   inc     hl
  98++D900 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++D901 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++D902 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++D903 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++D905 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++D907 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++D908 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++D90A CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++D90C 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++D90D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++D90F 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++D910 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++D911 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++D914              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++D914 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++D915 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++D916 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a
 115++D919 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++D91A 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++D91D              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++D91D 2A 7E 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++D920 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++D921 23                                   inc     hl
 121++D922 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++D923 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++D924 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++D926 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++D928 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++D929 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++D92B 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++D92C                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++D92C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++D92E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++D930                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++D930 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++D932 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++D934                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++D934 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++D936 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++D938                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++D938 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++D93A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++D93C 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++D93F FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++D941 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++D943 B2                                   or      d
 136++D944 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++D945              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++D945              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++D945              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++D945              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++D945 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++D946                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++D946              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++D946 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++D949 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++D94A              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++D94A              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++D94A 2A 7E 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++D94D 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++D94E 23                                   inc     hl
 151++D94F 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++D950 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++D951 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++D952 E6 80                                and     $80
 155++D954 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++D956 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++D957 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++D959 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++D95B 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++D95C FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++D95E 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++D95F B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++D960 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++D963              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++D963 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++D964 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++D965 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++D968 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++D969 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++D96B 32 B2 7E                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++D96E              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++D96E 2A 7C 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++D971              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++D971 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++D972 23                                   inc     hl
 176++D973 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++D974 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++D975 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++D977 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++D979 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++D97A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++D97C 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++D97D                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++D97D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++D97F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++D981                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++D981 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++D983 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++D985                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++D985 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++D987 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++D989                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++D989 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++D98B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++D98D 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++D990 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++D992 E6 80                                and     $80
 190++D994 B2                                   or      d
 191++D995 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++D996              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++D996              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++D996              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++D996 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++D997              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++D997 CD 10 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++D99A              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++D99A EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++D99B 2A 7E 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++D99E 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++D99F 23                                   inc     hl
 203++D9A0 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++D9A1              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++D9A1 D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++D9A2 2A 7C 7D                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++D9A5 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++D9A6 23                                   inc     hl
 209++D9A7 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++D9A8 C9                                   ret
 211++D9A9
 212++D9A9
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
