  63++DA99                                      ; bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color)
  64++DA99 3E D5                                ld	    a, $D5 ; colour
  65++DA9B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
  65++DA9B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  66++DA9F CD AB FC     LateLine:               call    l2_draw_elite_line; l2_draw_diagonal
  67++DAA2 FD E1 D1 C1                          pop     hl,,bc,,de,,iy
  67++DAA6 E1
  68++DAA7
  69++DAA7
  70++DAA7 FD E1 E1     LateNoLineToDraw:       pop   hl,,iy
  71++DAAA FD 25                                dec   iyh
  72++DAAC 20 BA                                jr	nz, LateDrawLinesLoop
  73++DAAE C9                                   ret                                     ; --- Wireframe end  \ LL118-1
# file closed: ././ModelRender/DrawLines.asm
1347+ DAAF              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1348+ DAAF
1349+ DAAF              ; DIot seem to lawyas have Y = 0???
1350+ DAAF              ProcessDot:            ; break
1351+ DAAF CD D4 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1352+ DAB2 CD 30 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1353+ DAB5 CD 8C CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1354+ DAB8 CD 59 CE                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1355+ DABB 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
1356+ DABE 22 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),hl
1357+ DAC1 22 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),hl
1358+ DAC4 22 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),hl
1359+ DAC7 AF                                   xor     a
1360+ DAC8 CD 92 79                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1361+ DACB CD FD CC                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1362+ DACE CD 7A CD                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1363+ DAD1 FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1364+ DAD5 CD 82 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye
1365+ DAD8 C9                                   ret
1366+ DAD9
1367+ DAD9              ; .....................................................
1368+ DAD9              ; Plot Node points as part of debugging
1369+ DAD9 3A FF C3     PlotAllNodes:           ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1370+ DADC 4F           .GetActualVertexCount:  ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1371+ DADD 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1372+ DADE 16 06                                ld      d,6
1373+ DAE0 CD F6 94                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1374+ DAE3 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1375+ DAE4 FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1376+ DAE8 FD 5E 00     .PlotLoop:              ld      e,(iy)
1377+ DAEB FD 56 01                             ld      d,(iy+1)
1378+ DAEE FD 6E 02                             ld      l,(iy+2)
1379+ DAF1 FD 66 03                             ld      h,(iy+3)
1380+ DAF4 C5 FD E5                             push    bc,,iy
1381+ DAF7 CD 08 DB                             call    PlotAtDEHL
1382+ DAFA FD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,iy
1383+ DAFD FD 23                                inc     iy
1384+ DAFF FD 23                                inc     iy
1385+ DB01 FD 23                                inc     iy
1386+ DB03 FD 23                                inc     iy
1387+ DB05 10 E1                                djnz    .PlotLoop
1388+ DB07 C9                                   ret
1389+ DB08
1390+ DB08 7A           PlotAtDEHL:             ld      a,d
1391+ DB09 A7                                   and     a
1392+ DB0A C0                                   ret     nz
1393+ DB0B 7C                                   ld      a,h
1394+ DB0C A7                                   and     a
1395+ DB0D C0                                   ret     nz
1396+ DB0E 7D                                   ld      a,l
1397+ DB0F E6 80                                and     $80
1398+ DB11 C0                                   ret     nz
1399+ DB12                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1399+ DB12 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1400+ DB16 45                                   ld      b,l
1401+ DB17 4B                                   ld      c,e
1402+ DB18 3E 88                                ld      a,$88
1403+ DB1A CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
1404+ DB1D C9                                   ret
1405+ DB1E
1406+ DB1E
1407+ DB1E              ; .....................................................
1408+ DB1E              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1409+ DB1E              ; for each node:
1410+ DB1E              ;     see if node >
1411+ DB1E 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1412+ DB1F 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1413+ DB21 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1414+ DB23 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1415+ DB24              ProcessNodes:           ZeroA
1415+ DB24 AF          >                        xor a
1416+ DB25 32 EA C3                             ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1417+ DB28 CD D4 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat ; CopyRotToTransMacro                      ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1418+ DB2B CD 30 7A                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1419+ DB2E CD 8C CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1420+ DB31 CD 59 CE                             call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1421+ DB34 21 11 C4                             ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1422+ DB37 3A FF C3                             ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#9 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1423+ DB3A 4F           GetActualVertexCount:   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1424+ DB3B 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1425+ DB3C 16 06                                ld      d,6
1426+ DB3E CD F6 94                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1427+ DB41 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1428+ DB42 FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1429+ DB46              LL48:
1430+ DB46 C5           PointLoop:              push    bc                                  ; save counters
1431+ DB47 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1432+ DB48 FD E5                                push    iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1433+ DB4A 78                                   ld      a,b
1434+ DB4B                                      ;break
1435+ DB4B CD 03 D5                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1436+ DB4E 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1437+ DB51 CD 92 79                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1438+ DB54 CD FD CC                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1439+ DB57 CD 7A CD                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1440+ DB5A FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1441+ DB5C CD 82 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1442+ DB5F                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1443+ DB5F                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1444+ DB5F FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push    iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1445+ DB61 E1                                   pop     hl
1446+ DB62 3E 04                                ld      a,4
1447+ DB64 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1448+ DB66 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1449+ DB67 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
1450+ DB69 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1451+ DB6A 3E 06                                ld      a,6
1452+ DB6C ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1453+ DB6E C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back
1454+ DB6F 10 D5                                djnz    PointLoop
1455+ DB71              ; ......................................................
1456+ DB71                                      ClearCarryFlag
1456+ DB71 B7          >                        or a
1457+ DB72 C9                                   ret
1458+ DB73              ; ...........................................................
1459+ DB73 CD 87 D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1460+ DB76 3A 54 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1461+ DB79 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1462+ DB7B C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1463+ DB7C                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1463+ DB7C CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1463+ DB7E C2 BF DB    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1464+ DB81              ;............................................................
1465+ DB81              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1465+ DB81 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1465+ DB83 C8          >                        ret		z
1466+ DB84                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1466+ DB84 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1466+ DB86 CA AD DB    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1467+ DB89              ;............................................................
1468+ DB89 CD AF DA     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1469+ DB8C                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1469+ DB8C 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1469+ DB8F CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1470+ DB91 ED 4B F0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1471+ DB95 ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1472+ DB99 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1473+ DB9A B2                                   or      d                           ;
1474+ DB9B C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1475+ DB9C 7B                                   ld      a,e
1476+ DB9D E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1477+ DB9F C0                                   ret     nz
1478+ DBA0 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1479+ DBA1 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1480+ DBA3 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1481+ DBA5                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1481+ DBA5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1482+ DBA9 CD F8 E2                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1483+ DBAC C9                                   ret
1484+ DBAD              ;............................................................
1485+ DBAD CD 24 DB     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1486+ DBB0                                     ; break
1487+ DBB0                                  IFDEF PLOTPOINTSONLY
1488+ DBB0 ~                                    ld      a,$F6
1489+ DBB0 ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1490+ DBB0 ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1491+ DBB0                                  ELSE
1492+ DBB0 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
1493+ DBB2 32 B5 E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1494+ DBB5 CD CE D1                             call    CullV2
1495+ DBB8 CD 67 DD                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
1496+ DBBB CD 51 DA                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
1497+ DBBE                                  ENDIF
1498+ DBBE                                  IFDEF OVERLAYNODES
1499+ DBBE ~                                    ld      a,$CF
1500+ DBBE ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1501+ DBBE ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1502+ DBBE                                  ENDIF
1503+ DBBE                                  IFDEF FLIPBUFFERSTEST
1504+ DBBE ~                                    DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Enabled"
1505+ DBBE ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1506+ DBBE ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1507+ DBBE                                  ELSE
1508+ DBBE                                      DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Disabled"
1509+ DBBE                                  ENDIF
1510+ DBBE C9                                   ret
1511+ DBBF              ;............................................................
1512+ DBBF CD 24 DB     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1513+ DBC2                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1513+ DBC2 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1513+ DBC5 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1514+ DBC7 3A 5F C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1515+ DBCA C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1516+ DBCC DA 8E DC                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1517+ DBCF 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1518+ DBD2              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1518+ DBD2 3A 54 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1518+ DBD5 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1518+ DBD7 C8          >                        ret		z
1519+ DBD8              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1519+ DBD8 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1519+ DBDA C2 89 DB    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1520+ DBDD 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1521+ DBE0 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1522+ DBE1                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1522+ DBE1 FE 20       >                        cp      32
1522+ DBE3 DA EB DB    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1523+ DBE6 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1524+ DBE8 C3 F6 DB                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1525+ DBEB              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1525+ DBEB CB 25       >			   sla l
1525+ DBED CB 14       >			   rl  h
1526+ DBEF                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1526+ DBEF CB 25       >			   sla l
1526+ DBF1 CB 14       >			   rl  h
1527+ DBF3                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1527+ DBF3 37          >                        scf
1528+ DBF4 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1529+ DBF6 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1530+ DBF8 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1531+ DBF9 3A 5F C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1532+ DBFC                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1533+ DBFC ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1534+ DBFC ~                                    ld      b,h
1535+ DBFC ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1536+ DBFC ~                                    ld      d,a
1537+ DBFC ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1538+ DBFC                      ELSE
1539+ DBFC 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1540+ DBFD 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1541+ DBFF CD 3A 94                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1542+ DC02 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1543+ DC03                      ENDIF
1544+ DC03                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1544+ DC03 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1544+ DC05 DA 0D DC    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1545+ DC08 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1546+ DC0A C3 19 DC                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1547+ DC0D              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1547+ DC0D CB 23       >			   sla e
1547+ DC0F CB 12       >			   rl  d
1548+ DC11                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1548+ DC11 CB 23       >			   sla e
1548+ DC13 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1549+ DC15                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1549+ DC15 CB 23       >			   sla e
1549+ DC17 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1550+ DC19 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1551+ DC1A 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1552+ DC1D DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1553+ DC1F 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1554+ DC22 ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1555+ DC24 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1556+ DC26 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1557+ DC28 21 9A DC                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1558+ DC2B ED 31                                add     hl,a
1559+ DC2D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1560+ DC2E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1561+ DC30 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1562+ DC33                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1562+ DC33 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1562+ DC35 CA 3A DC    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1562+ DC38 ED 44       >                        neg
1562+ DC3A             >.DoneABSa:
1563+ DC3A CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1564+ DC3C CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1565+ DC3E CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1566+ DC40 F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1567+ DC42 DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1568+ DC44 3A FE C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1569+ DC47 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1570+ DC48 21 F0 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1571+ DC4B C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1572+ DC4D DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1573+ DC4F 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1574+ DC50 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1575+ DC51 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1576+ DC52 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1577+ DC53 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1578+ DC54 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1579+ DC55 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1580+ DC56 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1581+ DC58 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1582+ DC5A                                          ;break
1583+ DC5A D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1584+ DC5C EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1585+ DC5D DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1586+ DC5F CD A2 DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1587+ DC62 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1588+ DC63                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1588+ DC63 A7          >                        and     a
1588+ DC64 C2 7F DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1589+ DC67 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1590+ DC68 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1591+ DC69 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1592+ DC6A D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1593+ DC6B DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1594+ DC6D CD A2 DC                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1595+ DC70 D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1596+ DC71 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1597+ DC72                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1597+ DC72 A7          >                        and     a
1597+ DC73 C2 7F DC    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1598+ DC76 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1599+ DC77 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1600+ DC78                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1600+ DC78 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1601+ DC7C CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1602+ DC7F C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1603+ DC81 FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1604+ DC83 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1605+ DC85 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1606+ DC87 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1607+ DC89 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1608+ DC8B 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1609+ DC8D C9                                   ret
1610+ DC8E              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1611+ DC8E 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1612+ DC91 CD 60 83                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1613+ DC94                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1613+ DC94 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1613+ DC97 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1614+ DC99 C9                                   ret
1615+ DC9A
1616+ DC9A
1617+ DC9A FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1617+ DC9E 6C 48 24 25
1618+ DCA2                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1619+ DCA2
1620+ DCA2              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1621+ DCA2              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1622+ DCA2              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1623+ DCA2              ; uses registers hl, de
1624+ DCA2 E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1625+ DCA3 CD 31 84                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1626+ DCA6 E1                                   pop     hl
1627+ DCA7 17                                   rla                                 ;
1628+ DCA8 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1629+ DCAA 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1630+ DCAB ED 30                                mul
1631+ DCAD 5A                                   ld  e,d
1632+ DCAE 16 00                                ld  d,0
1633+ DCB0                                      ClearCarryFlag
1633+ DCB0 B7          >                        or a
1634+ DCB1 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1635+ DCB3 C9                                   ret
1636+ DCB4 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1637+ DCB5 ED 30                                mul
1638+ DCB7 5A                                   ld  e,d
1639+ DCB8 16 00                                ld  d,0
1640+ DCBA                                      ClearCarryFlag
1640+ DCBA B7          >                        or a
1641+ DCBB ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1642+ DCBD C9                                   ret
1643+ DCBE
1644+ DCBE              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1645+ DCBE                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1646+ DCBE C9                                   ret
1647+ DCBF
1648+ DCBF              ; ......................................................
1649+ DCBF 3A 0D C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1650+ DCC2 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1651+ DCC4 C8                                   ret     z
1652+ DCC5 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1653+ DCC8 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1654+ DCCA E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1655+ DCCC 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1656+ DCCF                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1656+ DCCF 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1656+ DCD1 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1657+ DCD4                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1657+ DCD4 AF          >                        xor      a
1657+ DCD5 32 58 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1658+ DCD8 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1659+ DCDB 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1660+ DCDD 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1661+ DCE0                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1662+ DCE0 C9                                   ret
1663+ DCE1
1664+ DCE1              ; in a = damage
1665+ DCE1 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1666+ DCE2 3A 0D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1667+ DCE5 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1668+ DCE7 C8                                   ret     z
1669+ DCE8 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1670+ DCEB                                      ClearCarryFlag
1670+ DCEB B7          >                        or a
1671+ DCEC 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1672+ DCED D2 F4 DC     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1673+ DCF0 CD BF DC                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1674+ DCF3 C9                                   ret
1675+ DCF4 32 58 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1676+ DCF7 C9                                   ret
1677+ DCF8              ; need recovery for energy too
1678+ DCF8              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1679+ DCF8
1680+ DCF8              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1681+ DCF8              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1682+ DCF8              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1683+ DCF8              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1684+ DCF8              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1685+ DCF8              ;
1686+ DCF8              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1687+ DCF8              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1688+ DCF8              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1689+ DCF8              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1690+ DCF8              AddLaserBeamLine:
1691+ DCF8              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1692+ DCF8              GetGunVertexNode:
1693+ DCF8 3A FC C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1694+ DCFB 21 F0 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1695+ DCFE ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1696+ DD00 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1697+ DD03              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1698+ DD03 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1699+ DD04 23                   inc         hl
1700+ DD05 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1701+ DD06 23                   inc         hl
1702+ DD07 ED 43 A6 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1703+ DD0B 0C                   inc         c
1704+ DD0C C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1705+ DD0D 04                   inc         b
1706+ DD0E C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1707+ DD0F              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1708+ DD0F 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1709+ DD10 23                   inc         hl
1710+ DD11 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1711+ DD12 23                   inc         hl
1712+ DD13 ED 43 A8 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1713+ DD17              SetX2PointToXX15:
1714+ DD17 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1715+ DD1A ED 43 AA C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1716+ DD1E 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1717+ DD21 4F                   ld          c,a
1718+ DD22              SetY2PointToXX15:
1719+ DD22 ED 43 AC C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1720+ DD26 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1721+ DD29                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1721+ DD29 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1721+ DD2B CA 33 DD    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1722+ DD2E              LL74DecX2:
1723+ DD2E 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1724+ DD30 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1725+ DD33              LL74SkipDec:
1726+ DD33 CD D3 CC             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1727+ DD36 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1728+ DD38              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1729+ DD38              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1730+ DD38 2A 99 7E             ld          hl,(varU16)
1731+ DD3B 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1732+ DD3E 77                   ld          (hl),a
1733+ DD3F 23                   inc         hl
1734+ DD40 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1735+ DD43 77                   ld          (hl),a
1736+ DD44 23                   inc         hl
1737+ DD45 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1738+ DD48 77                   ld          (hl),a
1739+ DD49 23                   inc         hl
1740+ DD4A 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1741+ DD4D 77                   ld          (hl),a
1742+ DD4E FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1743+ DD50 23                   inc         hl
1744+ DD51 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1745+ DD53 22 99 7E             ld          (varU16),hl
1746+ DD56 C9                   ret
1747+ DD57
1748+ DD57                  DISPLAY "Tracing 7", $

1750+ DD57                  INCLUDE "Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm"

   5++DD57                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DD57              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD57              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DD57 21 F0 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DD5A ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DD5C 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DD5D ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   7++DD5F ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   8++DD61 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DD63 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DD65 C9                                   ret
  11++DD66

  10++DD66                      DISPLAY "Tracing 10", $
  11++DD66
  12++DD66                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DD66              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DD66              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DD66 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DD66 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DD66 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DD66                                  ENDM
   7++DD66
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DD66                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DD66
  15++DD66              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DD66              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DD66               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DD66 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DD67
  20++DD67              PrepLines:
  21++DD67              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DD67
  23++DD67              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DD67              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DD67              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DD67              ;        or          8
  27++DD67              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DD67              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DD67              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DD67              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DD67              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DD67              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DD67              ;
  34++DD67              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DD67
  36++DD67              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DD67                      ;break
  38++DD67                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DD67 AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DD68 32 EA C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DD6B 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DD6E 32 66 DD             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DD71 3A 00 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DD74 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DD76 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DD79 21 30 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DD7C 22 99 7E             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DD7F                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DD7F 3A 00 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DD82 32 9D 7E    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DD85 3A 51 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DD88                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DD88 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DD8A CA 92 DD    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DD8D E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DD8F 32 51 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DD92              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DD92              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DD92              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DD92              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DD92              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DD92 21 01 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DD95                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DD95 22 9C 7D             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DD98 3A FB C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DD9B 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DD9C              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DD9C              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DD9C 2A 9C 7D             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DD9F E5                   push        hl
  65++DDA0 FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DDA2                     ; DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  67++DDA2                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  68++DDA2 ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  69++DDA2                      ENDIF
  70++DDA2 3A 88 7D             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  71++DDA5 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  72++DDA6              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  73++DDA6 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  74++DDA9                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  74++DDA9 BA          >                        cp      d
  74++DDAA DA 05 DE    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  75++DDAD              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  76++DDAD              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  77++DDAD              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  78++DDAD FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  79++DDB0 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  80++DDB1 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  81++DDB3                      GetFaceAtA
  81++DDB3 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  81++DDB6 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  81++DDB8 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  82++DDB9              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  83++DDB9                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  83++DDB9 A7          >                        and     a
  83++DDBA C2 CE DD    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  84++DDBD              IsFace2Visibile:
  85++DDBD 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  86++DDBE ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  87++DDC0 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  88++DDC2 E5                   push        hl
  89++DDC3                      GetFaceAtA
  89++DDC3 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  89++DDC6 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  89++DDC8 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  90++DDC9 E1                   pop         hl
  91++DDCA                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  91++DDCA A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  91++DDCB CA 05 DE    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  92++DDCE              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  93++DDCE              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  94++DDCE              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  95++DDCE FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  96++DDD1 11 A6 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  97++DDD4 CD 57 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  98++DDD7 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  99++DDDA 11 AA C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
 100++DDDD CD 57 DD             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 101++DDE0
 102++DDE0                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 103++DDE0 ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 104++DDE0 ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 105++DDE0 ~                        nop
 106++DDE0 ~                        nop
 107++DDE0 ~                        ;break
 108++DDE0 ~            .SkipBreak1:
 109++DDE0 ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 110++DDE0 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 111++DDE0 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 112++DDE0 ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 113++DDE0                      ENDIF
 114++DDE0              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 115++DDE0                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 116++DDE0 ED 5B 99 7E                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 117++DDE4 21 A6 C0                     ld          hl,UbnkPreClipX1
 118++DDE7                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DDE7 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDE9 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDEB ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DDED ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDEF                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 119++DDEF ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDF1 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDF3 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DDF5 ED A0       >                        ldi
 120++DDF7 ED 53 99 7E                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 121++DDFB                      ELSE
 122++DDFB ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 123++DDFB ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 124++DDFB ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 125++DDFB ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 126++DDFB                      ENDIF
 127++DDFB 21 EA C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 128++DDFE 34                   inc         (hl)
 129++DDFF 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 130++DE00                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 130++DE00 FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 130++DE02 D2 1B DE    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 131++DE05              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 132++DE05              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 133++DE05              LL78:
 134++DE05 2A 9C 7D             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 135++DE08 3E 04                ld          a,4
 136++DE0A ED 31                add         hl,a
 137++DE0C 22 9C 7D             ld          (varV),hl
 138++DE0F 21 66 DD             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 139++DE12 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 140++DE13 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 141++DE14                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 141++DE14 21 9D 7E    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 141++DE17 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 141++DE18 C2 9C DD    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 142++DE1B              CompletedLineGeneration:
 143++DE1B              LL81:
 144++DE1B              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 145++DE1B 3A EA C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 146++DE1E CB 27                sla         a
 147++DE20 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 148++DE22                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 149++DE22 CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 150++DE24                      ENDIF
 151++DE24 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 152++DE27              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 153++DE27 C9                   ret
 154++DE28
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

1590  C001 00 00 00...                      DS $1FFF                 ; just allocate 8000 bytes for now
1591  E000                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankUNIVDATA3," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-UniverseBankAddr), "- Universe Data G"
1592  E000                                  ASSERT $-UniverseBankAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary
1593  E000              ; Bank 77  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1594  E000                                  SLOT    UniverseBankAddr
1595  E000                                  PAGE    BankUNIVDATA7
1596  E000                                  ORG	UniverseBankAddr,BankUNIVDATA7

1600  E000                                  ASSERT $-UniverseBankAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary

1604  E000                                  ORG	UniverseBankAddr,BankUNIVDATA8

# file opened: ./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM
  34+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.

   1++C01D              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C01D              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C01D 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C01F              SBnKrotmatSidev             equ SBnKrotmatSidevX
   5++C01F 00 00        SBnKrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23

  61+ C093 00 00 00...  SunXX15Save                 DS  8

  63+ C0A3              ; Heap (or array) information for lines and normals
  64+ C0A3              ; Coords are stored XY,XY,XY,XY
  65+ C0A3              ; Normals
  66+ C0A3              ; This needs re-oprganising now.
  67+ C0A3              ; Runtime Calculation Store
  68+ C0A3
  69+ C0A3              SunLineArraySize            equ 128 * 2
  70+ C0A3              ; Storage arrays for data
  71+ C0A3
  72+ C0A3 00 00 00...  SBnKLineArray               DS SunLineArraySize ; XX19 Holds the clipped line details
  73+ C1A3              SBnKLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - SBnKLineArray
  74+ C1A3
  75+ C1A3 00 00        LineArrayPtr                DW  0
  76+ C1A5
  77+ C1A5              SBnK_Data_len               EQU $ - SBnKDataBlock
  78+ C1A5
  79+ C1A5              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  80+ C1A5 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKData:          ld      hl,SBnKDataBlock
  81+ C1A8 11 95 01                             ld      de,SBnK_Data_len
  82+ C1AB AF                                   xor     a
  83+ C1AC CD 32 7D                             call    memfill_dma
  84+ C1AF C9                                   ret
  85+ C1B0              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  86+ C1B0 21 10 C0     ResetSBnKPosition:      ld      hl,SBnKxlo
  87+ C1B3 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
  88+ C1B5 AF                                   xor     a
  89+ C1B6 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
  90+ C1B7 23                                   inc     hl
  91+ C1B8 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
  92+ C1BA C9                                   ret
  93+ C1BB
  94+ C1BB              ; Z Must be at least 2 and positve to warp
  95+ C1BB 21 18 C0     WarpSunCloser:          ld      hl,SBnKzsgn
  96+ C1BE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  97+ C1BF                                      ReturnIfALTNusng 2                      ; hard liit along z axis
  97+ C1BF FE 02       >                        cp    2
  97+ C1C1 D8          >                        ret	 c
  98+ C1C2 35                                   dec     (hl)
  99+ C1C3 C9                                   ret
 100+ C1C4
 101+ C1C4              ; It should normally be behind but someone could fly past a planet, turn aroudn and jump
 102+ C1C4 21 18 C0     WarpSunFurther:         ld      hl,SBnKzsgn
 103+ C1C7 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 104+ C1C8                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng $7F                   ; this is the hard limit else it woudl turn negative and flip to -0
 104+ C1C8 FE 7F       >                        cp    $7F
 104+ C1CA D0          >                        ret	 nc
 105+ C1CB 34                                   inc     (hl)                           ; if its negative it will still increase as we will block insane values
 106+ C1CC C9                                   ret
 107+ C1CD              ; This uses UBNKNodeArray as the list
 108+ C1CD              ; the array is 256 * 2 bytes
 109+ C1CD              ; counter is current row y pos
 110+ C1CD              ; byte 1 is start x pos
 111+ C1CD              ; byte 2 is end x pos
 112+ C1CD              ; if they are both 0 then skip
 113+ C1CD              ; its always horizontal, yellow
 114+ C1CD
 115+ C1CD              .SunNoDraw:             SetCarryFlag                    ; ship is behind so do not draw, so we don't care abour draw as dot
 115+ C1CD 37          >                        scf
 116+ C1CE C9                                   ret
 117+ C1CF
 118+ C1CF              SunBankDraw:            MACRO
 119+ C1CF ~            .drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 120+ C1CF ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 121+ C1CF ~                                    inc     hl
 122+ C1CF ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 123+ C1CF ~                                    inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 124+ C1CF ~                                    push    hl,,bc
 125+ C1CF ~                                    cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 126+ C1CF ~                                    IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 127+ C1CF ~                                    ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 128+ C1CF ~                                    sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 129+ C1CF ~                                    inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 130+ C1CF ~                                    call    z, .FixWidth
 131+ C1CF ~                                    ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 132+ C1CF ~                                    ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 133+ C1CF ~                                    call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 134+ C1CF ~            .NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 135+ C1CF ~                                    inc     b
 136+ C1CF ~                                    dec     iyh
 137+ C1CF ~                                    IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 138+ C1CF                                      ENDM
 139+ C1CF
 140+ C1CF
 141+ C1CF
 142+ C1CF              SunDraw:                MMUSelectLayer2
 142+ C1CF ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 143+ C1D3 3A 17 C6     .OptimiseStartPos:      ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 144+ C1D6                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetIsZero     ; if offset is 0 then just initate as normal
 144+ C1D6 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 144+ C1D7 CA E7 C1    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetIsZero
 145+ C1DA                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64, .OffsetLT64  ; if offset >=64 then we adjust and mve to bank 0
 145+ C1DA FE 40       >                        cp      64
 145+ C1DC DA F4 C1    >                        jp		c, .OffsetLT64
 146+ C1DF D6 40        .OffsetGTE64:           sub     64
 147+ C1E1 32 17 C6                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; adjust offset for bank 2
 148+ C1E4 C3 2C C2                             jp      .StartBank2
 149+ C1E7 06 00        .OffsetIsZero:          ld      b,0                     ; row
 150+ C1E9 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                  ; counter
 151+ C1EC 21 A3 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; set hl to start of array
 152+ C1EF C3 06 C2                             jp      .StartBank1
 153+ C1F2              ;-- Snuck routine in here so that the macro will be happier
 154+ C1F2 3D           .FixWidth:              dec     a                       ; if carry resulted in a value of zero then correct
 155+ C1F3 C9                                   ret
 156+ C1F4 21 A3 C0     .OffsetLT64:            ld      hl,SBnKLineArray        ; adjust hl for line array offset
 157+ C1F7 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 158+ C1F9 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 159+ C1FB 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; set b row to the actual offset
 160+ C1FC 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - Y offset
 161+ C1FD 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 162+ C1FF 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 163+ C200 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 164+ C202 AF                                   xor     a                       ; Ready bank 2 with no offset
 165+ C203 32 17 C6                             ld      (MinYOffset),a          ; .
 166+ C206 D9           .StartBank1:            exx
 167+ C207 3E 00                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_TOP
 168+ C209 CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; get in the first bank, we will only then bank select when needed
 169+ C20C D9                                   exx
 170+ C20D                                      SunBankDraw
 170+ C20D 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 170+ C20E 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 170+ C20F 23          >                        inc     hl
 170+ C210 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 170+ C211 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 170+ C212 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 170+ C214 BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 170+ C215             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 170+ C215 CA 24 C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 170+ C218 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 170+ C219 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 170+ C21A 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 170+ C21B CC F2 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 170+ C21E 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 170+ C21F 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 170+ C221 CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 170+ C224 C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 170+ C226 04          >                        inc     b
 170+ C227 FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 170+ C229             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 170+ C229 C2 0D C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 171+ C22C 3A 17 C6     .StartBank2:            ld      a,(MinYOffset)
 172+ C22F                                      JumpIfAIsZero .OffsetBank2IsZero; if offset is 0 then we just continue, offset can never be >127 else there would be no draw
 172+ C22F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 172+ C230 CA 44 C2    >                        jp	    z, .OffsetBank2IsZero
 173+ C233 21 23 C1     .NotZeroOffset:         ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); adjust to correct offset
 174+ C236 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 175+ C238 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 176+ C23A 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; iyh = 64 - offset
 177+ C23B 3E 40                                ld      a,64                    ; .
 178+ C23D 91                                   sub     c                       ; .
 179+ C23E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                   ; .
 180+ C240 41                                   ld      b,c                     ; b = offset row
 181+ C241 C3 4C C2                             jp      .drawLineBank2
 182+ C244 21 23 C1     .OffsetBank2IsZero:     ld      hl,SBnKLineArray + (64 * 2); start with offset adjusted
 183+ C247 06 00                                ld      b,0
 184+ C249 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64
 185+ C24C D9           .drawLineBank2:         exx
 186+ C24D 3E 40                                ld      a,LAYER2_SHIFTED_SCREEN_MIDDLE
 187+ C24F CD 38 E0                             call    asm_l2_bank_select      ; now do the lower bank
 188+ C252 D9                                   exx
 189+ C253              ; Could make this a sub routine but unwrapping saves a call
 190+ C253                                      SunBankDraw
 190+ C253 7E          >.drawLoop               ld      a,(hl)
 190+ C254 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; c = left column
 190+ C255 23          >                        inc     hl
 190+ C256 56          >                        ld      d,(hl)                  ; d = right col
 190+ C257 23          >                        inc     hl                      ; now ready for next linel
 190+ C258 E5 C5       >                        push    hl,,bc
 190+ C25A BA          >                        cp      d                       ; if both points are the same then no line (we will ignore single pixel as it can't happen at this stage other than tips of circles)
 190+ C25B             >                        IfResultZeroGoto .NoLineDraw
 190+ C25B CA 6A C2    >                        jp	z,.NoLineDraw
 190+ C25E 7A          >                        ld      a,d                     ; get right col back
 190+ C25F 91          >                        sub     c                       ; subtract left so a = length
 190+ C260 3C          >                        inc     a                       ; so its at least 1 , TODO add cp jr c logic in dma routine so that it does non dma if line < x
 190+ C261 CC F2 C1    >                        call    z, .FixWidth
 190+ C264 57          >                        ld      d,a                     ; de = length (e - d)
 190+ C265 1E D8       >                        ld      e,216                   ; yellow
 190+ C267 CD 5E E4    >                        call    l2_draw_horz_dma        ; draw without bank switch
 190+ C26A C1 E1       >.NoLineDraw:            pop     hl,,bc
 190+ C26C 04          >                        inc     b
 190+ C26D FD 25       >                        dec     iyh
 190+ C26F             >                        IfResultNotZeroGoto  .drawLoop
 190+ C26F C2 53 C2    >                        jp	nz,.drawLoop
 191+ C272 C9                                   ret
 192+ C273              ; -------------------------------------------------------------
 193+ C273              ; Sun Position    z = ((seed.d & 7) | 1)      shift left 16
 194+ C273              ;                 x = (seed.f & 3) shift left 16  | seed.f & 3 << 8 * -1 if seed f odd
 195+ C273              ;                 y    = sun x position
 196+ C273              ;
 197+ C273              CalculateSunWarpPositon:
 198+ C273 3A 29 7F     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)      ; seed d & 7
 199+ C276 E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 200+ C278 F6 81                                or      %10000001               ; | 1
 201+ C27A 32 18 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (SBnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 202+ C27D 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 203+ C280 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl            ;
 204+ C283 3A 2B 7F     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 205+ C286 E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 206+ C288 47                                   ld      b,a
 207+ C289 3A 2A 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 208+ C28C E6 01                                and     %00000001
 209+ C28E 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bi t0 into bit 7
 210+ C28F B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 211+ C290 32 12 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (SBnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 212+ C293 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a            ; .
 213+ C296 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 214+ C297 32 11 C0                             ld      (SBnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 215+ C29A 32 14 C0                             ld      (SBnKyhi),a             ; .
 216+ C29D                                      ZeroA
 216+ C29D AF          >                        xor a
 217+ C29E 32 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),a
 218+ C2A1 32 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),a
 219+ C2A4 C9                                   ret
 220+ C2A5
 221+ C2A5              CalculateSunLaunchedPosition:
 222+ C2A5              .CalcXPosition:         MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 222+ C2A5 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 223+ C2A9 DD 21 5E 7F                          ld      ix,ParentPlanetX
 224+ C2AD FD 21 10 C0                          ld      iy,SBnKxlo
 225+ C2B1                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 225+ C2B1 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 225+ C2B5 CD 8C 00       call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 226+ C2B8 DD 21 61 7F  .CalcYPosition:         ld      ix,ParentPlanetY
 227+ C2BC FD 21 13 C0                          ld      iy,SBnKylo
 228+ C2C0                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 228+ C2C0 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 228+ C2C4 CD 8C 00       call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 229+ C2C7 DD 21 64 7F  .CalcZPosition:         ld      ix,ParentPlanetZ
 230+ C2CB FD 21 16 C0                          ld      iy,SBnKzlo
 231+ C2CF                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 231+ C2CF ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 231+ C2D3 CD 8C 00       call    AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 232+ C2D6 C9                                   ret
 233+ C2D7              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 234+ C2D7              ; This sets current universe object to a star / sun, they use sign + 23 bit positions
 235+ C2D7 CD A5 C1     CreateSun:              call    ResetSBnKData
 236+ C2DA 3A 29 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 237+ C2DD E6 07                                and     %00000111
 238+ C2DF F6 81                                or      %10000001
 239+ C2E1 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 240+ C2E4 3A 2B 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 241+ C2E7 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 242+ C2E9 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 243+ C2EC 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 244+ C2EF 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000
 245+ C2F2 22 17 C0                             ld      (SBnKzhi),hl
 246+ C2F5 3E E3                                ld      a, $E3
 247+ C2F7 32 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),a
 248+ C2FA C9                                   ret
 249+ C2FB              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 250+ C2FB              ; This creates a sun relative to space station on launch
 251+ C2FB CD A5 C1     CreateSunLaunched:      call    ResetSBnKData
 252+ C2FE 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 253+ C301 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 254+ C303 22 10 C0                             ld      (SBnKxlo),hl
 255+ C306 22 13 C0                             ld      (SBnKylo),hl
 256+ C309 21 00 E0                             ld      hl,$E000
 257+ C30C 22 16 C0                             ld      (SBnKzlo),hl
 258+ C30F 32 12 C0                             ld      (SBnKxsgn),a
 259+ C312 32 18 C0                             ld      (SBnKzsgn),a
 260+ C315 3E 06                                ld      a,$06
 261+ C317 32 15 C0                             ld      (SBnKysgn),a
 262+ C31A C9                                   ret
 263+ C31B              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 264+ C31B              ; This sets current universe object to a planet,they use sign + 23 bit positions
 265+ C31B              ;;TODOCreatePlanet:           call    ResetSBnKData
 266+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ld      a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 267+ C31B              ;;TODO                        and     $00000010               ; Set A = 128 or 130 depending on bit 1 of the system's tech level
 268+ C31B              ;;TODO                        or      $10000000
 269+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ld      (SBnKShipType),a
 270+ C31B              ;;TODO                        xor     a
 271+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ld      (SBnKaiatkecm),a
 272+ C31B              ;;TODO                        MaxUnivPitchAndRoll

 275+ C31B              ;;TODO                        adc     3                       ; .
 276+ C31B              ;;TODO                        ld      (SBnKzsgn),a            ; set z sign to 3 + C + 0..3 bits
 277+ C31B              ;;TODO                        rr      a
