 776+ C773              ; .........................................................................................................................
 777+ C773              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 778+ C773 ED 4B 16 C0  SunCalculateRadius:     ld      bc,(SBnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 779+ C777 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)                ;
 780+ C77A 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 781+ C77B 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 782+ C77E CD F2 93                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 783+ C781 B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 784+ C782                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 784+ C782 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 784+ C783 CA 88 C7    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 785+ C786 1E F8        .MaxRadius:             ld      e,248                       ;set radius to 248 as maxed out
 786+ C788 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 787+ C789 F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 788+ C78B 32 1D C6                             ld      (SunRadius),a               ; save a copy of radius now for later
 789+ C78E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 790+ C78F C9                                   ret
 791+ C790
 792+ C790              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 793+ C790 3A 12 C0     SunUpdateCompass:       ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 794+ C793 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 795+ C796 CD 2E C7                             call    SunProcessVertex
 796+ C799 22 19 C0                             ld      (SunCompassX),hl
 797+ C79C 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 798+ C79F 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)
 799+ C7A2 CD 2E C7                             call    SunProcessVertex
 800+ C7A5 22 1B C0                             ld      (SunCompassY),hl
 801+ C7A8 C9                                   ret
 802+ C7A9
 803+ C7A9                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 804+ C7A9 CD 3A C5     SunUpdateAndRender:     call    SunApplyMyRollAndPitch
 805+ C7AC 3A 18 C0     .CheckDrawable:         ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
 806+ C7AF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 48,  SunUpdateCompass ; at a distance over 48 its too far away
 806+ C7AF FE 30       >                        cp     48
 806+ C7B1 D2 90 C7    >                        jp		nc,SunUpdateCompass
 807+ C7B4 21 17 C0                             ld      hl,SBnKzhi                  ; if the two high bytes are zero then its too close
 808+ C7B7 B6                                   or      (hl)
 809+ C7B8                                      JumpIfAIsZero       SunUpdateCompass
 809+ C7B8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 809+ C7B9 CA 90 C7    >                        jp	    z, SunUpdateCompass
 810+ C7BC 3A 12 C0     .calculateX:            ld      a,(SBnKxsgn)
 811+ C7BF 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKxlo)
 812+ C7C2 CD 2E C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 813+ C7C5 22 19 C0                             ld      (SunCompassX),hl
 814+ C7C8 D8                                   ret     c
 815+ C7C9 1E 80        .calculatedX:           ld      e,ScreenCenterX
 816+ C7CB 16 00                                ld      d,0
 817+ C7CD                                      ClearCarryFlag
 817+ C7CD B7          >                        or a
 818+ C7CE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 819+ C7D0                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 820+ C7D0 22 19 C6                             ld      (SunScrnX),hl               ; save projected X Position, 2's compliment
 821+ C7D3 3A 15 C0     .calculateY:            ld      a,(SBnKysgn)
 822+ C7D6 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(SBnKylo)
 823+ C7D9 CD 2E C7                             call    SunProcessVertex            ; now returns carry set for failure
 824+ C7DC 22 1B C0                             ld      (SunCompassY),hl
 825+ C7DF D8                                   ret     c
 826+ C7E0 1E 60        .calculatedY:           ld      e,ScreenCenterY
 827+ C7E2 16 00                                ld      d,0
 828+ C7E4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 829+ C7E5                                      ClearCarryFlag
 829+ C7E5 B7          >                        or a
 830+ C7E6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 831+ C7E8                                      ;call    HL2cEquHLSgnPlusAusgn       ; correct to center of screen
 832+ C7E8 22 1B C6                             ld      (SunScrnY),hl               ; save projected Y Position, 2's compliment
 833+ C7EB              ; .........................................................................................................................
 834+ C7EB CD 73 C7                             call    SunCalculateRadius
 835+ C7EE              ; .........................................................................................................................
 836+ C7EE 2A 19 C6     .CheckIfSunOnScreen:    ld      hl,(SunScrnX)               ; get x pixel position
 837+ C7F1 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh,0                       ; iyh holds draw status, 0= OK
 838+ C7F4 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; e still holds radius
 839+ C7F6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 840+ C7F7                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckXNegative
 840+ C7F7 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 840+ C7F8 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 840+ C7FA C2 10 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckXNegative
 841+ C7FD 7C           .CheckXPositive:        ld      a,h
 842+ C7FE                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero its definitly on screen
 842+ C7FE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 842+ C7FF CA 19 C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 843+ C802 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 844+ C804                                      ClearCarryFlag
 844+ C804 B7          >                        or a
 845+ C805 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 846+ C807 FA 19 C8                             jp      m   ,.XOnScreen             ; if result was negative then it spans screen
 847+ C80A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 848+ C80B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   .XOnScreen          ; if high byte of h is not zero then its partially on screen at least
 848+ C80B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 848+ C80C CA 19 C8    >                        jp	    z, .XOnScreen
 849+ C80F C9                                   ret                                 ; None of the X coordinates are on screen
 850+ C810 16 00        .CheckXNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 851+ C812                                      ClearCarryFlag
 851+ C812 B7          >                        or a
 852+ C813 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 853+ C815 F2 19 C8                             jp      p,.XOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 854+ C818 C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 855+ C819              ; .........................................................................................................................
 856+ C819 2A 1B C6     .XOnScreen:             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now Check Y coordinate
 857+ C81C                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet   h,.CheckYNegative
 857+ C81C 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 857+ C81D E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 857+ C81F C2 40 C8    >                        jp      nz,.CheckYNegative
 858+ C822 7C           .CheckYPositive:        ld      a,h
 859+ C823                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .PosYCheck2
 859+ C823 A7          >                        and     a
 859+ C824 C2 2D C8    >                        jp	    nz,.PosYCheck2
 860+ C827 7D                                   ld      a,l
 861+ C828 E6 80                                and     %10000000
 862+ C82A CA 49 C8                             jp      z,YOnScreen                ; at least 1 row is on screen as > 128
 863+ C82D 16 00        .PosYCheck2:            ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 864+ C82F                                      ClearCarryFlag
 864+ C82F B7          >                        or a
 865+ C830 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 866+ C832 FA 49 C8                             jp      m,YOnScreen                ; so if its -ve then it spans screen
 867+ C835 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; if h > 0 then off screen so did not span
 868+ C836                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 868+ C836 A7          >                        and     a
 868+ C837 C0          >                        ret     nz
 869+ C838 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; if l > 128 then off screen so did not span
 870+ C839 E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; .
 871+ C83B                                      ReturnIfANotZero                    ; .
 871+ C83B A7          >                        and     a
 871+ C83C C0          >                        ret     nz
 872+ C83D C3 49 C8                             jp      YOnScreen                  ; so Y at least spans
 873+ C840 16 00        .CheckYNegative:        ld      d,0                         ; de = radius
 874+ C842                                      ClearCarryFlag
 874+ C842 B7          >                        or a
 875+ C843 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; so we have hl - de
 876+ C845 F2 49 C8                             jp      p,YOnScreen                ; if result was positive then it spans screen so we are good
 877+ C848 C9                                   ret                                 ; else never gets above 0 so return
 878+ C849              ; .........................................................................................................................
 879+ C849 21 A3 C0     YOnScreen:             ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; we load start and end as 0
 880+ C84C 11 00 01                             ld		de, SunLineArraySize        ; just if we get a 0,0 genuine we will not plot it
 881+ C84F 3E 00                                ld		a,0
 882+ C851 CD 32 7D                             call	memfill_dma
 883+ C854              ; .........................................................................................................................
 884+ C854 11 00 00     .SetRaggedEdgeMax:      ld      de,0
 885+ C857 3A 1D C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; get readius
 886+ C85A FE 60                                cp      96                          ; if > 96 then roll carry flag into e
 887+ C85C                                      FlipCarryFlag
 887+ C85C 3F          >                        ccf
 888+ C85D CB 13                                rl      e                           ; if > 40 then roll carry flag into e
 889+ C85F FE 28                                cp      40
 890+ C861                                      FlipCarryFlag
 890+ C861 3F          >                        ccf
 891+ C862 CB 13                                rl      e
 892+ C864 FE 10                                cp      16                          ; if > 16 then roll carry flag into e
 893+ C866                                      FlipCarryFlag
 893+ C866 3F          >                        ccf
 894+ C867 CB 13                                rl     e
 895+ C869 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; a = ragged size from %00000111 to %00000000
 896+ C86A 32 16 C6                             ld      (RaggedSize),a
 897+ C86D              ; .........................................................................................................................
 898+ C86D 21 A3 C0     .SkipSetK:              ld      hl,SBnKLineArray            ; prep line array details ready for filling
 899+ C870 22 A3 C1                             ld      (LineArrayPtr),hl
 900+ C873 AF                                   xor     a
 901+ C874 32 15 C6                             ld      (LineCount),a
 902+ C877              ; .........................................................................................................................
 903+ C877 2A 1B C6     .GetMinY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; now calculate start Y position
 904+ C87A 3A 1D C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
 905+ C87D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 906+ C87E 16 00                                ld      d,0
 907+ C880                                      ClearCarryFlag
 907+ C880 B7          >                        or a
 908+ C881 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 909+ C883 F2 89 C8                             jp      p,.DoneMinY
 910+ C886 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; if its negative then we start with 0 as it can only go up screen after radius
 911+ C889              .DoneMinY:              ReturnIfRegNotZero h                ; if h > 0 then off the screen
 911+ C889 7C          >                        ld      a, h
 911+ C88A A7          >                        and     a
 911+ C88B C0          >                        ret     nz
 912+ C88C 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; check if l > 127
 913+ C88D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 914+ C88F C0                                   ret     nz                          ; if bit is set then > 128
 915+ C890 7D           .SetMinY:               ld      a,l
 916+ C891 32 17 C6                             ld      (MinYOffset),a              ; so now we have Y top of screen
 917+ C894 2A 1B C6     .GetMaxY:               ld      hl,(SunScrnY)               ; get hl = Y + radius, note if we got here then this can never be a negative result but can go from -ve hl to +ve result
 918+ C897 3A 1D C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)               ; hl = hl + radius
 919+ C89A 16 00                                ld      d,0                         ; .
 920+ C89C 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 921+ C89D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; .
 921+ C89D B7          >                        or a
 922+ C89E ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; .
 923+ C8A0 7C                                   ld      a,h
 924+ C8A1 A7                                   and     a
 925+ C8A2 28 06                                jr      z,.YHiOK
 926+ C8A4 21 7F 00     .YHiGTE127:             ld      hl,127
 927+ C8A7 C3 B3 C8                             jp      .SetMaxY
 928+ C8AA 7D           .YHiOK:                 ld      a,l                         ; clamp at 127
 929+ C8AB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
 930+ C8AD CA B3 C8                             jp      z,.SetMaxY
 931+ C8B0 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127
 932+ C8B3 7D           .SetMaxY                ld      a,l
 933+ C8B4 32 18 C6                             ld      (MaxYOffSet),a              ; so now we have min and max Y coordinates and SunScrnX & Y holds center
 934+ C8B7 CD BE C8                             call    SunDrawCircle
 935+ C8BA CD CF C1                             call    SunDraw
 936+ C8BD C9                                   ret
 937+ C8BE                                      ; b8 04 00 02 00 00 60 01 00 gives a 0.5 so we have the cal wrong as its +-1 so should be * result of divide by 128
 938+ C8BE              ;.. Now we caluclate the circle of the star
 939+ C8BE              ;.. its from MinY down the screen to MaxY center ProjX,ProjY.
 940+ C8BE              ;.. We can use the circle draw logic gtom Bressenham's algorithm
 941+ C8BE              ; so now there are the following conditions to consider
 942+ C8BE              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius <= ABS (Y center)             => Don't draw
 943+ C8BE              ; y min = 0   y center is negative radius > ABS (Y center)+1            => Draw bottom half only
 944+ C8BE              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius <= y center - 127             => Don't draw
 945+ C8BE              ; y max = 127 y center is > 127    radius > y center - 127              => Draw top half only
 946+ C8BE              ; y min >= 0  y center > y min     we don't need to worry about radius  => Draw both halves
 947+ C8BE              ; x center + radius < 0                                                 => Don't draw
 948+ C8BE              ; x center - radius > 255                                               => Don't draw
 949+ C8BE              ; we won't consider x more here as the driver is the y coordinate but we will check if x is vaiable
 950+ C8BE              ; x point = max (x point, 0)   on left
 951+ C8BE              ; x point = min (x point, 255) on right
 952+ C8BE
 953+ C8BE              SetIYPlusOffset:        MACRO   reg
 954+ C8BE ~                                    push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
 955+ C8BE ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 956+ C8BE ~                                    ld      a,reg
 957+ C8BE ~                                    add     hl,a
 958+ C8BE ~                                    add     hl,a
 959+ C8BE ~                                    push    hl
 960+ C8BE ~                                    pop     iy
 961+ C8BE ~                                    pop     hl
 962+ C8BE                                      ENDM
 963+ C8BE
 964+ C8BE              SetIYMinusOffset:       MACRO   reg
 965+ C8BE ~                                    push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
 966+ C8BE ~                                    pop     hl                              ;
 967+ C8BE ~                                    ld      a,reg
 968+ C8BE ~                                    add     a,a
 969+ C8BE ~                                    ld      e,a
 970+ C8BE ~                                    ld      d,0
 971+ C8BE ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
 972+ C8BE ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 973+ C8BE ~                                    push    hl
 974+ C8BE ~                                    pop     iy
 975+ C8BE ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 976+ C8BE                                      ENDM
 977+ C8BE
 978+ C8BE
 979+ C8BE              ;;;-SunDrawCircle:          ld      a,(SunRadius)
 980+ C8BE              ;;;-.CheckRadius:           ReturnIfAIsZero                         ; elimiate zero or single pixel
 981+ C8BE              ;;;-                        JumpIfAEqNusng  1, SunCircleSinglePixel
 982+ C8BE              ;;;-                       ; JumpIfAGTENusng 127, SunFullScreen      ; if its covering whole then just make it yellow
 983+ C8BE              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreX2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnX                   ; convert 16 bit signed to 2's compliment
 984+ C8BE              ;;;-; already done .MakeCentreY2C:         MemSignedTo2C SunScrnY                   ; .
 985+ C8BE              ;;;-.BoundsCheck            ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
 986+ C8BE              ;;;-                        push    hl
 987+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
 988+ C8BE              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
 989+ C8BE              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
 990+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
 991+ C8BE              ;;;-                        pop     hl
 992+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
 993+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
 994+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag

 996+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
 997+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng  1                     ; really shoudl be signed TODO
 998+ C8BE              ;;;-
 999+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1000+ C8BE              ;;;-                        push    hl
1001+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      a,(SunRadius)
1002+ C8BE              ;;;-                        add     hl,a
1003+ C8BE              ;;;-                        bit     7,h
1004+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ret     nz                              ; if Y + radius is negative then off the screen
1005+ C8BE              ;;;-                        pop     hl
1006+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      d,0
1007+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      e,a
1008+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ClearCarryFlag
1009+ C8BE              ;;;-                        sbc     hl,de
1010+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ld      a,h
1011+ C8BE              ;;;-
1012+ C8BE              ;;;-                        ReturnIfAGTENusng 1                      ; really shoudl be signed TODO
1013+ C8BE              SunDrawCircle
1014+ C8BE                                      ; ** BNOTE Ptuichj abnd roll has a bug as piitch increases z axis value
1015+ C8BE              .PrepCircleData:       ; ld      ixl,0
1016+ C8BE                                     ; ld		(.Plot1+1),bc			        ; save origin into DE reg in code
1017+ C8BE 3A 1D C6                             ld      a,(SunRadius)
1018+ C8C1 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a							; ixh = radius
1019+ C8C3 DD 2E 00                             ld		ixl,0						    ; ixl = delta (y)
1020+ C8C6 26 00        .calcd:	                ld		h,0                             ; de = radius * 2
1021+ C8C8 6F                                   ld		l,a                             ; .
1022+ C8C9 29                                   add		hl,hl							; .
1023+ C8CA EB                                   ex		de,hl							; .
1024+ C8CB 21 03 00                             ld		hl,3                            ; hl = 3 - (r * 2)
1025+ C8CE A7                                   and		a                               ; .
1026+ C8CF ED 52                                sbc		hl,de							; .
1027+ C8D1 44                                   ld		b,h                             ; bc = 3 - (r * 2) : d = 3 - 2r
1028+ C8D2 4D                                   ld		c,l								; .
1029+ C8D3 21 01 00     .calcdelta:             ld		hl,1                            ; set hl to 1
1030+ C8D6 16 00                                ld		d,0                             ; de = ixl
1031+ C8D8 DD 5D                                ld		e,ixl                           ;
1032+ C8DA                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ;
1032+ C8DA B7          >                        or a
1033+ C8DB ED 52                                sbc		hl,de                           ; hl = 1 - ixl
1034+ C8DD 11 01 00     .Setde1:                ld		de,1                            ; del = 1
1035+ C8E0 DD 7C        .CircleLoop:            ld		a,ixh                           ; if x = y then exit
1036+ C8E2 DD BD                                cp		ixl                             ;
1037+ C8E4 D8                                   ret		c                               ;
1038+ C8E5 D9           .ProcessLoop:	        exx                                     ; save out registers
1039+ C8E6              ; Process CY+Y CX+X & CY+Y CX-X..................................
1040+ C8E6 2A 1B C6     .Plot1:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1041+ C8E9 DD 7C        .Get1YRow:              ld      a,ixh
1042+ C8EB ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y (note is add hl ,a usginedf only??)
1043+ C8ED              .Check1YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTopPixelPair
1043+ C8ED 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1043+ C8EE A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1043+ C8EF 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1043+ C8F1 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1043+ C8F2 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1043+ C8F4 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTopPixelPair                   ;
1044+ C8F6              .Write1YCoord:          SetIYPlusOffset ixh                     ; IY = IY + ixh
1044+ C8F6 E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1044+ C8F9 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1044+ C8FA DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1044+ C8FC ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1044+ C8FE ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1044+ C900 E5          >                        push    hl
1044+ C901 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1044+ C903 E1          >                        pop     hl
1045+ C904                                      IYEquRowN l                             ; IY = SBnkLineArray + (2 * l) - set up iy as target address
1045+ C904 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1045+ C905 21 A3 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1045+ C908 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1045+ C90A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1045+ C90C E5          >                        push    hl
1045+ C90D FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1046+ C90F DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1047+ C911 CD E4 C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1048+ C914 C3 17 C9                             jp      .Plot2
1049+ C917              .NoTopPixelPair:        ;break
1050+ C917              ; Process CY-Y CX+X & CY-Y CX-X..................................
1051+ C917 2A 1B C6     .Plot2:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1052+ C91A 16 00        .Get2YRow:              ld      d,0
1053+ C91C DD 5C                                ld      e,ixh
1054+ C91E                                      ClearCarryFlag
1054+ C91E B7          >                        or a
1055+ C91F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1056+ C921              .Check2YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottomPixelPair
1056+ C921 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1056+ C922 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1056+ C923 20 2B       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1056+ C925 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1056+ C926 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1056+ C928 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottomPixelPair                   ;
1057+ C92A                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixh
1057+ C92A D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1057+ C92E E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1057+ C92F DD 7C       >                        ld      a,ixh
1057+ C931 87          >                        add     a,a
1057+ C932 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1057+ C933 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1057+ C935             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1057+ C935 B7          >                        or a
1057+ C936 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1057+ C938 E5          >                        push    hl
1057+ C939 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1057+ C93B E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1058+ C93D              .Write2YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1058+ C93D 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1058+ C93E 21 A3 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1058+ C941 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C943 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1058+ C945 E5          >                        push    hl
1058+ C946 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1059+ C948 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
1060+ C94A CD E4 C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1061+ C94D C3 50 C9                             jp      .Plot3
1062+ C950              .NoBottomPixelPair:     ;break
1063+ C950              ; Process CY+X CX+Y & CY+X CX-Y..................................
1064+ C950 2A 1B C6     .Plot3:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1065+ C953 DD 7D        .Get3YRow:              ld      a,ixl
1066+ C955 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Check to see if CY+Y
1067+ C957              .Check3YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoTop3PixelPair
1067+ C957 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1067+ C958 A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1067+ C959 20 26       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1067+ C95B 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1067+ C95C E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1067+ C95E 20 21       >                        jr      nz,.NoTop3PixelPair                   ;
1068+ C960                                      SetIYPlusOffset ixl
1068+ C960 E5 FD E5    >                        push    hl,,iy                          ; save hl, then hl = iy
1068+ C963 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1068+ C964 DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl
1068+ C966 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1068+ C968 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1068+ C96A E5          >                        push    hl
1068+ C96B FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1068+ C96D E1          >                        pop     hl
1069+ C96E              .Write3YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1069+ C96E 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1069+ C96F 21 A3 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1069+ C972 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1069+ C974 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1069+ C976 E5          >                        push    hl
1069+ C977 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1070+ C979 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1071+ C97B CD E4 C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1072+ C97E C3 81 C9                             jp      .Plot4
1073+ C981              .NoTop3PixelPair:       ;break
1074+ C981              ; Process CY-X CX+Y & CY-X CX-Y..................................
1075+ C981 2A 1B C6     .Plot4:                 ld      hl, (SunScrnY)
1076+ C984 16 00        .Get4YRow:              ld      d,0
1077+ C986 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl
1078+ C988                                      ClearCarryFlag
1078+ C988 B7          >                        or a
1079+ C989 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1080+ C98B              .Check4YRowOnScreen:    CheckRowHLOnScreen .NoBottom4PixelPair
1080+ C98B 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
1080+ C98C A7          >                        and     a                               ; .
1080+ C98D 20 28       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
1080+ C98F 7D          >                        ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
1080+ C990 E6 80       >                        and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
1080+ C992 20 23       >                        jr      nz,.NoBottom4PixelPair                   ;
1081+ C994                                      SetIYMinusOffset ixl
1081+ C994 D5 E5 FD E5 >                        push    de,,hl,,iy                      ; save hl, then hl = iy
1081+ C998 E1          >                        pop     hl                              ;
1081+ C999 DD 7D       >                        ld      a,ixl
1081+ C99B 87          >                        add     a,a
1081+ C99C 5F          >                        ld      e,a
1081+ C99D 16 00       >                        ld      d,0
1081+ C99F             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1081+ C99F B7          >                        or a
1081+ C9A0 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1081+ C9A2 E5          >                        push    hl
1081+ C9A3 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1081+ C9A5 E1 D1       >                        pop     de,,hl
1082+ C9A7              .Write4YCoord:          IYEquRowN l                             ; set up iy as target address
1082+ C9A7 7D          >                        ld      a,l
1082+ C9A8 21 A3 C0    >                        ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
1082+ C9AB ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C9AD ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1082+ C9AF E5          >                        push    hl
1082+ C9B0 FD E1       >                        pop     iy
1083+ C9B2 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
1084+ C9B4 CD E4 C9                             call    ProcessXRowA
1085+ C9B7              .NoBottom4PixelPair:
1086+ C9B7              ; Completed one iteration........................................
1087+ C9B7 D9                                   exx
1088+ C9B8 CB 7C        .IncrementCircle:	    bit     7,h				; Check for Hl<=0
1089+ C9BA 28 03                                jr z,   .draw_circle_1
1090+ C9BC 19                                   add hl,de			; Delta=Delta+D1
1091+ C9BD 18 05                                jr      .draw_circle_2		;
1092+ C9BF 09           .draw_circle_1:		    add     hl,bc			; Delta=Delta+D2
1093+ C9C0 03                                   inc     bc
1094+ C9C1 03                                   inc     bc				; D2=D2+2
1095+ C9C2 DD 25                                dec     ixh				; Y=Y-1
1096+ C9C4 03           .draw_circle_2:		    inc bc				    ; D2=D2+2
1097+ C9C5 03                                   inc bc
1098+ C9C6 13                                   inc de				    ; D1=D1+2
1099+ C9C7 13                                   inc de
1100+ C9C8 DD 2C                                inc ixl				    ; X=X+1
1101+ C9CA C3 E0 C8                             jp      .CircleLoop
1102+ C9CD 2A 19 C6     SunCircleSinglePixel:     ld      hl,(SunScrnX)
1103+ C9D0 7C                                   ld      a,h
1104+ C9D1 A7                                   and     a
1105+ C9D2 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1106+ C9D3 4D                                   ld      c,l
1107+ C9D4 2A 1B C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnY)
1108+ C9D7 7C                                   ld      a,h
1109+ C9D8 A7                                   and     a
1110+ C9D9 C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if the high byte is set then no pixel
1111+ C9DA 7D                                   ld      a,l
1112+ C9DB CB 7F                                bit     7,a
1113+ C9DD C0                                   ret     nz                  ; if l > 127 then no pixel
1114+ C9DE 47                                   ld      b,a
1115+ C9DF 7B                                   ld		a,e
1116+ C9E0 CD 08 E3                             call	l2_plot_pixel_y_test
1117+ C9E3 C9                                   ret
1118+ C9E4
1119+ C9E4              ProcessXRowA:           ;break
1120+ C9E4 2A 19 C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; get X Center
1121+ C9E7 F5                                   push    af                              ; save A (curent offset +/- value
1122+ C9E8 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; Hl = HL + offset
1123+ C9EA 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; is HL negative?, if so then set C to 0
1124+ C9EB CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;
1125+ C9ED 20 14                                jr      nz,.XCoordNegative              ; We can have this for non X + Radius i.e. the equater
1126+ C9EF A7                                   and     a                               ; if H <> 0? (why by here must be +ve), set c to $FF
1127+ C9F0 20 16                                jr      nz,.XCoordMaxed                 ; .
1128+ C9F2 4D                                   ld      c,l                             ; else set c to l and do the -ve offset
1129+ C9F3 C5           .AddFuzz:               push    bc
1130+ C9F4 CD 31 84                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1131+ C9F7 C1                                   pop     bc
1132+ C9F8 21 16 C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1133+ C9FB A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1134+ C9FC 81                                   add     c                               ;
1135+ C9FD 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;
1136+ C9FE 38 08                                jr      c,.XCoordMaxed                  ; has fuzz caused a carry, if so > 255 to make 255
1137+ CA00 C3 0A CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract                ;
1138+ CA03 0E 00        .XCoordNegative:        ld      c,0                             ; if it was negative then 0
1139+ CA05 C3 0A CA                             jp      .ProcessSubtract
1140+ CA08 0E FF        .XCoordMaxed:           ld      c,255                           ; if it was +ve then 255
1141+ CA0A F1           .ProcessSubtract:       pop     af                              ; get offset back
1142+ CA0B 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; but goes into DE as its a subtract
1143+ CA0C 16 00                                ld      d,0
1144+ CA0E 2A 19 C6                             ld      hl,(SunScrnX)                    ; so do subtract
1145+ CA11                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1145+ CA11 B7          >                        or a
1146+ CA12 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1147+ CA14 FA 31 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1148+ CA17 E5 C5        .AddFuzzSubtract:       push    hl,,bc
1149+ CA19 CD 31 84                             call    doRandom                        ; c = c - random AND ragged Size
1150+ CA1C C1                                   pop     bc
1151+ CA1D 21 16 C6                             ld      hl,RaggedSize                   ;
1152+ CA20 A6                                   and     (hl)                            ;
1153+ CA21 5F                                   ld      e,a
1154+ CA22 E1                                   pop     hl
1155+ CA23 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
1156+ CA25 FA 31 CA                             jp      m,.XCoordLeftNegative           ; again test for min max
1157+ CA28 7C                                   ld      a,h
1158+ CA29 A7                                   and     a
1159+ CA2A C2 36 CA                             jp      nz,.XCordLeftMaxed
1160+ CA2D 45                                   ld      b,l
1161+ CA2E C3 38 CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1162+ CA31 06 00        .XCoordLeftNegative:    ld      b,0
1163+ CA33 C3 38 CA                             jp      .CompletedXCoords
1164+ CA36 06 FF        .XCordLeftMaxed:        ld      b,255
1165+ CA38 78           .CompletedXCoords:      ld      a,b
1166+ CA39 FD 77 00     .RowSaveIY1             ld      (iy+0),a                        ; iy holds current line array index
1167+ CA3C 79                                   ld      a,c
1168+ CA3D FD 77 01     .RowSaveIY3             ld      (iy+1),a
1169+ CA40 C9                                   ret
1170+ CA41
1171+ CA41              ; .....................................................
1172+ CA41              ; if the universe object is a planet or sun then do that instead
1173+ CA41              ;;TODOProcessPlanet:          cp      129
1174+ CA41              ;;TODO                        jr      nz, .ItsAPlanet
1175+ CA41              ;;TODO.ItsAStar:              ld      a,(SBnKzsgn)
1176+ CA41              ;;TODO                        cp      48                               ; if z > 48 (it must be positive to enter this routine)
1177+ CA41
1178+ CA41
1179+ CA41              ; Square Root using tables
1180+ CA41              ; DE = number to find
1181+ CA41 21 61 CC     SunLookupSqrtDE:        ld      hl,SunSquareRootTable
1182+ CA44 7A           .LookupCorseJump:       ld      a,d
1183+ CA45 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1184+ CA47 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1185+ CA49 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1186+ CA4A 23                                   inc     hl
1187+ CA4B 66                                   ld      h,(hl)
1188+ CA4C 6F                                   ld      l,a
1189+ CA4D 7E           .FineSearchLoop:        ld      a,(hl)
1190+ CA4E                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  e, .FoundByte
1190+ CA4E BB          >                        cp     e
1190+ CA4F CA 5B CA    >                        jp      z,.FoundByte
1191+ CA52                                      JumpIfAGTENusng e, .PreviousByte
1191+ CA52 BB          >                        cp     e
1191+ CA53 D2 5E CA    >                        jp		nc,.PreviousByte
1192+ CA56 23           .NotFound:              inc     hl
1193+ CA57 23                                   inc     hl
1194+ CA58 C3 4D CA                             jp      .FineSearchLoop
1195+ CA5B 23           .FoundByte:             inc     hl
1196+ CA5C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1197+ CA5D C9                                   ret
1198+ CA5E 2B           .PreviousByte:          dec     hl
1199+ CA5F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1200+ CA60 C9                                   ret

1646  D00D                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankSunData," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-SunBankAddr), " - BankSunData"
1647  D00D                                  ASSERT $-SunBankAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary

   1+ C000
   2+ C000              ;- DEBUG CODE
   3+ C000                                      IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
   4+ C000 ~            TestBLINE:              ld  a,$FF
   5+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKFlag),a
   6+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,5
   7+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKSTP),a
   8+ C000 ~                                    ZeroA
   9+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_BnKCNT),a
  10+ C000 ~            .DebugLoop:             ld  ix,(DataPointer)
  11+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+0)
  12+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  13+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+1)
  14+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  15+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewXPos),hl
  16+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+2)
  17+ C000 ~                                    ld  l,a
  18+ C000 ~                                    ld  a,(ix+3)
  19+ C000 ~                                    ld  h,a
  20+ C000 ~                                    ld  (P_NewYPos),hl
  21+ C000 ~                                    call    BLINE
  22+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,(DataPointCounter)
  23+ C000 ~                                    inc     a
  24+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,DataPointSize
  25+ C000 ~                                    cp      (hl)
  26+ C000 ~                                    ret     z
  27+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointCounter),a
  28+ C000 ~                                    ld      hl,(DataPointer)
  29+ C000 ~                                    ld      a,4
  30+ C000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C000 ~                                    ld      (DataPointer),hl
  32+ C000 ~                                    jp      .DebugLoop
  33+ C000 ~
  34+ C000 ~            DataPoints:             DW  10,10, 20,60, 30,20, 40,50, 100,90, 150, 30
  35+ C000 ~            DataPointSize           DB  6
  36+ C000 ~            DataPointCounter        DB  0
  37+ C000 ~            DataPointer:            DW  DataPoints
  38+ C000                                      ENDIF

  56+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  57+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  58+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
  59+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
  60+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
  61+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
  62+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  63+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
  64+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  65+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  66+ C000
  67+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  68+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  69+ C000 50 6C 61 6E  StartOfPlanet:     DB "Planet Data....."
  69+ C004 65 74 20 44
  69+ C008 61 74 61 2E
  69+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E

  71+ C010              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  72+ C010              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  73+ C010              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  94+ C0FF             >P_BnKXX12zSign               EQU P_XX12+5   ; XX12+5
  94+ C0FF 00 00 00... >P_XX12Save                   DS  6
  94+ C105 00 00 00... >P_XX12Save2                  DS  6
  94+ C10B             >
  94+ C10B             >P_varXX12                    EQU P_XX12
  94+ C10B             >; Repurposed XX12 when plotting lines
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkY2                      equ P_XX12+0
  94+ C10B             >P_BnKy2Lo                    equ P_XX12+0
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkY2Hi                    equ P_XX12+1
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkDeltaXLo                equ P_XX12+2
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkDeltaXHi                equ P_XX12+3
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkDeltaYLo                equ P_XX12+4
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkDeltaYHi                equ P_XX12+5
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkGradient                equ P_XX12+2
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp1                   equ P_XX12+2
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp1Lo                 equ P_XX12+2
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp1Hi                 equ P_XX12+3
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp2                   equ P_XX12+3
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp2Lo                 equ P_XX12+3
  94+ C10B             >P_BnkTemp2Hi                 equ P_XX12+4
  95+ C10B
  96+ C10B                                          ClippingVarsMacro P
  96+ C10B             >;-- Clipping code for universe objects -------------------------------------------
  96+ C10B 00          >P_XX13        DB 0
  96+ C10C             >
  96+ C10C             >
  96+ C10C 00 00 00 00 >P_varK3		 DS	4				; D2
  96+ C110             >P_centreX     equ P_varK3
  96+ C110 00          >P_varK3p2	 DB	0				; 42
  96+ C111 00          >P_varK3p3	 DB	0				; 43
  96+ C112             >P_varK3p1	 equ P_varK3+1			; D3
  96+ C112 00 00 00 00 >P_varK4		 DS	4				; E0
  96+ C116             >P_centreY     equ P_varK4
  96+ C116             >P_varK4p1	 equ P_varK4+1			; D3
  96+ C116 00 00 00... >P_varK5       DS  6
  96+ C11C             >P_varK5p2     equ P_varK5+2
  96+ C11C 00 00 00... >P_varK6       DS  6
  96+ C122             >P_varK6p2     equ P_varK6+2
  96+ C122             >
  96+ C122 00          >P_XX12p2      DB 0    ; The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
  96+ C123 00          >P_XX12p3      DB 0    ; The direction of slope ; + LT to BR; - TR to BL
  96+ C124 00          >P_XX12p4      DB 0
  96+ C125 00          >P_XX12p5      DB 0
  96+ C126             >P_Delta_x     EQU P_XX12p2
  96+ C126             >P_Delta_y     EQU P_XX12p4
  96+ C126 00          >P_Tvar        DB 0    ; The gradient of slope ; 0 if it's a shallow slope (DX > DY) ; &FF if it's a steep slope (DY > DX) Returns:  XX15        m         x1 as an 8-bit coordinate XX15+2               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
  96+ C127 00          >P_Qvar        DB 0
  96+ C128 00          >P_Rvar        DB 0    ; general purpose for calcs  Paired with S must be done this way round for SUBHeightFromY1 etc to work
  96+ C129 00          >P_Svar        DB 0    ; sign variable
  96+ C12A             >P_SRvarPair   EQU P_Rvar
  96+ C12A 00          >P_Xreg        DB 0
  96+ C12B 00          >P_Yreg        DB 0
  96+ C12C             >P_YXregPair   EQU P_Xreg
  97+ C12C
  98+ C12C
  99+ C12C              P_BnK_Data_len               EQU $ - P_BnKDataBlock
 100+ C12C
 101+ C12C
 102+ C12C                                          ClippingCodeLL28Macro P
 102+ C12C 21 B6 F1    >P_LL28_6502:         ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
 102+ C12F 4E          >                            ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
 102+ C130 B9          >                            cp      c
 102+ C131             >                            FlipCarryFlag
 102+ C131 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C132 DA 5A C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL2_6502    ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
 102+ C135 06 FE       >                            ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
 102+ C137 CB 27       >P_LL31_6502:          sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
 102+ C139 DA 4E C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 102+ C13C             >                            FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
 102+ C13C 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C13D             >                            JumpIfALTNusng c, P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
 102+ C13D B9          >                        cp      c
 102+ C13E DA 43 C1    >                        jp		c, P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
 102+ C141             >                                                                ; BCC P%+4
 102+ C141 91          >                            sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 102+ C142             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C142 B7          >                        or a
 102+ C143             >P_LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:  FlipCarryFlag
 102+ C143 3F          >                        ccf
 102+ C144 CB 10       >                            rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 102+ C146 DA 37 C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
 102+ C149 78          >                            ld      a,b
 102+ C14A 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a
 102+ C14D C9          >                            ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
 102+ C14E 91          >P_LL29_6502:          sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 102+ C14F             >                            SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 102+ C14F 37          >                        scf
 102+ C150 CB 10       >                            rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 102+ C152 DA 37 C1    >                            jp      c, P_LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
 102+ C155 78          >                            ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
 102+ C156 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
 102+ C159 C9          >                            ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
 102+ C15A 3E FF       >P_LL2_6502:          ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
 102+ C15C 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
 102+ C15F             >                            SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
 102+ C15F 37          >                        scf
 102+ C160 C9          >                            ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 102+ C161             >
 102+ C161 3A B9 F1    >P_ADDXRegtoY1:       ld      a,(Xreg)                ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 102+ C164 4F          >                            ld      c,a
 102+ C165 06 00       >                            ld      b,0
 102+ C167 2A F9 C0    >                            ld      hl,(P_XX1532)
 102+ C16A             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C16A B7          >                        or a
 102+ C16B ED 4A       >                            adc     hl,bc
 102+ C16D 22 F9 C0    >                            ld      (P_XX1532),hl
 102+ C170 C9          >                            ret
 102+ C171             >
 102+ C171 ED 4B B9 F1 >P_ADDYXRegtoY1:      ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 102+ C175 2A F9 C0    >                            ld      hl,(P_XX1532)
 102+ C178             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C178 B7          >                        or a
 102+ C179 ED 4A       >                            adc     hl,bc
 102+ C17B 22 F9 C0    >                            ld      (P_XX1532),hl
 102+ C17E C9          >                            ret
 102+ C17F             >
 102+ C17F ED 4B B9 F1 >P_ADDYXRegtoX1:      ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 102+ C183 2A F7 C0    >                            ld      hl,(P_XX1510)
 102+ C186             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C186 B7          >                        or a
 102+ C187 ED 4A       >                            adc     hl,bc
 102+ C189 22 F7 C0    >                            ld      (P_XX1510),hl
 102+ C18C C9          >                            ret
 102+ C18D             >
 102+ C18D 2A F9 C0    >P_SUBBCFromY1:       ld      hl,(P_XX1532)             ; Set (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - BC where BC can be say screen height
 102+ C190             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C190 B7          >                        or a
 102+ C191 ED 42       >                            sbc     hl,bc
 102+ C193 22 B7 F1    >                            ld      (SRvarPair),hl
 102+ C196 C9          >                            ret
 102+ C197             >
 102+ C197 2A B9 F1    >P_AddSRToYX:         ld      hl,(YXregPair)
 102+ C19A ED 5B B7 F1 >                            ld      de,(SRvarPair)
 102+ C19E             >                            ClearCarryFlag
 102+ C19E B7          >                        or a
 102+ C19F ED 5A       >                            adc     hl,de
 102+ C1A1 22 B9 F1    >                            ld      (YXregPair),hl
 102+ C1A4 C9          >                            ret
 102+ C1A5             >
 102+ C1A5 7C          >P_ClampX:            ld      a,h
 102+ C1A6 A7          >                            and     a
 102+ C1A7 7D          >                            ld      a,l
 102+ C1A8 C8          >                            ret     z
 102+ C1A9 F2 AE C1    >                            jp      p,.Max255
 102+ C1AC             >.ClampXMin0:                ZeroA
 102+ C1AC AF          >                        xor a
 102+ C1AD C9          >                            ret
 102+ C1AE 3E FF       >.Max255:                    ld      a,$FF
 102+ C1B0 C9          >                            ret
 102+ C1B1             >
 102+ C1B1 7C          >P_ClampY:            ld      a,h
 102+ C1B2 A7          >                            and     a
 102+ C1B3 CA BE C1    >                            jp      z,.ClampYlo
 102+ C1B6 F2 BB C1    >                            jp      p,.Max127
 102+ C1B9             >.ClampYMin0:                ZeroA
 102+ C1B9 AF          >                        xor a
 102+ C1BA C9          >                            ret
 102+ C1BB 3E 7F       >.Max127:                    ld      a,127
 102+ C1BD C9          >                            ret
 102+ C1BE 7D          >.ClampYlo:                  ld      a,l
 102+ C1BF A7          >                            and     a
 102+ C1C0 F0          >                            ret     p
 102+ C1C1 3E 7F       >                            ld      a,127
 102+ C1C3 C9          >                            ret
 103+ C1C4                                          ClippingCodeLL120Macro P
 103+ C1C4 3A F7 C0    >P_LL120_6502:        ld      a,(P_XX1510)              ;LDA XX15               \ Set R = x1_lo
 103+ C1C7 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a                ;STA R
 103+ C1CA CD 76 C2    >                            call    P_LL129_6502              ;JSR LL129              \ Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2 = line gradient, A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction  (S R) = |S R|
 103+ C1CD F5          >                            push    af                      ;PHA                    \ Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 103+ C1CE             >; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    push    af                      ;LDX T                  \ If T is non-zero, then it's a steep slope, so jump
 103+ C1CE 3A B5 F1    >                            ld      a,(Tvar)                ; .
 103+ C1D1 32 B9 F1    >                            ld      (Xreg),a                ;. REDUNDANT REMOVE IN OPTIMISATION
 103+ C1D4 A7          >                            and     a                       ;BNE LL121              \ down to LL121 to calculate this instead (Y X) = (S R) / Q
 103+ C1D5             >; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    pop     af                      ;.                      (recover teh saved A before the cp)
 103+ C1D5 20 48       >                            jr      nz,P_LL121_6502           ;.
 103+ C1D7             >;..   (Y X) = (S R) * Q - must be ABS, sign determined by opposite of the sign of the value on top of stack
 103+ C1D7             >P_LL122_6502:         ZeroA                           ;LDA #0                 \ Set A = 0
 103+ C1D7 AF          >                        xor a
 103+ C1D8             >
 103+ C1D8             >                            IFDEF DEBUG_LL122_DIRECT"
 103+ C1D8 ~           >                                  DISPLAY "DIRECT CALL TO LL122 so dummy push a to stack with 0"
 103+ C1D8 ~           >                                  push    af
 103+ C1D8             >                            ENDIF
 103+ C1D8 32 B9 F1    >                            ld      (Xreg),a                ;TAX                    \ Set (Y X) = 0 so we can start building the answer here
 103+ C1DB 32 BA F1    >                            ld      (Yreg),a                ;TAY
 103+ C1DE 21 B8 F1    >                            ld      hl,Svar
 103+ C1E1 ED 4B B7 F1 >                            ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;LSR S                  \ Shift (S R) to the right, so we extract bit 0 of (S R)
 103+ C1E5             >                            ShiftBCRight1                   ;ROR R                  \ into the C flag
 103+ C1E5 CB 38       >			   srl b
 103+ C1E7 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 103+ C1E9 ED 43 B7 F1 >                            ld      (SRvarPair),bc
 103+ C1ED 21 B6 F1    >                            ld      hl, Qvar                ;ASL Q                  \ Shift Q to the left, catching bit 7 in the C flag
 103+ C1F0 CB 26       >                            sla     (hl)                    ;.
 103+ C1F2 30 03       >                            jr      nc, P_LL126_6502          ;BCC LL126              \ If C (i.e. the next bit from Q) is clear, do not do
 103+ C1F4             >; the addition for this bit of Q, and instead skip to LL126 to just do the shifts
 103+ C1F4 CD 26 F2    >P_LL125_6502:        call    AddSRToYX               ;TXA                    \ Set (Y X) = (Y X) + (S R)  starting with the low bytes And then doing the high bytes
 103+ C1F7 ED 4B B7 F1 >P_LL126_6502:        ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;LSR S                  \ Shift (S R) to the right
 103+ C1FB             >                            ShiftBCRight1                   ;ROR R
 103+ C1FB CB 38       >			   srl b
 103+ C1FD CB 19       >			   rr  c
 103+ C1FF ED 43 B7 F1 >                            ld      (SRvarPair),bc          ;.
 103+ C203 21 B6 F1    >                            ld      hl, Qvar                ;ASL Q                  \ Shift Q to the left, catching bit 7 in the C flag
 103+ C206 CB 26       >                            sla     (hl)                    ;.
 103+ C208 38 EA       >                            jr      c,P_LL125_6502            ;BCS LL125              \ If C (i.e. the next bit from Q) is set, loop back to LL125 to do the addition for this bit of Q
 103+ C20A 20 EB       >                            jr      nz,P_LL126_6502           ;BNE LL126              \ If Q has not yet run out of set bits, loop back to LL126 to do the \"shift\" part of shift-and-add until we have done additions for all the set bits in Q, to give us our multiplication result
 103+ C20C F1          >                            pop     af                      ;PLA                    \ Restore A, which we calculated above, from the stack
 103+ C20D A7          >                            and     a                       ;BPL LL133              \ If A is positive jump to LL133 to negate (Y X) and
 103+ C20E F2 67 C2    >                            jp      p,P_LL133_6502            ;.
 103+ C211             >                            ;.. return from the subroutine using a tail call
 103+ C211 C9          >                            ret                             ;RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 104+ C212                                          ClippingCodeLL122Macro P
 104+ C212 CD 76 C2    >P_LL123_6502:         call    P_LL129_6502              ;JSR LL129              \ Call LL129 to do the following   Q = XX12+2   = line gradient
 104+ C215 F5          >                             push    af                      ;PHA                    \ Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 104+ C216             >; DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    push    af                      ;LDX T                  \ If T is non-zero, then it's a steep slope, so jump up
 104+ C216 3A B5 F1    >                             ld      a,(Tvar)                ; .
 104+ C219 32 B9 F1    >                             ld      (Xreg),a                ;BNE LL122              \ to LL122 to calculate this instead:
 104+ C21C A7          >                             and     a                       ;.
 104+ C21D             >;  DONT NEED PLUS MESSES UP FLAGS                    pop     af                      ;.
 104+ C21D 20 B8       >                             jr      nz,P_LL122_6502           ;.
 104+ C21F             >;--  The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2
 104+ C21F 3E FF       >P_LL121_6502:         ld      a,$FF                   ;LDA #%11111111         \ Set Y = %11111111
 104+ C221 32 BA F1    >                             ld      (Yreg),a                ;TAY
 104+ C224 CB 27       >                             sla     a                       ;ASL A                  \ Set X = %11111110
 104+ C226 32 B9 F1    >                             ld      (Xreg),a                ;TAX
 104+ C229             >;--  This sets (Y X) = %1111111111111110, so we can rotate through 15 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then getting a 0 on the 16th iteration... and we can also use it to catch our result bits into bit 0 each time
 104+ C229 ED 4B B7 F1 >P_LL130_6502:         ld      bc,(SRvarPair)          ;ASL R                  \ Shift (S R) to the left
 104+ C22D             >                            ShiftBCLeft1                    ;.
 104+ C22D CB 21       >			   sla c
 104+ C22F CB 10       >			   rl  b
 104+ C231 ED 43 B7 F1 >                            ld      (SRvarPair),bc          ;ROL S
 104+ C235 3A B8 F1    >                            ld      a,(Svar)                ;LDA S                  \ Set A = S
 104+ C238 38 07       >                            jr      c, P_LL131_6502           ;BCS LL131              \ If bit 7 of S was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
 104+ C23A 21 B6 F1    >                            ld      hl,Qvar                 ;CMP Q                  \ If A < Q (i.e. S < Q), skip the following subtractions
 104+ C23D BE          >                            cp      (hl)
 104+ C23E             >                            FlipCarryFlag                   ; note flip carry flag here to simulate 6502 operation
 104+ C23E 3F          >                        ccf
 104+ C23F 30 12       >                            jr      nc,P_LL132A_6502          ;BCC LL132  (NOTE Carry flag reversed in Z80 for CP)
 104+ C241             >P_LL131_6502:         FlipCarryFlag                   ;flip carry to make it act like a 6502 borrow
 104+ C241 3F          >                        ccf
 104+ C242 9E          >                            sbc     (hl)                    ;SBC Q                  \ A >= Q (i.e. S >= Q) so set:
 104+ C243 32 B8 F1    >                            ld      (Svar),a                ;STA S
 104+ C246 3A B7 F1    >                            ld      a,(Rvar)                ;LDA R                  \ And then doing the high bytes
 104+ C249             >                            ClearCarryFlag                  ;\   S = (A R) - Q  = (S R) - Q starting with the low bytes (we know the C flag is set so the subtraction will be correct)
 104+ C249 B7          >                        or a
 104+ C24A DE 00       >                            sbc     0                       ;SBC #0
 104+ C24C 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a                ;STA R
 104+ C24F             >                            SetCarryFlag                    ;SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in (Y X)
 104+ C24F 37          >                        scf
 104+ C250 C3 54 C2    >                            jp      P_LL132_6502              ;added so that we can do a 6502 style carry above
 104+ C253 00          >P_LL132A_6502:        nop; FlipCarryFlag
 104+ C254 ED 4B B9 F1 >P_LL132_6502:         ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; Rotate the counter in (Y X) to the left, and catch the
 104+ C258             >                            RollBCLeft1                     ; ROL A                  \ result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't
 104+ C258 CB 11       >               rl  c
 104+ C25A CB 10       >               rl  b
 104+ C25C ED 43 B9 F1 >                            ld      (YXregPair),bc          ; TAX                    \ do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
 104+ C260 38 C7       >                            jr      c, P_LL130_6502           ; BCS LL130              \ If we still have set bits in (Y X), loop back to LL130 to do the next iteration of 15, until we have done the whole division
 104+ C262             >        IFDEF DEBUG_LL121_DIRECT
 104+ C262 ~           >              DISPLAY "DIRECT CALL TO LL121 so dummy push"
 104+ C262 ~           >                            push    af
 104+ C262             >        ENDIF
 104+ C262 F1          >                            pop     af                      ; PLA                    \ Restore A, which we calculated above, from the stack
 104+ C263 A7          >                            and     a                       ; BMI LL128              \ If A is negative jump to LL128 to return from the
 104+ C264 FA 75 C2    >                            jp      m, P_LL128_6502           ; .                      \ subroutine with (Y X) as is
 104+ C267 ED 4B B9 F1 >P_LL133_6502:          ld      bc,(YXregPair)          ; TXA                    \ Otherwise negate (Y X) using two's complement by first
 104+ C26B             >                            macronegate16bc                 ; EOR #%11111111         \ setting the low byte to ~X + 1
 104+ C26B AF          >					xor 	a
 104+ C26C 91          >                    sub 	c
 104+ C26D 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 104+ C26E 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 104+ C26F 90          >                    sub 	b
 104+ C270 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 104+ C271 ED 43 B9 F1 >                            ld      (YXregPair),bc          ; ADC #1                 \ The addition works as we know the C flag is clear from\ when we passed through the BCS above
 104+ C275 C9          >P_LL128_6502:          ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 104+ C276             >;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 104+ C276             >;..  Do the following, in this order: Q = XX12+2 A = S EOR XX12+3 (S R) = |S R|
 104+ C276             >;..  This sets up the variables required above to calculate (S R) / XX12+2 and give the result the opposite sign to XX13+3.
 104+ C276 F5          >P_LL129_6502:        push    af                      ;LDX XX12+2             \ Set Q = XX12+2
 104+ C277 3A 22 C1    >                            ld      a,(P_XX12p2)              ;.
 104+ C27A 32 B9 F1    >                            ld      (Xreg),a                ;.
 104+ C27D 32 B6 F1    >                            ld      (Qvar),a                ;STX Q
 104+ C280 F1          >                            pop     af                      ;.
 104+ C281 3A B8 F1    >                            ld      a,(Svar)                ;LDA S                  \ If S is positive, jump to LL127
 104+ C284 A7          >                            and     a                       ;BPL LL127
 104+ C285 F2 9D C2    >                            jp      p,P_LL127_6502            ;.
 104+ C288             >                            ZeroA                           ;.LDA #0                \ Otherwise set R = -R
 104+ C288 AF          >                        xor a
 104+ C289             >                            ClearCarryFlag                  ;SEC
 104+ C289 B7          >                        or a
 104+ C28A 21 B7 F1    >                            ld      hl, Rvar                ;SBC R
 104+ C28D 9E          >                            sbc     (hl)                    ;.
 104+ C28E 32 B7 F1    >                            ld      (Rvar),a                ;STA R
 104+ C291 3A B8 F1    >                            ld      a,(Svar)                ;LDA S                  \ Push S onto the stack
 104+ C294 F5          >                            push    af                      ;PHA
 104+ C295 EE FF       >                            xor     $FF                     ;EOR #%11111111         \ Set S = ~S + 1 + C  ?? is this all just doing |Svar|?
 104+ C297 CE 00       >                            adc     0                       ;ADC #0
 104+ C299 32 B8 F1    >                            ld      (Svar),a                ;STA S
 104+ C29C F1          >                            pop     af                      ;PLA                    \ Pull the original, negative S from the stack into A
 104+ C29D 21 23 C1    >P_LL127_6502:        ld      hl,P_XX12p3               ;EOR XX12+3             \ Set A = original argument S EOR'd with XX12+3
 104+ C2A0 AE          >                            xor     (hl)                    ;.
 104+ C2A1 C9          >                            ret                             ;RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 104+ C2A2             >;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 104+ C2A2             >;--- LL118 Move along a point until on screen
 104+ C2A2             >; In XX1510 x1 as a 16-bit coordinate (x1_hi x1_lo)
 104+ C2A2             >;    XX1532 y1 as a 16-bit coordinate (y1_hi y1_lo)
 104+ C2A2             >;    XX12p2 The line's gradient * 256 (so 1.0 = 256)
 104+ C2A2             >;    XX12p3 The direction of slope: * Positive = top left to bottom right * Negative (bit 7 set) = top right to bottom left
 104+ C2A2             >;    T      The gradient of slope:* 0 if it's a shallow slope * &FF if it's a steep slope
 104+ C2A2             >;  Out  XX150               x1 as an 8-bit coordinate
 104+ C2A2             >;       XX152               y1 as an 8-bit coordinate
 104+ C2A2             >;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 104+ C2A2             >
 104+ C2A2 3A F8 C0    >P_LL118_6502:         ld      a,(P_XX1510+1)            ; LDA XX15+1             \ If x1_hi is positive, jump down to LL119 to skip the
 104+ C2A5 A7          >                            and     a                       ; BPL LL119              \ .
 104+ C2A6 F2 C3 C2    >                            jp      p, P_LL119_6502           ;                        \ following
 104+ C2A9 32 B8 F1    >.X1Negative:                ld      (Svar),a                ; STA S                  \ Otherwise x1_hi is negative, i.e. off the left of the screen, so set S = x1_hi
 104+ C2AC CD C4 C1    >                            call    P_LL120_6502              ; Call LL120 to calculate:  (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0   = x1 * gradient
 104+ C2AF             >                                                    ;                            (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0  = x1 / gradient
 104+ C2AF             >                                                    ; with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 104+ C2AF CD 00 F2    >                            call    ADDYXRegtoY1             ; Set y1 = y1 + (Y X)
 104+ C2B2 22 F9 C0    >                            ld      (P_XX1532),hl             ; .
 104+ C2B5 21 00 00    >                            ld      hl,0                    ; Set x1 = 0
 104+ C2B8 22 F7 C0    >                            ld      (P_XX1510),hl             ; .
 104+ C2BB 3E 00       >                            ld      a,0                     ; set 0 up for replacemetn of the TAX and BEQ bit
 104+ C2BD 32 B9 F1    >                            ld      (Xreg),a                ; TAX                    \ Set X = 0 so the next BEQ becomes a jmp but we will do it anyway in next line
 104+ C2C0 C3 D9 C2    >                            jp      P_LL134_6502              ; just do the jump to LL134 rather than setting to equal flag and then jumping
 104+ C2C3             >;-- Entering LL119 a will always be the value of X1 Hi byte
 104+ C2C3 CA D9 C2    >P_LL119_6502:         jp      z,P_LL134_6502            ; BEQ LL134              \ x1_hi = 0 then jump down to LL134 to skip the following, as the x-coordinate is already on-screen
 104+ C2C6             >                                                            ;                        \ (as 0 <= (x_hi x_lo) <= 255)
 104+ C2C6 32 B8 F1    >                            ld      (Svar),a                ; STA S                  \ Otherwise x1_hi is positive, i.e. x1 >= 256 and off
