 160++C7F9 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 161++C7FC 21 31 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 162++C7FF 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 163++C802 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 164++C805 21 2D C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatRoofvY
 165++C808 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 166++C80B 21 33 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
 167++C80E 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 168++C811 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 169++C814 21 2F C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
 170++C817 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 171++C81A 21 35 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatNosevZ
 172++C81D 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 173++C820 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 174++C823              ApplyPlanetRollOnly:
 175++C823 3A 79 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(P_BnKRotXCounter)
 176++C826 FE FF                                cp      $FF
 177++C828 21 2B C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
 178++C82B 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 179++C82E 21 25 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
 180++C831 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 181++C834 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 182++C837 21 2D C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 183++C83A 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 184++C83D 21 27 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 185++C840 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 186++C843 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 187++C846 21 2F C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
 188++C849 22 7C 7D                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
 189++C84C 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,P_BnKrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
 190++C84F 22 7E 7D                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
 191++C852 CD 10 C7                             call    P_MVS5RotateAxis
 192++C855 C9                                   ret
 193++C856
 194++C856
 195++C856 3A AF 7D     PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch: ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 196++C859 21 A2 7D                             ld      hl,BETA
 197++C85C B6                                   or      (hl)
 198++C85D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 199++C85F CA 10 C9                             jp      z,.NoRotation
 200++C862 3A AF 7D     .CalcAlphaMulX:         ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll magnitude
 201++C865 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -alpha (Q value)
 202++C867 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 203++C868 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 204++C86B 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 205++C86C 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxhi)                ; .
 206++C86F CD E0 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * -alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
 207++C872              .SaveAlphaMulX:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 208++C872                                      ;ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                   ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 209++C872 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
 210++C873 32 02 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+1),a
 211++C876 7B                                   ld      a,e
 212++C877 32 03 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+2),a
 213++C87A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 214++C87B 32 04 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulX+3),a          ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256
 215++C87E ED 5B 14 C0  .CalcK2:                ld      de,(P_BnKyhi)                ; DEL = Y
 216++C882 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                 ; .
 217++C885 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 218++C886 ED 4B 03 C7                          ld      bc,(PlanetAlphaMulX+2)         ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result
 219++C88A 3A 02 C7                             ld      a,(PlanetAlphaMulX+1)          ; Deal with sign in byte 4
 220++C88D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; .
 221++C88E CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = y - (alpha * x)
 222++C891 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; K2  = DEA = DEL = y - (alpha * x)
 223++C892 32 0D C7                             ld      (PlanetK2),a                   ; we also need to save l for teh beta k2 calc
 224++C895 ED 53 0E C7                          ld      (PlanetK2+1),de                ;
 225++C899 EB           .CalcBetaMulK2:         ex      de,hl                       ; HLE == DEA
 226++C89A 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 227++C89B 3A A2 7D                             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; D = BETA
 228++C89E 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 229++C89F CD E0 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = Beta * K2, DEL = Beta/256 * K2
 230++C8A2 ED 4B 17 C0  .CalcZ:                 ld      bc,(P_BnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 231++C8A6 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ;
 232++C8A9 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 233++C8AA CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL still = Beta * K2 so its z + Beta * K2
 234++C8AD ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (P_BnKzhi),de                ; z = resuklt
 235++C8B1 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
 236++C8B2 32 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                 ; .
 237++C8B5 3A A2 7D     .CalcBetaZ:             ld      a,(BETA)
 238++C8B8 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; d = -beta (Q value)
 239++C8BA 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 240++C8BB 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z
 241++C8BE 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 242++C8BF 2A 17 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKzhi)                ; .
 243++C8C2 CD E0 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * -beta, so DEL = Z * -beta / 256 where d = sign byte
 244++C8C5              .SaveAlphaMulZ:         ;ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 245++C8C5                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ),a             ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result                 ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 246++C8C5                                      ;ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later             ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 247++C8C5                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+1),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 248++C8C5                                      ;ld      a,e                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 249++C8C5                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+2),a           ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 250++C8C5                                      ;ld      a,d                         ; .                                                              ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 251++C8C5                                      ;ld      (PlanetBetaMulZ+3),a           ; we actually only want X1 X2 X3 later as its /256               ONLY NEEDED FOR DEBUGGING TEST
 252++C8C5 42 4B        .CalcY:                 ld      bc,de                       ; bch = - Beta * z
 253++C8C7 65                                   ld      h,l
 254++C8C8 ED 5B 0E C7                          ld      de,(PlanetK2+1)                ; DEL = k2
 255++C8CC 3A 0D C7                             ld      a,(PlanetK2)
 256++C8CF 6F                                   ld      l,a
 257++C8D0 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
 258++C8D3 ED 53 14 C0                          ld      (P_BnKyhi),de                ; y = DEL = K2 - Beta * Z
 259++C8D7 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; .
 260++C8D8 32 13 C0                             ld      (P_BnKylo),a                 ; .
 261++C8DB 3A AF 7D     .CalcAlphaMulY:         ld      a,(ALPHA)
 262++C8DE 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha (Q value)
 263++C8DF 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKylo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 264++C8E2 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; .
 265++C8E3 2A 14 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKyhi)                ; .
 266++C8E6 CD E0 90                             call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256 where d = sign byte
 267++C8E9 79           .SaveAlphaMulY:         ld      a,c                         ; a = upper byte of results which will have the sign
 268++C8EA 32 05 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY),a            ; save sign from result, ELC holds actual result
 269++C8ED 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; also save all of alpha *X as we will need it later
 270++C8EE 32 06 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+1),a
 271++C8F1 7B                                   ld      a,e
 272++C8F2 32 07 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+2),a
 273++C8F5 7A                                   ld      a,d
 274++C8F6 32 08 C7                             ld      (PlanetAlphaMulY+3),a
 275++C8F9 42 4B        .CalcxPLusAlphaY:       ld      bc,de                        ; BCH = Y sgn, hi, lo, we loose the C from result Deal with sign in byte 4
 276++C8FB 65                                   ld      h,l                         ; .
 277++C8FC ED 5B 11 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKxhi)                ; DEL = Y
 278++C900 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxlo)                 ; .
 279++C903 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 280++C904 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL = x + alpha * Y
 281++C907 7A           .SaveResult1:           ld      a,d                         ; Result 1 (X) = AHL + DEL
 282++C908 63                                   ld      h,e                         ;
 283++C909 32 12 C0     .CopyResultTo2:         ld      (P_BnKxlo+2),a               ; .
 284++C90C 22 10 C0                             ld      (P_BnKxlo) ,hl               ; .
 285++C90F C9                                   ret
 286++C910 3A 90 7E     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 287++C913                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 287++C913 A7          >                        and     a
 287++C914 C8          >                        ret     z
 288++C915 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ;
 289++C917 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 290++C918 06 80                                ld      b,$80                       ;
 291++C91A ED 5B 17 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 292++C91E 3A 16 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzlo)                 ; .
 293++C921 6F                                   ld      l,a                         ; .
 294++C922 CD AF 00                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 295++C925 ED 53 17 C0                          ld      (P_BnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 296++C929 7D                                   ld      a,l
 297++C92A 32 16 C0                             ld      (P_BnKzlo),a                ;
 298++C92D C9                                   ret

 378+ C93E DD 4E 00     MaximiseHLVector:       ld      c,(ix+0)
 379+ C941 DD 46 01                             ld      b,(ix+1)
 380+ C944 DD 5E 02                             ld      e,(ix+2)
 381+ C947 DD 56 03                             ld      d,(ix+3)
 382+ C94A DD 6E 04                             ld      l,(ix+4)
 383+ C94D DD 66 05                             ld      h,(ix+5)
 384+ C950              MaxShiftOutSign:        ShiftBCLeft1
 384+ C950 CB 21       >			   sla c
 384+ C952 CB 10       >			   rl  b
 385+ C954                                      ShiftDELeft1
 385+ C954 CB 23       >			   sla e
 385+ C956 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 386+ C958                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 386+ C958 CB 25       >			   sla l
 386+ C95A CB 14       >			   rl  h
 387+ C95C 78           MaximiseIXVector:       ld      a,b                 ; Now loop round until bit 7 is populated
 388+ C95D B2                                   or      d
 389+ C95E B3                                   or      e
 390+ C95F E6 80                                and     $80
 391+ C961 CA 50 C9                             jp      z,MaxShiftOutSign
 392+ C964              .MakeSpaceForSign:      ShiftBCRight1               ; Now go back 1 so sign bit is clear
 392+ C964 CB 38       >			   srl b
 392+ C966 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 393+ C968                                      ShiftDERight1
 393+ C968 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 393+ C96A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 394+ C96C                                      ShiftHLRight1
 394+ C96C CB 3C       >			   srl h
 394+ C96E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 395+ C970 DD 7E 00                             ld      a,(ix+0)
 396+ C973 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 397+ C975 B0                                   or      b
 398+ C976 DD 7E 01                             ld      a,(ix+1)
 399+ C979 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 400+ C97B B2                                   or      d
 401+ C97C DD 7E 03                             ld      a,(ix+3)
 402+ C97F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 403+ C981 B3                                   or      e
 404+ C982 DD 71 00                             ld      (ix+0),c
 405+ C985 DD 70 01                             ld      (ix+1),b

 451+ C9A2              ;;INWORK Subroutine: SP2 (Flight)
 452+ C9A2              ;;INWORK
 453+ C9A2              ;;INWORK Draw a dot on the compass, given the planet/station vector
 454+ C9A2
 455+ C9A2              ; Drawing planets Subroutine: PL2 (Flight) Remove the planet or sun from the screen
 456+ C9A2              ;                             PLANET (Flight) Draw the planet or sun
 457+ C9A2              ;                             PL9 (Part 1 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet, with either an equator and meridian, or a crater
 458+ C9A2              ;                             PL9 (Part 2 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's equator and meridian
 459+ C9A2              ;                             PL9 (Part 3 of 3) (Flight) Draw the planet's crater
 460+ C9A2              ;                             PLS1 (Flight)  Calculate (Y A) = nosev_x / z
 461+ C9A2              ;                             PLS2 (Flight) Draw a half-ellipse
 462+ C9A2              ;                             PLS22 (Flight) Draw an ellipse or half-ellipse
 463+ C9A2
 464+ C9A2
 465+ C9A2              ; Drawing circles Subroutine: CIRCLE (Flight) Draw a circle for the planet
 466+ C9A2              ;                             CIRCLE2 (Flight) Draw a circle (for the planet or chart)
 467+ C9A2              ;                             WPLS2 (Flight) Remove the planet from the screen
 468+ C9A2              ;                             WP1 (Flight) Reset the ball line heap
 469+ C9A2              ; Drawing planets PL21 (Flight) Return from a planet/sun-drawing routine with a failure flag
 470+ C9A2              ;                 PLS3 (Flight) Calculate (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z
 471+ C9A2              ;                 PLS4 (Flight) Calculate CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 472+ C9A2              ;                 PLS5 (Flight) Calculate roofv_x / z and roofv_y / z
 473+ C9A2              ;                 PLS6 (Flight) Calculate (X K) = (A P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 474+ C9A2              ; SPS1 (Flight) Calculate the vector to the planet and store it in XX15
 475+ C9A2              ; MV40 rate planet by our pitch
 476+ C9A2              ;
 477+ C9A2              ;look at PL9
 478+ C9A2
 479+ C9A2
 480+ C9A2              ; Optimisation
 481+ C9A2              ; if a <> 0
 482+ C9A2              ;       divide AH by CD
 483+ C9A2              ; if h <> 0
 484+ C9A2              ;      if c <> 0 return 0
 485+ C9A2              ;      else
 486+ C9A2              ;        divide HL by DE
 487+ C9A2              ; if l <>0
 488+ C9A2              ;      if c or d <> 0 return 0
 489+ C9A2              ;      else
 490+ C9A2              ;        divide l by e
 491+ C9A2              ;
 492+ C9A2 47           PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE:  ld      b,a                         ; save a reg
 493+ C9A3 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; check for divide by zero
 494+ C9A4 B2                                   or      d                           ; .
 495+ C9A5 B3                                   or      e                           ; .
 496+ C9A6                                      JumpIfZero      .divideByZero       ; .
 496+ C9A6 CA BF C9    >                        jp	z,.divideByZero
 497+ C9A9 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; get a back
 498+ C9AA                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideAHLbyCDE
 498+ C9AA A7          >                        and     a
 498+ C9AB C2 C7 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideAHLbyCDE
 499+ C9AE 7C           .AIsZero:               ld      a,h
 500+ C9AF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideHLbyDE
 500+ C9AF A7          >                        and     a
 500+ C9B0 C2 CE C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideHLbyDE
 501+ C9B3 7D           .HIsZero:               ld      a,l
 502+ C9B4                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero    .divideLbyE
 502+ C9B4 A7          >                        and     a
 502+ C9B5 C2 DD C9    >                        jp	    nz,.divideLbyE
 503+ C9B8              .resultIsZero:          ZeroA
 503+ C9B8 AF          >                        xor a
 504+ C9B9 67                                   ld      h,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 505+ C9BA 6F                                   ld      l,a                        ; result is zero so set hlde
 506+ C9BB 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 507+ C9BD                                      ClearCarryFlag
 507+ C9BD B7          >                        or a
 508+ C9BE C9                                   ret
 509+ C9BF 3E FF        .divideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 510+ C9C1 67                                   ld      h,a
 511+ C9C2 6F                                   ld      l,a
 512+ C9C3 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
 513+ C9C5                                      SetCarryFlag
 513+ C9C5 37          >                        scf
 514+ C9C6 C9                                   ret
 515+ C9C7              ; AHL = ahl/cde, this could be a genuine 24 bit divide
 516+ C9C7              ; if AHL is large and cde small then the value will be big so will be off screen so we can risk 16 bit divide
 517+ C9C7 CD 27 8F     .divideAHLbyCDE:        call    Div24by24
 518+ C9CA EB                                   ex      hl,de                         ; ahl is result
 519+ C9CB 79                                   ld      a,c                           ; ahl is result
 520+ C9CC                                      ClearCarryFlag
 520+ C9CC B7          >                        or a
 521+ C9CD C9                                   ret
 522+ C9CE              ; AHL = 0hl/0de as A is zero
 523+ C9CE 79           .divideHLbyDE:          ld      a,c                         ;'if c = 0 then result must be zero
 524+ C9CF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 524+ C9CF A7          >                        and     a
 524+ C9D0 C2 B8 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 525+ C9D3 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 526+ C9D5 CD 52 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                   ; BC = HL/DE
 527+ C9D8 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 528+ C9DA                                      ZeroA                               ; so we can set A to Zero
 528+ C9DA AF          >                        xor a
 529+ C9DB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 529+ C9DB B7          >                        or a
 530+ C9DC C9                                   ret
 531+ C9DD              ; AHL = 00l/00e as A and H are zero
 532+ C9DD 79           .divideLbyE:            ld      a,c                         ; if d = 0 then result must be zero
 533+ C9DE B2                                   or      d
 534+ C9DF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero   .resultIsZero
 534+ C9DF A7          >                        and     a
 534+ C9E0 C2 B8 C9    >                        jp	    nz,.resultIsZero
 535+ C9E3 4B                                   ld      c,e
 536+ C9E4 5D                                   ld      e,l
 537+ C9E5 CD 14 95                             call    E_Div_C
 538+ C9E8 6F                                   ld      l,a
 539+ C9E9                                      ZeroA
 539+ C9E9 AF          >                        xor a
 540+ C9EA 67                                   ld      h,a
 541+ C9EB                                      ClearCarryFlag
 541+ C9EB B7          >                        or a
 542+ C9EC C9                                   ret
 543+ C9ED
 544+ C9ED              ; Project XY to screen location
 545+ C9ED DD 26 00     ProjectPlanet:          ld      ixh,0
 546+ C9F0 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 547+ C9F3 3A 12 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 548+ C9F6 CD 0B CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 549+ C9F9 22 0C C1                             ld      (P_centreX),hl
 550+ C9FC DD 24                                inc     ixh
 551+ C9FE 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 552+ CA01 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 553+ CA04 CD 0B CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex         ; hl = PixelCentreY + (Y / Z)*-1 (as its 0 = top of screen)
 554+ CA07 22 12 C1                             ld      (P_centreY),hl
 555+ CA0A C9                                   ret
 556+ CA0B
 557+ CA0B              ; PlanetProcessVertex AHL = X or Y position (sign in A)
 558+ CA0B              ;                     fetches z as this used in both calcs
 559+ CA0B 47           PlanetProcessVertex:    ld      b,a                         ; save sign/high byte
 560+ CA0C ED 5B 16 C0  .PlanetProjectToEye:    ld      de,(P_BnKzlo)               ; B H L   = X or Y
 561+ CA10 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)               ; IYH D E = z
 562+ CA13 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; save sign
 563+ CA15                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A D E   = | z |
 563+ CA15 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 564+ CA17                                      ; Addeed as it neds to be AHL/0CD to force * 256 and get correct screen position on scaling
 565+ CA17 5A                                   ld      e,d                         ; C D E   = A D E * 256, i.e. 0 A D
 566+ CA18 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; .
 567+ CA19 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ; .
 568+ CA1B                                      ; added above to correct positioning as in reality its X/(Z/256) to get +-256 rather than +- 1
 569+ CA1B 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; copy X or Y sign into iyl
 570+ CA1C FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; .
 571+ CA1E                                      ClearSignBitA                       ; A H L = |X| (or |Y|)
 571+ CA1E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 572+ CA20 CD A2 C9                             call PlanetAHLequAHLDivCDE          ; AHL = AHL/CDE unsigned
 573+ CA23 DA 82 CA                             jp      c,.IsOffScreen              ; carry flag indicates failure
 574+ CA26              .CheckPosOnScreen:      JumpIfAIsNotZero .IsOffScreen       ; if A has a value then its way too large regardless of sign
 574+ CA26 A7          >                        and     a
 574+ CA27 C2 82 CA    >                        jp	    nz,.IsOffScreen
 575+ CA2A                                      JumpOnLeadSignSet h, .IsOffScreen   ; or bit 7 set of h
 575+ CA2A 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 575+ CA2B E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 575+ CA2D C2 82 CA    >                        jp      nz,.IsOffScreen
 576+ CA30 DD 7C        .CheckXorY:             ld      a,ixh
 577+ CA32                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ProcessYCoord
 577+ CA32 A7          >                        and     a
 577+ CA33 C2 59 CA    >                        jp	    nz,.ProcessYCoord
 578+ CA36              ; Handle X Coord offset
 579+ CA36 FD 7C        .ProcessXCoord:         ld      a,iyh                       ; determine if its + or - value of AHL/CDE
 580+ CA38 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 581+ CA3A E6 80                                and     $80
 582+ CA3C CA 45 CA                             jp      z,.ProcessXPositive
 583+ CA3F              .ProcessXNegative:      macronegate16hl
 583+ CA3F AF          >					xor 	a
 583+ CA40 95          >					sub 	l
 583+ CA41 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 583+ CA42 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 583+ CA43 94          >					sub 	h
 583+ CA44 67          >					ld 		h,a
 584+ CA45 11 80 00     .ProcessXPositive:      ld      de,128
 585+ CA48                                      ClearCarryFlag
 585+ CA48 B7          >                        or a
 586+ CA49 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; now X position is CenterX+ (X / Z) in 2's c
 587+ CA4B 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ; set de to | hl for +/- 1024 check
 588+ CA4D F2 7A CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 589+ CA50                                      macronegate16de                     ; .
 589+ CA50 AF          >					xor 	a
 589+ CA51 93          >                    sub 	e
 589+ CA52 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 589+ CA53 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 589+ CA54 92          >                    sub 	d
 589+ CA55 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 590+ CA56 C3 7A CA                             jp      .CheckBoundaries            ; .
 591+ CA59              ; Handle Y Coord offset
 592+ CA59 FD 7C        .ProcessYCoord:         ld      a,iyh
 593+ CA5B FD AD                                xor     iyl
 594+ CA5D E6 80                                and     $80
 595+ CA5F CA 68 CA                             jp      z,.ProcessYPositive
 596+ CA62              .ProcessYNegative:      macronegate16hl
 596+ CA62 AF          >					xor 	a
 596+ CA63 95          >					sub 	l
 596+ CA64 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 596+ CA65 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 596+ CA66 94          >					sub 	h
 596+ CA67 67          >					ld 		h,a
 597+ CA68 11 40 00     .ProcessYPositive:      ld      de,64                       ; set hl to center Y and de to 2s'c Y/Z
 598+ CA6B EB                                   ex      de,hl
 599+ CA6C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 599+ CA6C B7          >                        or a
 600+ CA6D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; now HL  position is CenterY - (Y / Z) in 2's c
 601+ CA6F 54 5D                                ld      de,hl                       ;
 602+ CA71 F2 7A CA                             jp      p,.CheckBoundaries          ; .
 603+ CA74                                      macronegate16de                     ; load DE with | result to simplify +-1024 check|
 603+ CA74 AF          >					xor 	a
 603+ CA75 93          >                    sub 	e
 603+ CA76 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 603+ CA77 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 603+ CA78 92          >                    sub 	d
 603+ CA79 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 604+ CA7A 7A           .CheckBoundaries:       ld      a,d
 605+ CA7B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 4, .IsOffScreen     ; if |position| > 1024 then way to large
 605+ CA7B FE 04       >                        cp     4
 605+ CA7D D2 82 CA    >                        jp		nc,.IsOffScreen
 606+ CA80              .calculatedVert:        ClearCarryFlag
 606+ CA80 B7          >                        or a
 607+ CA81 C9                                   ret
 608+ CA82 21 FF 7F     .IsOffScreen:           ld      hl,$7FFF
 609+ CA85 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 610+ CA87 FD AD                                xor     iyl
 611+ CA89                                      SignBitOnlyA
 611+ CA89 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 612+ CA8B 28 02                                jr      z,.calculatedOffScreen
 613+ CA8D 23                                   inc     hl                          ; set hl to $8001 i.e. -32768
 614+ CA8E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; .
 615+ CA8F              .calculatedOffScreen:   SetCarryFlag
 615+ CA8F 37          >                        scf
 616+ CA90 C9                                   ret
 617+ CA91
 618+ CA91
 619+ CA91              ; .........................................................................................................................
 620+ CA91              ; we only hit this if z is positive so we can ignore signs
 621+ CA91              ; calculates 24576/z, maxes at 248
 622+ CA91 ED 4B 16 C0  PlanetCalculateRadius:  ld      bc,(P_BnKzlo)                ; DBC = z position
 623+ CA95 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ;
 624+ CA98 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
 625+ CA99 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000  ; was hl          ; planet radius at Z = 1 006000
 626+ CA9C CD F2 93                             call    Div16by24usgn               ; radius = HL/DBC = 24576 / distance z
 627+ CA9F B4                                   or      h                           ; if A or H are not 0 then max Radius
 628+ CAA0                                      JumpIfAIsZero  .SaveRadius
 628+ CAA0 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 628+ CAA1 CA A7 CA    >                        jp	    z, .SaveRadius
 629+ CAA4 21 F8 00     .MaxRadius:             ld      hl,248                      ; set radius to 248 as maxed out
 630+ CAA7 7D           .SaveRadius:            ld      a,l                         ; l = resultant radius
 631+ CAA8 F6 01                                or      1                           ; at least radius 1 (never even so need to test)
 632+ CAAA                                      DISPLAY "DONE - Eliiminate the check to see if planet radius is > 255 as its already fixed in Planet Calculate Radius"
 633+ CAAA                                      ;ld      l,a                        ;
 634+ CAAA                                      ;ld      (P_Radius),hl              ; save a copy of radius now for later
 635+ CAAA 32 EB C0                             ld      (P_Radius),a
 636+ CAAD 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; as later code expects it to be in e
 637+ CAAE 16 08        .CalculateStep:         ld      d,8
 638+ CAB0                                      JumpIfALTNusng 8, .DoneStepCalc
 638+ CAB0 FE 08       >                        cp      8
 638+ CAB2 DA BE CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 639+ CAB5 CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 640+ CAB7                                      JumpIfALTNusng 60, .DoneStepCalc
 640+ CAB7 FE 3C       >                        cp      60
 640+ CAB9 DA BE CA    >                        jp		c, .DoneStepCalc
 641+ CABC CB 3A                                srl     d                           ; d = d / 2
 642+ CABE 7A           .DoneStepCalc:          ld      a,d
 643+ CABF 32 A1 C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
 644+ CAC2 C9                                   ret
 645+ CAC3
 646+ CAC3              ; Shorter version when sun does not need to be processed to screen
 647+ CAC3 3A 12 C0     PlanetUpdateCompass:    ld      a,(P_BnKxsgn)
 648+ CAC6 2A 10 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKxlo)
 649+ CAC9 CD 0B CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 650+ CACC 22 19 C0                             ld      (P_CompassX),hl
 651+ CACF 3A 15 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKysgn)
 652+ CAD2 2A 13 C0                             ld      hl,(P_BnKylo)
 653+ CAD5 CD 0B CA                             call    PlanetProcessVertex
 654+ CAD8 22 1B C0                             ld      (P_CompassY),hl
 655+ CADB C9                                   ret
 656+ CADC
 657+ CADC                                 ; could probabyl set a variable say "varGood", default as 1 then set to 0 if we end up with a good calulation?? may not need it as we draw here
 658+ CADC CD 56 C8     PlanetUpdateAndRender:  call    PlanetApplyMyRollAndPitch    ; not needed for solid as yet
 659+ CADF 3A 18 C0     .DrawSolidPlanet:       ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 660+ CAE2 A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 661+ CAE3 FA 32 CB                             jp      m,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; if its negative then behind so exit
 662+ CAE6              .TooFarAway:            JumpIfAGTENusng   48,.SkipDrawPlanet  ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 662+ CAE6 FE 30       >                        cp     48
 662+ CAE8 D2 32 CB    >                        jp		nc,.SkipDrawPlanet
 663+ CAEB 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 664+ CAEE B6                                   or      (hl)                         ; .
 665+ CAEF CA 32 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; .
 666+ CAF2              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 667+ CAF2 CD ED C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet                ; Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 668+ CAF5 CD 91 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 669+ CAF8                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 670+ CAF8                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 671+ CAF8 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 672+ CAFB ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 673+ CAFF 3A EB C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 674+ CB02 A7                                   and     a
 675+ CB03 CA 32 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet            ; skip 0 size
 676+ CB06 4F                                   ld      c,a
 677+ CB07 3A F4 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour1)
 678+ CB0A 47                                   ld      b,a
 679+ CB0B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 679+ CB0B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 680+ CB0F CD 95 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 681+ CB12                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng P_Radius, 5, .SkipDrawPlanet
 681+ CB12 3A EB C0    >                        ld      a,(P_Radius)
 681+ CB15 FE 05       >                        cp      5
 681+ CB17 DA 32 CB    >                        jp	  c,.SkipDrawPlanet
 682+ CB1A FE 05                                cp      5               ; radius < 3 means no atmosphere
 683+ CB1C 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; as a holds radius from Jump Macro
 684+ CB1D CA 32 CB                             jp      z,.SkipDrawPlanet
 685+ CB20 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX) ; just to test putting a rim there
 686+ CB23 ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 687+ CB27 3A F5 C0                             ld      a,(P_Colour2)
 688+ CB2A 47                                   ld      b,a
 689+ CB2B                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 689+ CB2B ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 690+ CB2F CD 99 EC                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 691+ CB32 CD C3 CA     .SkipDrawPlanet:        call    PlanetUpdateCompass
 692+ CB35 C9                                   ret                                 ; else x is totally off the left side of the screen
 693+ CB36              ;
 694+ CB36              ; (PLS4)
 695+ CB36              ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 696+ CB36 3A 36 C0     CalcNoseSideArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 697+ CB39 EE 80                                xor     $80
 698+ CB3B 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 699+ CB3E 3A 2A C0                             ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatSidevZ + 1)
 700+ CB41 C3 4F CB                             jp      CalcArcTanPiPA
 701+ CB44              ;  CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 702+ CB44 3A 36 C0     CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI:   ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatNosevZ + 1)   ; P = - nosevz hi
 703+ CB47 EE 80                                xor     $80
 704+ CB49 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 705+ CB4C 3A 30 C0                             ld      a, (P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ + 1)
 706+ CB4F              ; CNT2 = arctan(P / A) / 4
 707+ CB4F 32 96 7E     CalcArcTanPiPA:         ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A
 708+ CB52 CD AE 91                             call    ARCTAN                      ; A = arctan(P / Q)
 709+ CB55 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; save a
 710+ CB56 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ+1)
 711+ CB59 E6 80                                and     $80
 712+ CB5B 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; restore a as it doesn't affect flags doing an ld
 713+ CB5C FA 61 CB                             jp      m,.SkipFlipSign             ; If nosev_z_hi is negativeleave the angle in A as a positive
 714+ CB5F              ; Adds 128 to the result (rather than makes it negative)
 715+ CB5F EE 80        .FlipSign:              xor     $80                         ; If we get here then nosev_z_hi is positive, so flip bit 7 of the angle in A, which is the same as adding 128
 716+ CB61 CB 3F        .SkipFlipSign:          srl     a                           ; Set CNT2 = A / 4
 717+ CB63 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 718+ CB65 32 D5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; .
 719+ CB68 C9                                   ret
 720+ CB69
 721+ CB69              ; (PSL1)
 722+ CB69              ; XX16 K2) = nosev_x / z
 723+ CB69 2A 31 C0     CalcNoseXDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevX)
 724+ CB6C ED 5B 35 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 725+ CB70 C3 A2 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 726+ CB73 2A 33 C0     CalcNoseYDivNoseZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatNosevY)
 727+ CB76 ED 5B 35 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)
 728+ CB7A C3 A2 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 729+ CB7D 2A 2B C0     CalcRoofXDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 730+ CB80 ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 731+ CB84 C3 A2 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 732+ CB87 2A 2D C0     CalcRoofYDivRoofZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 733+ CB8A ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 734+ CB8E C3 A2 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 735+ CB91 2A 25 C0     CalcSideXDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevX)
 736+ CB94 ED 5B 29 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 737+ CB98 C3 A2 CB                             jp      CalcRotMatDivide
 738+ CB9B 2A 27 C0     CalcSideYDivSideZ:      ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatSidevY)
 739+ CB9E ED 5B 29 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatSidevZ)
 740+ CBA2              ; (PLS1) (Y A) = nosev_x / z where B = Y (also stores in regY), K+3 = sign of calculation
 741+ CBA2              ; stores result in BC now as well
 742+ CBA2              ; does not do increment of X as its not needed when directly loading verticies of rotation
 743+ CBA2              CalcRotMatDivide:
 744+ CBA2 7B           .LoadDEtoQRS:           ld      a,e                         ; Q
 745+ CBA3 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
 746+ CBA6 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ;
 747+ CBA7 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ;
 748+ CBA9 32 97 7E                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 749+ CBAC 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ;
 750+ CBAD E6 80                                and     $80                         ;
 751+ CBAF 32 98 7E                             ld      (varS),a                    ;
 752+ CBB2 7D           .LoadHLtoP012:          ld      a,l                         ; set A P+1 P to (signnoseX) (|noseX|)
 753+ CBB3 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; set P to nosevX lo
 754+ CBB6 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; set P_1 to |nosevX hi|
 755+ CBB7 44                                   ld      b,h                         ; .
 756+ CBB8 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; .
 757+ CBBA 32 98 7D                             ld      (varP+1),a                  ; .
 758+ CBBD 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; set a to sign nosevX
 759+ CBBE E6 80                                and     $80
 760+ CBC0 32 99 7D                             ld      (varP+2),a
 761+ CBC3 CD BB 92                             call    DVID3B                      ; call DVI3B2 variane where z is in de as 16 bit and needs expanding to 32
 762+ CBC6 3A AA 7E                             ld      a,(varK+1)                  ; get second byte into b
 763+ CBC9 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; and also check to see if its
 764+ CBCA A7                                   and     a                           ; zero
 765+ CBCB 3A A9 7E                             ld      a,(varK)
 766+ CBCE 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; so now BC = result too
 767+ CBCF CA D5 CB                             jp      z,.Skip254
 768+ CBD2 3E FE        .Force254Result:        ld      a,254                       ; if 2nd byte is non zero set a to 254 as our max 1 byte value to return
 769+ CBD4 4F                                   ld      c,a
 770+ CBD5 F5           .Skip254:               push    af
 771+ CBD6 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; if a is 0 then force sign to be +ve
 772+ CBD7 A7                                   and     a
 773+ CBD8 C2 E1 CB                             jp      nz,.DoNotForceSign
 774+ CBDB 32 81 7D     .ForceSignPositive:     ld      (regY),a
 775+ CBDE 47                                   ld      b,a
 776+ CBDF F1                                   pop     af
 777+ CBE0 C9                                   ret
 778+ CBE1 3A AC 7E     .DoNotForceSign:        ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; set b to sign (which was Y in 6502)
 779+ CBE4 32 81 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 780+ CBE7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; bc also is result as c was a copy of a
 781+ CBE8 F1                                   pop     af                          ; so c doesn't need to be pushed to stack
 782+ CBE9 C9                                   ret
 783+ CBEA
 784+ CBEA              ; (PLS3)
 785+ CBEA              ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 786+ CBEA 2A 2B C0     Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvX)
 787+ CBED ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 788+ CBF1 C3 FB CB                             jp      Calc222MulHLDivDE
 789+ CBF4              ; (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
 790+ CBF4 2A 2D C0     Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ:ld      hl,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvY)
 791+ CBF7 ED 5B 2F C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ)
 792+ CBFB              ; Optimise, move result at the end into HL instead of YA (we can ignore P)
 793+ CBFB CD A2 CB     Calc222MulHLDivDE:      call    CalcRotMatDivide            ; calculate (Y A) = nosev_x(orY) / z
 794+ CBFE 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; P = |roofv_x / z|
 795+ CBFF 1E DE                                ld      e,222                       ; LDA #222               \ Set Q = 222, the offset to the crater
 796+ CC01                                      ; Not needed                        ; STA Q
 797+ CC01                                      ; Not needed                        ; STX U                  \ Store the vector index X in U for retrieval after the  call to MULTU
 798+ CC01 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; call MULTU (unsigned multiply) de = 222 * |roofv_x / z|
 799+ CC03 3A AC 7E                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDY K+3                \ If the sign of the result in K+3 is positive, skip to
 800+ CC06 A7                                   and     a
 801+ CC07 F2 27 CC                             jp      p,.PL12                     ; BPL PL12               \ PL12 to return with Y = 0
 802+ CC0A 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                       ; LDY #&FF               \ Set Y = &FF to be a negative high byte
 803+ CC0C 32 81 7D                             ld      (regY),a                    ; .
 804+ CC0F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
 805+ CC10                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise the result should be negative, so negate
 805+ CC10 AF          >					xor 	a
 805+ CC11 93          >                    sub 	e
 805+ CC12 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 805+ CC13 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 805+ CC14 92          >                    sub 	d
 805+ CC15 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 806+ CC16 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; now we have Y A P (with Y in b also)
 807+ CC17 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a                    ; .
 808+ CC1A 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; .
 809+ CC1B A7                                   and     a
 810+ CC1C CA 20 CC                             jp      z,.ForcePositive            ; if A is 0, special case to make +ve
 811+ CC1F C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 812+ CC20              .ForcePositive:         ZeroA                               ; set regY and b to 0
 812+ CC20 AF          >                        xor a
 813+ CC21 32 81 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 814+ CC24 47                                   ld      b,a
 815+ CC25 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; get d back into a again
 816+ CC26 C9                                   ret
 817+ CC27              .PL12:                  ZeroA                               ; set Y A P to be 0 D E from mul
 817+ CC27 AF          >                        xor a
 818+ CC28 47                                   ld      b,a
 819+ CC29 32 81 7D                             ld      (regY),a
 820+ CC2C 7B                                   ld      a,e
 821+ CC2D 32 97 7D                             ld      (varP),a
 822+ CC30 7A                                   ld      a,d
 823+ CC31 C9                                   ret
 824+ CC32
 825+ CC32
 826+ CC32              ; K3(1 0) = (Y A) + K3(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 827+ CC32 6F           CalcCraterCenterX:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 828+ CC33 3A 81 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 829+ CC36 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 830+ CC37 ED 5B BD 7E                          ld      de,(varK3)                  ; de = K3 [ 1 0 ]
 831+ CC3B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 831+ CC3B B7          >                        or a
 832+ CC3C ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
 833+ CC3E 22 BD 7E                             ld      (varK3),hl                  ; K3[1 0] = hl + de
 834+ CC41 C9                                   ret
 835+ CC42
 836+ CC42              ; K4(1 0) = (Y A) - K4(1 0) = 222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
 837+ CC42 6F           CalcCraterCenterY:      ld      l,a                         ; set HL to Y A
 838+ CC43 3A 81 7D                             ld      a,(regY)                    ;
 839+ CC46 67                                   ld      h,a                         ;
 840+ CC47 ED 5B C3 7E                          ld      de,(varK4)                  ; de = K4 [ 1 0 ]
 841+ CC4B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 841+ CC4B B7          >                        or a
 842+ CC4C ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 843+ CC4E 22 C3 7E                             ld      (varK4),hl                  ; K4[1 0] = hl + de
 844+ CC51 C9                                   ret
 845+ CC52
 846+ CC52 CB 7C        TwosCompToLeadingSign:  bit     7,h
 847+ CC54 C8                                   ret     z
 848+ CC55                                      macronegate16hl
 848+ CC55 AF          >					xor 	a
 848+ CC56 95          >					sub 	l
 848+ CC57 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 848+ CC58 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 848+ CC59 94          >					sub 	h
 848+ CC5A 67          >					ld 		h,a
 849+ CC5B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 850+ CC5C F6 80                                or      $80
 851+ CC5E 67                                   ld      h,a
 852+ CC5F C9                                   ret
 853+ CC60
 854+ CC60 CB 7C        LeadingSignToTwosComp:  bit     7,h
 855+ CC62 C8                                   ret     z
 856+ CC63 7C                                   ld      a,h
 857+ CC64 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 858+ CC66 67                                   ld      h,a
 859+ CC67                                      macronegate16hl
 859+ CC67 AF          >					xor 	a
 859+ CC68 95          >					sub 	l
 859+ CC69 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 859+ CC6A 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 859+ CC6B 94          >					sub 	h
 859+ CC6C 67          >					ld 		h,a
 860+ CC6D C9                                   ret
 861+ CC6E
 862+ CC6E              ;-- bc = bc * P_radius where bc = S.Fraction ,e.g nosex/nosey
 863+ CC6E 3A EB C0     P_BCmulRadius:          ld      a,(P_Radius)                ; we probably don't have radius already
 864+ CC71 57           P_BCmulRadiusInA:       ld      d,a                         ; d = radius already in a
 865+ CC72 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; e = c (as we only hold 0.8 in bc, i.e. fractional +/- > 0)
 866+ CC73 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; mulitply raidus by c which will be fractional  generating a 8.X value)
 867+ CC75 4A                                   ld      c,d                         ; we only want the whole number, preserving sign in b
 868+ CC76 C9                                   ret
 869+ CC77
 870+ CC77                 ; DEFINE  PlanetDebugLocal 1
 871+ CC77              PlanetDraw:             IFDEF BLINEDEBUG
 872+ CC77 ~                                            call    TestBLINE
 873+ CC77                                      ENDIF
 874+ CC77                                      IFDEF TESTMERIDIAN
 875+ CC77 ~                                            call    TestMeridian
 876+ CC77                                      ENDIF
 877+ CC77                                      IFDEF PlanetDebugLocal
 878+ CC77 ~                                            ZeroA
 879+ CC77 ~                                            ; x 500, y 50, z 2000: 500/7,50/7 =>71,7 => 199,71 Yes
 880+ CC77 ~                                            ; radius becomes 24576/2000 = 12 (13 is good enough yes)
 881+ CC77 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKxsgn),a
 882+ CC77 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKysgn),a
 883+ CC77 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzsgn),a
 884+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl, 0

 886+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl,0

 888+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl, 1500
 889+ CC77 ~                                            ld      (P_BnKzlo),hl

 891+ CC77 ~                                            ld      bc,6144

 899+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl,18432
 900+ CC77 ~                                            ld      bc,$9800

 922+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)

 922+ CC77 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
 923+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreY)

 924+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
 925+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 925+ CC77 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius

 926+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ

 927+ CC77 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
 928+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ

 936+ CC77 ~                                            ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 936+ CC77 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 936+ CC77 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl

 937+ CC77 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 937+ CC77 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl

 939+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
 939+ CC77 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius

 941+ CC77 ~                                            call    CalcSideXDivSideZ

 947+ CC77 ~
 948+ CC77 ~
 949+ CC77                                      ENDIF
 950+ CC77 3A 18 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKzsgn)                ; a = z sign of position
 951+ CC7A A7           .ElimiateBehind:        and     a
 952+ CC7B F8                                   ret     m                           ; if its negative then behind so exit
 953+ CC7C              .TooFarAway:            ReturnIfAGTEusng   48               ; if sign (high byte 2) > 48 then too far away to render
 953+ CC7C FE 30       >                        cp    48
 953+ CC7E D0          >                        ret	 nc
 954+ CC7F 21 17 C0                             ld      hl, P_BnKzhi                 ; if |P_BnKzsgn| or P_BnKzsgn are both 0 then the planet is too close so return
 955+ CC82 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 956+ CC83 C8                                   ret     z                           ; .
 957+ CC84              ;                       loads P_centreX and Y with planet on screen centre
 958+ CC84 CD ED C9     .Project                call    ProjectPlanet               ;  Project the planet/sun onto the screen, returning the centre's coordinates in K3(1 0) and K4(1 0)
 959+ CC87 D8                                   ret     c                           ; If the C flag is set by PROJ then the planet/sun is  not visible on-screen, so return
 960+ CC88 CD 91 CA     .CalcRadius:            call    PlanetCalculateRadius
 961+ CC8B                              IFDEF   PLANETSARESOLID
 962+ CC8B                                      DISPLAY "ASSMEBLING WITH SOLID PLANETS"
 963+ CC8B                                      DISPLAY "TODO, pick colour based on galaxy map"
 964+ CC8B 2A 0C C1                             ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 965+ CC8E ED 5B 12 C1                          ld      de,(P_centreY)
 966+ CC92 3A EB C0                             ld      a,(P_Radius)
 967+ CC95 4F                                   ld      c,a
 968+ CC96 06 CF                                ld      b,$CF
 969+ CC98                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 969+ CC98 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 970+ CC9C CD 95 EE                             call    l2_draw_clipped_circle_filled
 971+ CC9F C9                                   ret
 972+ CCA0
 973+ CCA0                              ELSE
 974+ CCA0 ~
 975+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: calculate STP step based on planet size"
 976+ CCA0 ~            ; Note we don't to the planet type check as hitting here its always a planet
 977+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:set color green"
 978+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO:draw circle (do we draw solid??)"
 979+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      hl, (P_centreX)
 980+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      de,(P_centreY)

 982+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      c,a
