 985+ CCA0 ~                                    call    l2_draw_clipped_circle
 986+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Add check to see if on screen rather than checkign clipped Circle"
 987+ CCA0 ~                                    ;ret     c                           ; circle failure means exit
 988+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "DONE: REmoved check for Planet Radius high as its already done win calculate radius"
 989+ CCA0 ~                                    ;ReturnIfMemNotZero    P_RadiusHigh   ; if planet raidus < 256 draw meridians or craters
 990+ CCA0 ~            .DrawFeatures:          ;ld      a,(P_RadiusHigh)
 991+ CCA0 ~                                    ;and     a
 992+ CCA0 ~                                    ;ret     nz
 993+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Need logic to generate Planet Type"
 994+ CCA0 ~            .DetermineFeature:      ld      a,(P_BnKShipType)
 995+ CCA0 ~                                    cp      PlanetTypeMeridian
 996+ CCA0 ~                                    jp      nz,DrawPlanetCrater
 997+ CCA0 ~            DrawPlanetMeridian:     ld      a,(P_Radius)                 ; we only pull low byte as that is all we are interested in
 998+ CCA0 ~            .MinSizeCheck:          ReturnIfALTNusng PlanetMinRadius
 999+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
 999+ CCA0 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
 999+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1000+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1000+ CCA0 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1000+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1001+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1002+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1002+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1002+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1003+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1003+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1003+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1004+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcRoofXDivRoofZ
1004+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1004+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1005+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcRoofYDivRoofZ
1005+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1005+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1006+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1007+ CCA0 ~                                    xor     a
1008+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1009+ CCA0 ~                                    call    DrawMeridian                ;--- Drawn first Meridian
1010+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: Debug whilst sorting meridain"
1011+ CCA0 ~                                    ret
1012+ CCA0 ~            ;--- Start Second Meridian
1013+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatNosevZ)       ; Set P = -nosev_z_hi
1014+ CCA0 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; .
1015+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (varP),a                    ; .
1016+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseSideArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / side_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1017+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreX)
1017+ CCA0 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1017+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKCx),hl
1018+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      hl,(P_centreY)
1018+ CCA0 ~               call    TwosCompToLeadingSign
1018+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKCy),hl
1019+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseRoofArcTanPI        ; CNT2 =  = arctan(-nosev_z_hi / roofv_z_hi) / 4,  if nosev_z_hi >= 0 add PI
1020+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ
1020+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1020+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKUx),bc
1021+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ
1021+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1021+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKUy),bc
1022+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcSideXDivSideZ
1022+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1022+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKVx),bc
1023+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ
1023+ CCA0 ~               call  P_BCmulRadius
1023+ CCA0 ~              ld      (P_BnKVy),bc
1024+ CCA0 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: PCNT2Debug"
1025+ CCA0 ~                                    xor     a
1026+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a
1027+ CCA0 ~                                    jp      DrawMeridian
1028+ CCA0 ~                                    ; implicit ret
1029+ CCA0 ~            DrawPlanetCrater:       ld      a,(P_BnKrotmatRoofvZ+1)      ; a= roofz hi
1030+ CCA0 ~                                    and     a                           ; if its negative, crater is on far size of planet
1031+ CCA0 ~                                    ret     m                           ; .
1032+ CCA0 ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofXDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_x / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1033+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterX           ;  222 * roofv_x / z + x-coordinate of planet centre
1034+ CCA0 ~                                    call    Cacl222MulRoofYDivRoofZ     ;  (Y A P) = 222 * roofv_y / z to give the x-coordinate of the crater offset
1035+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcCraterCenterY           ;  222 * roofv_y / z - y-coordinate of planet centre
1036+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseXDivNoseZ           ;  (Y A) = nosev_x / z
1037+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcNoseYDivNoseZ           ; (XX16+1 K2+1) = nosev_y / z
1038+ CCA0 ~                                    call    CalcSideYDivSideZ           ;  (Y A) = sidev_y / z
1039+ CCA0 ~                                    srl     a                           ; Set (XX16+3 K2+3) = (Y A) / 2
1040+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (varK2+3),a                 ; .
1041+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      a,(regY)                    ; (which is also in b to optimise later)
1042+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (P_XX16+3),a                 ;
1043+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      a,64                        ; Set TGT = 64, so we draw a full ellipse in the call to PLS22 below
1044+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKTGT),a
1045+ CCA0 ~                                    ZeroA
1046+ CCA0 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a                ; Set CNT2 = 0 as we are drawing a full ellipse, so we don't need to apply an offset
1047+ CCA0 ~                                    jp      DrawElipse
1048+ CCA0                              ENDIF
1049+ CCA0
1050+ CCA0
1051+ CCA0              ;PLS2                                                   Test
1052+ CCA0              ; K[10] = radius                                        $0000?
1053+ CCA0              ; k3[10], K4[10] X, y pixel of centre
1054+ CCA0              ; (XX16, K2), (XX16+1,K2+1) u_x , u_y                   $1F80  $FE80
1055+ CCA0              ; (XX16+2, K2+2), (XX16+3,K2+3) z_x , z_y               $0000  $0000
1056+ CCA0              ; TGT - target segment count                            $00
1057+ CCA0              ; CNT2 - starting segment                               $0D
1058+ CCA0              ; Now uses (Word) P_BnKCx, Cy, (Byte) Ux, Uy, Vx, Vy
1059+ CCA0                                      DISPLAY "TODO move code back in that was pulled outof BLINE"
1060+ CCA0 3E 3F        DrawMeridian:           ld      a,63                        ; Set TGT = 31, so we only draw half an ellipse
1061+ CCA2 32 A0 C0                             ld      (P_BnKTGT),a                ; and fall into DrawElipse
1062+ CCA5                                      DISPLAY "TODO DEBUG STP Default of 1"
1063+ CCA5 3E 01                                ld      a,1
1064+ CCA7 32 A1 C0                             ld      (P_BnKSTP),a
1065+ CCAA              ;PLS22
1066+ CCAA                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Sort out sign byte for uxuy vxvy in calling code"
1067+ CCAA              ; Set counter to 0 and reset flags--------------------------
1068+ CCAA              DrawElipse:
1069+ CCAA              .Initialise:            ZeroA
1069+ CCAA AF          >                        xor a
1070+ CCAB 32 D4 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a                ; Set CNT = 0
1071+ CCAE 32 8E C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a
1072+ CCB1 32 90 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a
1073+ CCB4 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; for debugging later we will just use the cos and sin signs above
1074+ CCB7 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; .
1075+ CCBA 32 9A C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; .
1076+ CCBD 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; .
1077+ CCC0 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; .
1078+ CCC3 32 99 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; .
1079+ CCC6 3D                                   dec     a
1080+ CCC7 32 D7 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a               ; Set FLAG = &FF to reset the ball line heap in the call to the BLINE routine below
1081+ CCCA              .PLL4:                  ;break
1082+ CCCA 3A D5 C0     .GetSinAngle:           ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set angle = CNT2 mod 32 (was regX)
1083+ CCCD E6 1F                                and     31                          ;
1084+ CCCF              ; Caclulate Sin(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1085+ CCCF 32 9F C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So P_BnKAngle is the starting segment, reduced to the range 0 to 32, so as there are 64 segments in the circle, this
1086+ CCD2 CD 74 91     .CalculateSinCNT2:      call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(angle)  = sin(CNT2 mod 32) = |sin(CNT2)|
1087+ CCD5 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1088+ CCD8 32 8D C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1089+ CCDB              ; calculate BnKVxSin = VX*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1090+ CCDB 3A 89 C0     .GetVxSin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVx)                 ; Set A = K2+2 = |v_x|
1091+ CCDE CD C5 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; R = A * Q / 256 = |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1092+ CCE1 32 95 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSin),a              ; now varR = vx*sin(CNT2)
1093+ CCE4              ; calculate BnkVySin = Vy*Sin(CNT2)-------------------------;
1094+ CCE4 3A 8B C0     .GetVySin:              ld      a,(P_BnKVy)                 ; Set A = K2+3 = |v_y|
1095+ CCE7 CD C5 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set varK = A * Q / 256 = |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1096+ CCEA 32 97 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySin),a              ;
1097+ CCED              ; Now work sign of vx and vy * sin -------------------------; In 6502 below, in z80 C flag is reversed
1098+ CCED 3A D5 C0     .CalcVxVyMulSinSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If CNT2 >= 33 then this sets the C flag, else clear : C is clear if the segment starts in the first half of the circle, 0 to 180 degrees
1099+ CCF0 FE 21                                cp      33                          ;                                                       C is set if the segment starts in the second half of the circle, 180 to 360 degrees
1100+ CCF2 DA 03 CD                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeSin          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1101+ CCF5 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1102+ CCF7 32 8E C0                             ld      (P_BnKSinCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1103+ CCFA 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; |v_x| * |sin(CNT2)|
1104+ CCFD 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; |v_y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1105+ CD00 32 99 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxVySinSign),a        ; |v_x/y| * |sin(CNT2)|
1106+ CD03              .NoSignChangeSin:
1107+ CD03              ; calculate cos(CNT2)---------------------------------------;
1108+ CD03 3A D5 C0     .CalculateCosCNT2:      ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set X = (CNT2 + 16) mod 32
1109+ CD06 C6 10                                add     a, 16                       ; .
1110+ CD08 E6 1F                                and     31                          ; .
1111+ CD0A 32 9F C0                             ld      (P_BnKAngle),a              ; save for debugging So we can use X as a lookup index into the SNE table to get the cosine (as there are 16 segments in a  quarter-circle)
1112+ CD0D CD 74 91                             call    LookupSineA                 ; Set Q = sin(X)  = sin((CNT2 + 16) mod 32) = |cos(CNT2)|
1113+ CD10 32 96 7E                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; .
1114+ CD13 32 8F C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2),a            ; for debugging
1115+ CD16              ; calculate Uy*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1116+ CD16 3A 87 C0     .GetUyCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUy)                 ; Set A = K2+1 = |u_y|
1117+ CD19 CD C5 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUyCos(wasK+2) = A * Q / 256 = |u_y| * |cos(CNT2)|
1118+ CD1C 32 93 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCos),a              ; .
1119+ CD1F              ; calculate Ux*Cos(CNT2)------------------------------------;
1120+ CD1F 3A 85 C0     .GetUxCos:              ld      a,(P_BnKUx)                 ; Set A = K2 = |u_x|
1121+ CD22 CD C5 8F                             call    AequAmulQdiv256usgn         ; Set P_BnKUxCos(wasP) = A * Q / 256 = |u_x| * |cos(CNT2)| also sets the C flag, so in the following, ADC #15 adds 16 rather than 15 (use use non carry add)
1122+ CD25 32 91 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCos),a              ; .
1123+ CD28              ; now work out sign for cos CNT2----------------------------;
1124+ CD28 3A D5 C0     .CalcUxUyMulCosSign:    ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; If (CNT2 + 16) mod 64 >= 33 then this sets the C flag,
1125+ CD2B C6 10                                add     a,16                        ; otherwise it's clear, so this means that:
1126+ CD2D E6 3F                                and     63                          ; .
1127+ CD2F FE 21                                cp      33                          ; c is clear if the segment is 0 to 90 or 270 to 360, we need
1128+ CD31 DA 42 CD                             jp      c,.NoSignChangeCos          ; in z80 c means < 33 so we don't do sign flip
1129+ CD34 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
1130+ CD36 32 90 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCosCNT2Sign),a        ; save sign of sin CNT2 for debugging
1131+ CD39 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1132+ CD3C 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1133+ CD3F 32 9A C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxUyCosSign),a        ; add XX16+5 as the high byte to give us (XX16+5 K) = |v_y| * sin(CNT2) &  (XX16+5 R) = |v_x| * sin(CNT2)
1134+ CD42              .NoSignChangeCos:
1135+ CD42              ; calculate Ux*cos + vx*sin---------------------------------;
1136+ CD42 3A 8E C0     .CalcSignOfVxMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1137+ CD45 21 8A C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVxSign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1138+ CD48 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1139+ CD49 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1140+ CD4B 32 96 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVxSinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1141+ CD4E 3A 90 C0     .CalcSignOfUxMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1142+ CD51 21 86 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUxSign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1143+ CD54 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1144+ CD55 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1145+ CD57 32 92 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUxCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1146+ CD5A 2A 91 C0     .AddUxCosVxSin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUxCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1147+ CD5D ED 5B 95 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVxSin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1148+ CD61 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1149+ CD64 22 9B C0     .DoneAddUxCosVxSin:     ld      (P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin),hl     ;
1150+ CD67              ; calculate -(Uy*cos - vy*sin)------------------------------;
1151+ CD67 3A 8E C0     .CalcSignOfVyMulSin:    ld      a,(P_BnKSinCNT2Sign)        ; Set S = the sign of XX16+2 * XX16+5
1152+ CD6A 21 8C C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKVySign              ; = the sign of v_x * XX16+5
1153+ CD6D AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
1154+ CD6E E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1155+ CD70 32 98 C0                             ld      (P_BnKVySinSign),a          ; P_BnKVxSin (was SR) = v_x * sin(CNT2)
1156+ CD73 3A 90 C0     .CalcSignOfUyMulCos:    ld      a,(P_BnKCosCNT2Sign)        ; Set A = the sign of XX16 * XX16+4
1157+ CD76 21 88 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKUySign              ; (i.e. sign of u_x * XX16_+4
1158+ CD79 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so (A P) = u_x * cos(CNT2)
1159+ CD7A E6 80                                and     $80                         ; so a is only sign bit now
1160+ CD7C 32 94 C0                             ld      (P_BnKUyCosSign),a          ; now P_BnKUxCos
1161+ CD7F 2A 93 C0     .AddUyCosVySin:         ld      hl,(P_BnKUyCos)             ; Set (A X) = (A P) + (S R)  = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) we could work with a but its simpler to jsut reload hl
1162+ CD82 ED 5B 97 C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKVySin)             ; as R S are next to each other can load as one
1163+ CD86 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = u_x * cos(CNT2) + v_x * sin(CNT2) format S15 not 2'sc
1164+ CD89 22 9D C0     .DoneAddUyCosVySin:     ld      (P_BnKUyCosSubVySin),hl     ;
1165+ CD8C              ; Calculate NewXPos = Centrey - Uy cos - vy cos (which we still have in hl)
1166+ CD8C              .PL42:
1167+ CD8C ED 5B 83 C0  .CalcNewYPos:           ld      de, (P_BnKCy)               ; Hl is already in HL so de =  Cx
1168+ CD90 EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; swap round so we can do hl + de where de is already negated to effect a subtract (probabyl don't don't need this)
1169+ CD91 7A                                   ld      a,d
1170+ CD92 EE 80                                xor     $80                         ; now flip bit as its a subtract not add
1171+ CD94 57                                   ld      d,a
1172+ CD95 CD C4 CD                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1173+ CD98 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cy - ( uy Cos + vy sin)
1174+ CD9B 22 F2 C0                             ld      (P_NewYPos),hl              ; load to new Y Pos
1175+ CD9E 2A 81 C0     .CalcNewXPos:           ld      hl,(P_BnKCx)
1176+ CDA1 ED 5B 9B C0                          ld      de,(P_BnKUxCosAddVxSin)
1177+ CDA5 CD C4 CD                             call    ScaleDE75pct
1178+ CDA8 CD 00 00                             call    AddDEtoHLSigned             ; hl = cx - ( ux Cos + vx sin)
1179+ CDAB 22 F0 C0                             ld      (P_NewXPos),hl
1180+ CDAE CD E9 CD     .PL43:                  call    BLINE                       ; hl = TX  draw this segment, updates CNT in A
1181+ CDB1                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng P_BnKTGT        ; If CNT > TGT then jump to PL40 to stop drawing the ellipse (which is how we draw half-ellipses)
1181+ CDB1 21 A0 C0    >                        ld      hl,P_BnKTGT
1181+ CDB4 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
1181+ CDB5 D0          >                        ret	    nc
1182+ CDB6 3A D5 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT2)               ; Set CNT2 = (CNT2 + STP) mod 64
1183+ CDB9 21 A1 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP                 ; .
1184+ CDBC 86                                   add     a,(hl)                      ; .
1185+ CDBD 32 D5 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT2),a               ; .
1186+ CDC0 C3 CA CC                             jp      .PLL4                       ; Jump back to PLL4 to draw the next segment
1187+ CDC3 C9           .PL40:                  ret
1188+ CDC4
1189+ CDC4
1190+ CDC4 EB           ScaleDE75pct:           ex      de,hl
1191+ CDC5 7C                                   ld      a,h
1192+ CDC6 A7                                   and     a
1193+ CDC7 F5                                   push    af
1194+ CDC8 F2 CE CD                             jp      p,.PositiveHL
1195+ CDCB E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
1196+ CDCD 67                                   ld      h,a
1197+ CDCE D5           .PositiveHL:            push    de
1198+ CDCF 54 5D                                ld      de,hl
1199+ CDD1 29                                   add     hl,hl                       ; * 2
1200+ CDD2 19                                   add     hl,de
1201+ CDD3 D1                                   pop     de
1202+ CDD4                                      ShiftHLRight1
1202+ CDD4 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1202+ CDD6 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1203+ CDD8                                      ShiftHLRight1
1203+ CDD8 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1203+ CDDA CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1204+ CDDC EB           CheckSign:              ex      de,hl
1205+ CDDD F1                                   pop     af
1206+ CDDE A7                                   and     a
1207+ CDDF F0                                   ret     p
1208+ CDE0 7C                                   ld      a,h
1209+ CDE1 F6 80                                or      $80
1210+ CDE3 67                                   ld      h,a
1211+ CDE4 C9                                   ret
1212+ CDE5
1213+ CDE5              ;  Draw a single segment of a circle, adding the point to the ball line heap.
1214+ CDE5              ;  Arguments:
1215+ CDE5              ;   CNT                  The number of this segment
1216+ CDE5              ;   STP                  The step size for the circle
1217+ CDE5              ;   K6(1 0)              The x-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as a screen coordinate
1218+ CDE5              ;   P_New Pos-- (T X)                The y-coordinate of the new point on the circle, as an offset from the centre of the circle
1219+ CDE5              ;   FLAG                 Set to &FF for the first call, so it sets up the first point in the heap but waits until the second call before drawing anything (as we need two points, i.e. two calls, before we can draw a line)
1220+ CDE5              ;   -- Not UsedK                    The circle's radius
1221+ CDE5              ;   -- Not UsedK3(1 0)              Pixel x-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1222+ CDE5              ;   -- Not UsedK4(1 0)              Pixel y-coordinate of the centre of the circle
1223+ CDE5              ;   P_PrevXPos--K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1224+ CDE5              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the previous point added to the ball line heap (if this is not the first point)
1225+ CDE5              ;   SWAP                 If non-zero, we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2)
1226+ CDE5              ; Returns:
1227+ CDE5              ;   CNT                  CNT is updated to CNT + STP
1228+ CDE5              ;   A                    The new value of CNT
1229+ CDE5              ;   P_PrevXPos --K5(1 0)              Screen x-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1230+ CDE5              ;   P_PrevYPos--K5(3 2)              Screen y-coordinate of the point that we just added to the ball line heap
1231+ CDE5              ;   FLAG                 Set to 0`
1232+ CDE5              ; ** THIS NEEDS CHANGING TO IMMEDIATE DRAW and retain last line end pos) ;
1233+ CDE5              ; Flow of code
1234+ CDE5              ; Entry Bline, prepare T , X K4 etc
1235+ CDE5              ;       BL1
1236+ CDE5 00           PLINEx1                 DB 0
1237+ CDE6 00           PLINEy1                 DB 0
1238+ CDE7 00           PLINEx2                 DB 0
1239+ CDE8 00           PLINEy2                 DB 0
1240+ CDE9
1241+ CDE9                                      IFDEF MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1242+ CDE9 ~            ; Store X and Y on plot line (ball) heap, values bc = YX to save, a = offset
1243+ CDE9 ~            P_StoreXYOnHeap:        ld      hl,P_BnKPlotXHeap
1244+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      bc,(P_NewXPos)
1245+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      de,(P_NewYPos)      ; now save Y
1246+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get off set
1247+ CDE9 ~                                    add     hl,a                ; now we have x heap target
1248+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      (hl),b
1249+ CDE9 ~                                    inc     hl
1250+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      (hl),c
1251+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      a, $80 - 1          ; note its 2 bytes per coord element, we have already incremeted by 1 byte
1252+ CDE9 ~                                    add     hl,a
1253+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      (hl),d
1254+ CDE9 ~                                    inc     hl
1255+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      (hl),e
1256+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex)  ; get index back
1257+ CDE9 ~                                    inc     a                   ; move on 2 bytes
1258+ CDE9 ~                                    inc     a                   ; .
1259+ CDE9 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; and save it
1260+ CDE9 ~                                    ret
1261+ CDE9                                      ENDIF
1262+ CDE9
1263+ CDE9              ; We'll move the calculation of absolute screen pos outside of bline so we expect screen pixel coordinates
1264+ CDE9              BLINE:                  ;ld      a,(P_Tvar)          ; entry point if we need to fetch TX
1265+ CDE9                                      ;ld      h,a
1266+ CDE9                                      ;ld      a,(P_Xreg)
1267+ CDE9                                      ;ld      l,a
1268+ CDE9              BLINE_HL:               ;ld      de,(P_varK4)        ; Set K6(3 2) = (T X) + K4(1 0) = y-coord of centre + y-coord of new point
1269+ CDE9                                      ;ex      de,hl               ;not really needed
1270+ CDE9                                      ;ClearCarryFlag              ; .
1271+ CDE9                                      ;adc     hl,de               ; .
1272+ CDE9                                      ;ld      a,h
1273+ CDE9                                      ;ld      (P_varK6p2),hl      ; so K6(3 2) now contains the y-coordinate of the new point on the circle but as a screen coordinate, to go along with the screen y-coordinate in K6(1 0)
1274+ CDE9 3A D7 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKFlag)       ; If FLAG = 0, jump down to BL1, else its FF so we save first point
1275+ CDEC A7                                   and     a                   ; .
1276+ CDED CA F7 CD                             jp      z,.BL1              ; .
1277+ CDF0              .FirstPlot:
1278+ CDF0              ; This code now stores on line heap if debugging is enabled else it just stores in Prev X and Y for direct plotting
1279+ CDF0              ; First time in we are just establinshign first position point, then we can exit
1280+ CDF0 3C           .BL5:                   inc     a                   ; Flag is &FF so this is the first call to BLINE so increment FLAG to set it to 0
1281+ CDF1 32 D7 C0                             ld      (P_BnKFlag),a       ; so we just save the first point and don't plot it
1282+ CDF4                                      DISPLAY "TODO, set up proper variables, hold variables for previous X Y, we don't need ball heap"
1283+ CDF4                                      DISPLAY "TODO, created a plot xy heap to store for debugging purposes, delete once not needed"
1284+ CDF4                                      DISPLAY "TODO, need flag for start which is probably CNT being 0?"
1285+ CDF4                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1286+ CDF4 ~                                    ZeroA
1287+ CDF4 ~                                    ld      (P_BnKPlotIndex),a  ; Initialise line list
1288+ CDF4                                      ENDIF
1289+ CDF4              ; We don't need to copy to prev here as we do it in BL7
1290+ CDF4 C3 25 CE                             jp      .SkipFirstPlot      ; Jump to BL7 to tidy up and return from the subroutine
1291+ CDF7              ; This section performs teh clipping and draw of the line. it retrieves previous position and draws to new
1292+ CDF7              .BL1:
1293+ CDF7              ; note we still need the unclipped points for the next segment as we have to clip again
1294+ CDF7                                      ;ld      hl,(PLINEx1)        ; Otherwise the coordinates were swapped by the call to
1295+ CDF7                                      ;ld      de,(PLINEx2)        ; LL145 above, so we swap (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2) back
1296+ CDF7                                      ;ld      (PLINEx1),de        ; again
1297+ CDF7                                      ;ld      (PLINEx2),hl        ; .
1298+ CDF7              .BL9:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1299+ CDF7              .BL8:                   DISPLAY "TODO  Removed BnKLSP, check fine"
1300+ CDF7                                      ;ld      a,(P_BnKPlotIndex) ; Set Line Stack Pointer to be the same as Plot Index)
1301+ CDF7                                      ;ld      (P_BnKLSP),a
1302+ CDF7 2A EC C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevXPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1303+ CDFA 22 F7 C0                             ld      (P_XX1510),hl
1304+ CDFD 2A EE C0                             ld      hl,(P_PrevYPos)     ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1305+ CE00 22 F9 C0                             ld      (P_XX1532),hl
1306+ CE03 2A F0 C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1307+ CE06 22 FB C0                             ld      (P_XX1554),hl
1308+ CE09 2A F2 C0                             ld      hl,(P_NewYPos)      ; set line X2 to PLINEx2
1309+ CE0C 22 FD C0                             ld      (P_XX1210),hl
1310+ CE0F CD 0A C3     .CLipLine:              call    P_LL145_6502        ; Clip  line from (X1, Y1) to (X2, Y2), loads to X1,Y1,X2,Y2 P_XX1510 as bytes                        ld      bc,(XX1510)
1311+ CE12 38 11                                jr      c,.LineTotallyClipped
1312+ CE14                                      DISPLAY "TODO what was the Ld de for?"
1313+ CE14              ;                        ld      de,(XX1532)
1314+ CE14                                      DISPLAY "TODO SORT OUT PROPER PLANET COLOR"
1315+ CE14 3E CC        .DrawLine:              ld      a,$CC
1316+ CE16 ED 4B F7 C0                          ld      bc,(P_XX15PlotX1)
1317+ CE1A ED 5B F9 C0                          ld      de,(P_XX15PlotX2)
1318+ CE1E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
1318+ CE1E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1319+ CE22 CD AB F5                             call    l2_draw_any_line
1320+ CE25                                      DISPLAY "TODO removed check for starting line segments again as we draw direct"
1321+ CE25              ;                        ld      a,(P_XX13)          ; If XX13 is non-zero, jump up to BL5 to add a &FF marker to the end of the line heap. XX13 is non-zero
1322+ CE25              ;                        and     a                   ; after the call to the clipping routine LL145 above if the end of the line was clipped, meaning the next line
1323+ CE25              ;                        jp      z,.BL5              ; sent to BLINE can't join onto the end but has to start a new segment, and that's what inserting the &FF marker does
1324+ CE25              ; if line was totally clipped just store new x and y as previous and continue from there
1325+ CE25              .SkipFirstPlot:
1326+ CE25              .LineTotallyClipped:
1327+ CE25 2A F0 C0     .BL7:                   ld      hl,(P_NewXPos)        ; Copy the data for this step point from K6(3 2 1 0)
1328+ CE28 ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(P_NewYPos)        ; into K5(3 2 1 0), for use in the next call to BLINE:
1329+ CE2C 22 EC C0                             ld      (P_PrevXPos),hl
1330+ CE2F ED 53 EE C0                          ld      (P_PrevYPos),de
1331+ CE33                                      IFDEF   MERIDANLINEDEBUG
1332+ CE33 ~                                    call    P_StoreXYOnHeap
1333+ CE33                                      ENDIF
1334+ CE33              ;                        ld      (P_varK5),hl        ; * K5(1 0)(3 2) = x, y of previous point
1335+ CE33              ;                        ld      (P_varK5p2),de      ;
1336+ CE33 3A D4 C0                             ld      a,(P_BnKCNT)         ; CNT = CNT + STP
1337+ CE36 21 A1 C0                             ld      hl,P_BnKSTP
1338+ CE39                                      ClearCarryFlag
1338+ CE39 B7          >                        or a
1339+ CE3A 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)
1340+ CE3B 32 D4 C0                             ld      (P_BnKCNT),a
1341+ CE3E C9                                   ret
1342+ CE3F
1343+ CE3F              PlanetBankSize  EQU $ - StartOfPlanet
1344+ CE3F
1345+ CE3F
# file closed: ./Universe/Planet/planet_data.asm

 379+ F636 00 16 00 0A                          DB  0,22, 0,10, low 60000, high 60000, EQ_FRONT_MILITARY, 0     ,$00 , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 379+ F63A 60 EA 16 00
 379+ F63E 00 00 00 00
 379+ F642 00 00 00 00
 380+ F646 00 17 00 0A                          DB  0,23, 0,10, low 60000, high 60000, EQ_REAR_MILITARY , 0     ,$01 , 1  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 380+ F64A 60 EA 17 00
 380+ F64E 01 01 00 00
 380+ F652 00 00 00 00
 381+ F656 00 18 00 0A                          DB  0,24, 0,10, low 60000, high 60000, EQ_LEFT_MILITARY , 0     ,$02 , 2  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 381+ F65A 60 EA 18 00
 381+ F65E 02 02 00 00
 381+ F662 00 00 00 00
 382+ F666 00 19 00 0A                          DB  0,25, 0,10, low 60000, high 60000, EQ_RIGHT_MILITARY, 0     ,$03 , 3  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0  , 0 , 0
 382+ F66A 60 EA 19 00
 382+ F66E 03 03 00 00
 382+ F672 00 00 00 00
 383+ F676              ShipEquipTableRowLen    EQU 16
 384+ F676              ShipEquipTableSize      EQU ($-ShipEquipmentList)/ShipEquipTableRowLen
 385+ F676
 386+ F676              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 387+ F676 2B           GalaxyRandSeed			DB	43	            ; Just some start values
 388+ F677 20           GalaxyRandSeed1			DB	32	            ; Just some start values
 389+ F678 0C           GalaxyRandSeed2			DB	12	            ; Just some start values
 390+ F679 42           GalaxyRandSeed3			DB	66	            ; Just some start values
 391+ F67A              GalaxySeedRandom:
 392+ F67A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 393+ F67A CD 9F 84     GetDigramGalaxySeed:    call	copy_galaxy_to_working
 394+ F67D 18 03                                jr		GetDigramWorkingSeed
 395+ F67F CD B7 84     GetDigramSystemSeed:    call	copy_system_to_working
 396+ F682 11 A3 8E     GetDigramWorkingSeed:   ld		de,name_expanded    ; ">GetDigram a = digram seed"
 397+ F685 06 03                                ld		b,3
 398+ F687 3A 26 7F                             ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)
 399+ F68A E6 40                                and		$40
 400+ F68C 28 03                                jr		z,.SmallSizeName
 401+ F68E CD C4 8E     .LargeSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 402+ F691 CD C4 8E     .SmallSizeName:         call	NamingLoop
 403+ F694 CD C4 8E                             call	NamingLoop
 404+ F697 CD C4 8E                             call	NamingLoop
 405+ F69A EB           .DoneName:              ex		de,hl
 406+ F69B 36 00                                ld		(hl),0
 407+ F69D EB                                   ex		de,hl
 408+ F69E C9                                   ret
 409+ F69F
 410+ F69F 11 76 F6     GalaxySetSeedFromHL:    ld      de,GalaxyRandSeed
 411+ F6A2              ; Uses registers a,b and hl
 412+ F6A2 B7           GalaxyDoRandom:         or      a                                               ; in 6502 this is called after a bcc instruction to will always be clear (see .detok2 and .dt6)
 413+ F6A3 3A 76 F6                             ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed)
 414+ F6A6 CB 17        .Seed0Rolled:           rl      a                                               ; r0 << 1
 415+ F6A8 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = reg x in 6502 so x = r0 << 1
 416+ F6A9 21 78 F6     .AddSeed2               ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed2                              ;
 417+ F6AC 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; a = r0 << 1 + r2
 418+ F6AD 32 76 F6     .SetRandSeed0:          ld		(GalaxyRandSeed),a					            ; set r0' = (r0 << 1) +  r2 + (r0 bit 7)
 419+ F6B0 78                                   ld      a,b
 420+ F6B1 32 78 F6     .SetRandSeed2:          ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; set r2' =  r0 << 1
 421+ F6B4 3A 77 F6     .GetRandSeed1:          ld      a,(GalaxyRandSeed1)
 422+ F6B7 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = r1
 423+ F6B8 21 79 F6                             ld      hl,GalaxyRandSeed3
 424+ F6BB 8E                                   adc     a,(hl)                                          ; Adc from before may have set carry flag or may not, will be set if r0 << 1 + r2 + carry > 256
 425+ F6BC 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; set r1' = r1 + r3 + carry
 426+ F6BF 4F                                   ld      c,a
 427+ F6C0 78                                   ld      a,b
 428+ F6C1 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; set r3 = r1
 429+ F6C4 79                                   ld      a,c
 430+ F6C5 C9                                   ret
 431+ F6C6
 432+ F6C6              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 433+ F6C6 ED 31        galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de:add     hl,a
 434+ F6C8 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 435+ F6CA 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch low byte
 436+ F6CB 47                                   ld      b,a
 437+ F6CC 23                                   inc     hl
 438+ F6CD 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ;  Fetch high byte
 439+ F6CE 68                                   ld      l,b
 440+ F6CF 67                                   ld      h,a
 441+ F6D0 7E           GalaxyCopyLoop:         ld      a,(hl)
 442+ F6D1 FE 00                                cp      0
 443+ F6D3 28 05                                jr      z,.CopyDone
 444+ F6D5 12                                   ld      (de),a
 445+ F6D6 23                                   inc     hl
 446+ F6D7 13                                   inc     de
 447+ F6D8 18 F6                                jr      GalaxyCopyLoop
 448+ F6DA 12           .CopyDone:              ld      (de),a
 449+ F6DB C9                                   ret
 450+ F6DC              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451+ F6DC 11 64 F1     galaxy_get_species:     ld      de,GalaxySpecies
 452+ F6DF 3E 28                                ld      a,"("
 453+ F6E1 12                                   ld      (de),a
 454+ F6E2 13                                   inc     de
 455+ F6E3 3A FC E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+4)
 456+ F6E6 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 457+ F6E8 20 0A                                jr      nz,.NonHuman
 458+ F6EA 21 62 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantHumanIx
 459+ F6ED AF                                   xor     a
 460+ F6EE CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 461+ F6F1 C3 4F F7                             jp      .galaxy_species_exit
 462+ F6F4 3A FD E8     .NonHuman:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 463+ F6F7 CB 3F                                srl     a
 464+ F6F9 CB 3F                                srl     a
 465+ F6FB E6 07                                and     $07
 466+ F6FD FE 03                                cp      3
 467+ F6FF 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc1
 468+ F701 21 34 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc1Ix
 469+ F704 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 470+ F707 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 471+ F709 12                                   ld      (de),a
 472+ F70A 13                                   inc     de
 473+ F70B 3A FD E8     .NotDesc1:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 474+ F70E CB 3F                                srl     a
 475+ F710 CB 3F                                srl     a
 476+ F712 CB 3F                                srl     a
 477+ F714 CB 3F                                srl     a
 478+ F716 CB 3F                                srl     a
 479+ F718 FE 06                                cp      6
 480+ F71A 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc2
 481+ F71C 21 3A F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc2Ix
 482+ F71F CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 483+ F722 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 484+ F724 12                                   ld      (de),a
 485+ F725 13                                   inc     de
 486+ F726 3A F9 E8     .NotDesc2:              ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+1)
 487+ F729 47                                   ld      b,a
 488+ F72A 3A FB E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+3)
 489+ F72D A8                                   xor     b
 490+ F72E E6 07                                and     $07
 491+ F730 F5                                   push    af
 492+ F731 FE 06                                cp      6
 493+ F733 30 0A                                jr      nc,.NotDesc3
 494+ F735 21 46 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc3Ix
 495+ F738 CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 496+ F73B 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 497+ F73D 12                                   ld      (de),a
 498+ F73E 13                                   inc     de
 499+ F73F F1           .NotDesc3:              pop     af
 500+ F740 47                                   ld      b,a
 501+ F741 3A FD E8                             ld      a,(GalaxyWorkingSeed+5)
 502+ F744 E6 03                                and     $03
 503+ F746 80                                   add     a,b
 504+ F747 E6 07                                and     $07
 505+ F749 21 52 F1                             ld      hl,GalaxyInhabitantDesc4Ix
 506+ F74C CD C6 F6                             call    galaxy_cpy_str_a_at_hl_to_de
 507+ F74F 3E 73        .galaxy_species_exit:   ld      a,"s"
 508+ F751 12                                   ld      (de),a
 509+ F752 13                                   inc     de
 510+ F753 3E 29                                ld      a,")"
 511+ F755 12                                   ld      (de),a
 512+ F756 13                                   inc     de
 513+ F757 AF                                   xor     a
 514+ F758 12                                   ld      (de),a
 515+ F759 C9                                   ret
 516+ F75A
 517+ F75A
 518+ F75A              ; To copy seed, loops from 3 to 0
 519+ F75A              ; copy seed X + 2 to target X
 520+ F75A              ; x = x -1
 521+ F75A
 522+ F75A              ; For lave we shoudl have "Lave is most famous for its vast rain forests and the Lavian tree grub"
 523+ F75A
 524+ F75A              GalaxyCapitaliseString: ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 525+ F75A 23                                   inc		hl
 526+ F75B 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
 527+ F75C FE 00                                cp		0
 528+ F75E C8                                   ret		z
 529+ F75F FE 5B                                cp		'Z'+1
 530+ F761 30 F7                                jr		nc,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 531+ F763 FE 41                                cp		'A'
 532+ F765 38 F3                                jr		c,GalaxyCapitaliseString
 533+ F767 C6 20        .LowerCase:             add		a,'a'-'A'
 534+ F769 77                                   ld		(hl),a
 535+ F76A 18 EE                                jr		GalaxyCapitaliseString

 538+ F76C              GalaxyGoatSoup:         ;ld      (GalaxyTargetSystem),bc                         ; Set the galaxy target variable
 539+ F76C                                      ;call    galaxy_system_under_cursor                      ; and set the galaxyworkingseed based on cursor
 540+ F76C                                      ;cp      $FF
 541+ F76C                                      ;jr      z,.NoSystemFound
 542+ F76C 3A 28 7F     .SeedGalaxy             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)                              ;
 543+ F76F 32 76 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed),a                              ; r0 = Seed C
 544+ F772 3A 29 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+3)                              ;
 545+ F775 32 77 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed1),a                             ; r1 = Seeed D
 546+ F778 3A 2A 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)                              ;
 547+ F77B 32 78 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed2),a                             ; r2 = Seed E
 548+ F77E 3A 2B 7F                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)                              ;
 549+ F781 32 79 F6                             ld      (GalaxyRandSeed3),a                             ; r3 = Seed F
 550+ F784 C9                                   ret

 552+ F785 3E 05        .MarkExtendedDesc:      ld      a,5                                             ;  ("{lower case}{justify}{single cap}[86-90] IS [140-144].{cr}{left align}"
 553+ F787 F5           .GalaxyExpandDesc:      push    af
 554+ F788 47                                   ld      b,a                                             ; b = 6502 X reg
 555+ F789 C5                                   push    bc                                              ; save Y reg
 556+ F78A
 557+ F78A              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 558+ F78A              ; We enter here with BC = the Y and X Coordinates of the system to select in this galaxy
 559+ F78A              ; This is based on the docked BBC PDesc Pink Volcanoes version ratehr tha goat soup

 569+ F791
